RequirementText: The adjuster shall be able to override the preferred repair facitlity on the estimate assignment.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user action/functional capability (adjuster can override preferred repair facility). No quality/constraint attributes (availability, security, performance, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: The adjuster shall enter the preferred repair facility on the estimate assignment.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user action (entering preferred repair facility) — a functional behavior. It does not mention availability, performance, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The system shall locate the preferred repair facility with the highest ratings for the input criteria
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (locate the preferred repair facility with highest ratings based on input criteria). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: The system shall resolve the zipcode for the street address city and state if zipcode is unknown.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (resolving zipcode from address information). It does not mention availability, performance, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The vehicle location shall include street address city state and zipcode
AI_Rationale: Specifies what the system must include for vehicle location data (street address, city, state, zipcode) — a functional/data requirement rather than a non-functional quality.

RequirementText: The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.
AI_Rationale: Specifies behavior of the estimator (what it should do in a particular condition). No non-functional constraints (performance, security, availability, usability, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: The system shall return a list of repair facilities within the radius if the preferred repair facility cannot be determined.
AI_Rationale: Specifies system behavior (returning a list when preferred facility cannot be determined). No quality, performance, security, or other non-functional constraints are mentioned.

RequirementText: The adjuster shall review the collision estimate.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing an action the adjuster must perform (review the collision estimate). No quality attributes (availability, security, performance, etc.) are specified.

RequirementText: The user shall enter new ratings based on the audit report
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user action (enter new ratings based on an audit report), describing system functionality/behavior. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The recycled parts search results provided to the estimator shall be retrieved by the system.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies a system action (retrieving recycled parts search results for the estimator), which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, UI, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: The vehicle data shall include vehicle year make and model
AI_Rationale: Specifies required data content/behavior (which fields the vehicle data must include) — a functional requirement. No quality/constraint like performance, security, usability, etc., is implied.

RequirementText: The preferred repair facility ratings shall be saved by the system.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system action (saving preferred repair facility ratings), which is functional behavior. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: The user shall select to save the preferred repair facility ratings.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user action/functional behavior: selecting to save preferred repair facility ratings. Does not impose availability, security, performance, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: The ratings shall include categories for attempted use of recycled parts and actual use of recycled parts
AI_Rationale: Specifies what the system must include in ratings (categories for attempted and actual use of recycled parts), which is a functional requirement about data content; no quality/operational/non-functional aspects are mentioned.

RequirementText: The ratings shall be from a scale of 1-10
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional requirement constraining the rating scale (1-10); no quality attributes or non-functional concerns are implied.

RequirementText: The system will display a blank set of ratings if there are not ratings yet defined.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional behavior of the system (what to display when no ratings exist). No non-functional qualities are implied.

RequirementText: The current repair facility ratings shall be displayed to the user.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functionality (displaying current repair facility ratings to the user). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or any other non-functional quality, so only Functional is set to true.

RequirementText: The user shall select to view the preferred repair facility ratings.
AI_Rationale: This requirement describes a user-visible action (select to view ratings) — a functional behavior. It does not specify quality attributes like performance, security, availability, etc.

RequirementText: The audit report shall be available to other adjusters at later points in time.
AI_Rationale: Requirement states a functional capability: the audit report must be available to other adjusters later. It specifies what the system should provide, not quality attributes like uptime, performance, security, or usability.

RequirementText: The audit report shall be displayed to the user.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (displaying the audit report to the user). It does not mention availability, performance, security, UI look-and-feel beyond display, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: The audit report shall include the total score of the audit which sums the indivual line items.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a report content item (include total score summing line items), which defines functional behavior of the system. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional attributes.

RequirementText: The audit report shall include the percentage of available recycled parts used in the estimate
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a report content item (include percentage of available recycled parts), which is a functional requirement describing what the system should produce. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional properties.

RequirementText: The audit report shall include the number of available recycled parts from the original search results.
AI_Rationale: Specifies content that the audit report must include (number of available recycled parts) — a functional requirement about system behavior/output rather than a quality attribute.

RequirementText: The audit report shall include the total number of recycled parts used in the estimate.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a report must include a particular data element (total number of recycled parts), which is a functional behavior. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The system shall generate an audit report based on the available recycled parts and the collision estimate.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system behavior: generating an audit report based on recycled parts and collision estimate. This is a functional requirement; no quality attributes (availability, performance, security, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: The adjuster shall request a recycled parts audit of the collision estimate.
AI_Rationale: This sentence specifies a functional action (an adjuster requesting a recycled parts audit) and does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: The user shall search for the preferred repair facility using vehicle vehicle location and radius in miles
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user-facing capability (search by vehicle location and radius). No non-functional attributes like performance, security, usability, etc., are mentioned.

RequirementText: The product shall comply with corporate color scheme
AI_Rationale: Specifies adherence to corporate branding guidelines (legal/policy) and concerns the user interface's visual appearance (colors), so labels L and LF apply.

RequirementText: The product shall comply with the estimatics laws relating to recycled parts usage.
AI_Rationale: This requirement mandates compliance with laws regarding recycled parts usage, which is a legal/regulatory constraint. It does not specify functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The recycled parts audit report shall be returned to the user within 10 seconds. The audit report shall be returned within 10 seconds.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a functional outcome (returning the recycled parts audit report) and a performance constraint (response within 10 seconds). No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds. The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds
AI_Rationale: Specifies a timing constraint (response time) for the search/return operation — a performance requirement. No functional or other quality aspects explicitly stated.

RequirementText: The search for recycled parts shall take no longer than 15 seconds. The search results shall be returned in under 15 seconds.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a time bound for search results (max 15 seconds), which is a performance (PE) constraint. It does not specify functional behavior beyond the performance nor other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The user shall easily locate instructions while using the product. User help can be found within 90% of the system.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies ease of locating instructions and help coverage (user help found within 90% of the system), which relates to usability and the look-and-feel of the interface. No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: The product shall be easy to learn by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. The product shall be learned with two days onsite training
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies learnability and training duration for users (Adjusters and Collision Estimators), which is a usability requirement. No functional or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: Users shall feel satisfied using the product. 85% of all users will be satisfied with the product.
AI_Rationale: This requirement explicitly targets user satisfaction and measurable usability (85% satisfied), so it is a Usability (US) non-functional requirement. No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: The product shall increase productivity of Collision Estimators. 80% of the Collision Estimators shall agree their productivity has increase within 1 month of using the product.
AI_Rationale: This requirement concerns user-perceived productivity/usability improvement measured by estimator agreement — it specifies a usability/utility outcome rather than functional, performance, security, or other non-functional categories.

RequirementText: The product shall be easy to use by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. 95% of Adjusters and Collision Estimators shall find the product easy to use.
AI_Rationale: Specifies ease of use and measurable user satisfaction (95% of target users), which is a usability requirement.

RequirementText: The appearance of the product shall appear professional
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly concerns the appearance/professional look of the product, which maps to Look & Feel. It does not specify functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The product shall comply with corporate User Interface Guidelines
AI_Rationale: Requires adherence to corporate UI guidelines which are organizational/standards (legal/compliance) and directly concerns look-and-feel of the interface. No mention of functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The product shall adhere to the corporate Architecture guidelines
AI_Rationale: This requirement mandates conformance to corporate Architecture guidelines, which is a compliance/organizational constraint. It does not specify functionality or other quality attributes, so only Legal/Compliance (L) is set.

RequirementText: The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that the product must run on existing hardware across environments, which is a portability constraint (platform/hardware compatibility). No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.
AI_Rationale: Specifies interfacing with an external system (Choice Parts System) to receive data feed—an operational/integration requirement. Does not specify functional behavior, performance, security, availability, etc.

RequirementText: The product must support Mozilla Firefox 1.0 and above.
AI_Rationale: Specifies supported browsers/platform compatibility (portability). No functional behavior or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: The product shall comply with insurance regulations regarding claims processing.
AI_Rationale: Requires compliance with insurance regulations for claims processing, which is a legal/regulatory constraint. No functional behavior or other quality attributes are specified.

RequirementText: The preferred repair facility ratings shall be saved within 5 seconds. The save shall occur within 5 seconds.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a save action (functional) and a time-bound constraint of 5 seconds (performance/response time). No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: The product shall adhere to the corporate online availability schedule. The application is brought down only within 98% of the scheduled outages per the availability schedule.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies adherence to an online availability schedule and a 98% constraint on outages, which is an availability requirement. It does not mention fault tolerance, functionality, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The product must support Internet Explorer 5.5 and above.
AI_Rationale: Specifies supported web browser versions (compatibility/portability requirement). No functional behavior or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: The product shall be able to handle up to 1500 simultaneous users. The system shall perform with 1500 users as a time.
AI_Rationale: Specifies the required capacity for concurrent users (1500 simultaneous users), which is a scalability requirement. No explicit uptime, performance metrics, security, or functional behavior beyond concurrency are stated.

RequirementText: The product shall achieve a 98% uptime. The product shall not fail more than 2% of the available online time.
AI_Rationale: Specifies uptime target (98%) and allowable failure percentage (2%) — directly concerns availability. The explicit failure limit implies fault tolerance/reliability requirements, so FT is marked. No functional behavior or other quality attributes are specified.

RequirementText: The product must comply with Sarbanes-Oxley.
AI_Rationale: Sarbanes-Oxley is a legal/regulatory compliance requirement, so this is a legal label. The statement does not specify functionality or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The system shall prevent malicious attacks including denial of service.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly concerns preventing malicious attacks (security). It also mentions denial of service, which directly impacts availability, so Availability is marked. No other quality attributes are explicitly implied.

RequirementText: The product shall free of computer viruses.
AI_Rationale: Requirement addresses protection from computer viruses, which is a security concern (malware prevention). No other quality attributes or functional details are specified.

RequirementText: One insurance company shall not be able to view another insurance companys claim data.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies access control between insurance companies (preventing one company from viewing another's claim data), which is a security/privacy constraint (authorization/confidentiality). It does not describe functionality, performance, availability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: Only valid data shall be entered into the system. No invalid data shall be entered into the system.
AI_Rationale: The requirement mandates preventing invalid (including potentially malicious) data entry, which relates to security (data integrity/input validation) and usability (user should be guided/prevented from entering invalid data). It does not specify functional behavior beyond quality constraints, nor other NFR categories.

RequirementText: Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (who can update/access ratings) — functional. It also enforces role-based access control (restricting access to supervisors), which is a security/authentication/authorization concern. No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability (search for recycled parts) combined with role-based access restriction — an access control/security requirement.

RequirementText: Product installations and upgrades shall be handled by the middleware technology team within established launch time frames.
AI_Rationale: This requirement assigns responsibility for installations and upgrades to the middleware team and refers to maintenance/operational scheduling within launch time frames, which is a maintainability/organizational maintenance concern. It does not specify functional behavior, performance, security, availability, scalability, portability, usability, or legal constraints.

RequirementText: The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies how the product will be supported (use of corporate support center), which concerns operability/operation and administration. It does not describe functionality or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.
AI_Rationale: Specifies when maintenance occurs relative to corporate maintenance windows, which concerns maintainability scheduling. It does not specify availability, operability, or other quality attributes explicitly.

RequirementText: The product shall interface with the ChoiceParts system once per day at approximately 1:00 AM.
AI_Rationale: Specifies an operational integration schedule (daily interface at ~1:00 AM), which concerns system operation/administration rather than internal functional details or other NFRs.

RequirementText: For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that the product must be operable in dirty and noisy repair-facility conditions, which relates to operability/operating environment requirements rather than functionality or other NFRs.

RequirementText: The product shall be able to handle 10 000 concurrent users within 2 years of the initial launch.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies the system must handle 10,000 concurrent users within two years, which is a scalability (capacity/load) constraint. It does not mention functionality, performance metrics like latency, availability, security, or other qualities explicitly.

RequirementText: The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a capacity/throughput target (average number of records per day), which concerns scalability/volume handling rather than functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Only adjusters can request recycled parts audit reports. No users without an adjuster role shall request recycled parts audits.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a role-based access restriction (only adjusters may request audits), which is a functional access control rule and also a security constraint (authorization). No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: The product shall update existing conference rooms.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (updating existing conference rooms). It does not mention any quality attributes (availability, performance, security, etc.).

RequirementText: The product will notify employees of meeting invitations.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (sending notifications of meeting invitations to employees). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: The product will record meeting acknowledgements.
AI_Rationale: Statement specifies a functional behavior: the system shall record meeting acknowledgements. No quality attributes (availability, security, performance, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: The product shall assign the organizers contact information to each meeting they create.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional behavior: system must assign organizer contact info to meetings. No non-functional quality attributes are stated.

RequirementText: The product shall have the ability to send meeting reminders to employees.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability/behavior (sending meeting reminders), which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: The product shall record meeting entries.
AI_Rationale: This is a clear functional requirement describing a capability: the product shall record meeting entries. No quality attributes (availability, performance, security, etc.) are specified.

RequirementText: The product shall ensure that the database92s data corresponds to the data entered by the user. Each conference room reservation in the system will contain the same information as was entered by the user.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies data integrity (stored data must match user-entered data), which is an integrity/security concern. Does not explicitly specify functional behavior beyond integrity, nor other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The product shall be able to display calendar dates and times according to the user92s locale. 90% of survey respondents from each target market country will find that the date and time formatting of the product is correct.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability (display dates/times by locale) and an acceptance criterion based on user survey (usability). No mention of availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, etc.

RequirementText: The language of the product shall accommodate all of the target market countries. 90% of survey respondents from each target market country will find that the language of the product is acceptable.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies that the product must accommodate languages for all target market countries and reach 90% acceptance in surveys, which is a usability requirement (user satisfaction/acceptability). It also implies supporting multiple locales/markets (ability to handle many target markets), which maps to scalability in market/locale support.

RequirementText: The product shall have the ability to receive automatic software updates as new threats emerge. 100% of customers will be able to receive automatic software updates transmitted to the installed product.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies automatic software updates to address emerging threats — a security-related capability (SE) and an aspect affecting maintainability/updates deployment (MN). It does not describe functional behavior, performance, availability, or other qualities explicitly.

RequirementText: The product and/or dependent databases/filesystems shall remain operational as a result of the input of malicious data. The product and/or dependent databases/filesystems shall not crash 100% of the time that malicious data is input into the product.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies that product and dependent databases/filesystems remain operational when malicious data is input (availability) and not crash—indicating fault tolerance/resilience. It also concerns protection against malicious input, so security is applicable. No functional behavior, performance, portability, legal, usability, look-and-feel, maintainability, operability, or scalability are explicitly implied.

RequirementText: The product shall prevent the input of malicious data. The product and/or adjacent hardware/software systems92 data shall remain 100% uncorrupted each time malicious data is input into the product.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies prevention of malicious input and ensuring data remains uncorrupted — concerns integrity and protection against attacks, which map to Security. It does not specify availability, fault-tolerance, functionality, or usability aspects explicitly.

RequirementText: The product will be able to delete conference rooms.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability (ability to delete conference rooms). No quality attributes (availability, security, performance, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: Only managers are able to perform search queries for reservations by user. 100% of all search queries for reservations by user shall be from logons of only management logons.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional restriction (only managers can perform searches) and enforces access control/logon provenance (security requirement). No mention of availability, performance, scalability, etc.

RequirementText: The product must be developed with the J2SE/J2EE programming language libraries
AI_Rationale: Specifies required development platform/libraries (J2SE/J2EE), which is an operational/implementation constraint affecting how the system is built and operated. It does not state functional behavior, performance, security, portability, etc.

RequirementText: The product shall be able to store new room equipment.
AI_Rationale: This is a clear functional requirement describing system behavior (ability to store new room equipment). No quality/constraint aspects (availability, security, performance, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: The product shall send a meeting confirmation to the meeting organizer.
AI_Rationale: This requirement describes a specific system behavior (sending a meeting confirmation to the organizer), which is functional in nature. It does not specify availability, performance, security, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: The product shall be able to delete room equipment.
AI_Rationale: This is an explicit functional requirement describing a system capability (delete room equipment). It does not mention availability, performance, security, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: The product will display an available status for unreserved conference rooms.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (displaying available status for unreserved conference rooms). It does not address availability, performance, security, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: The product shall ensure that only company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs may have product access. 100% of all logons shall be by either company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies strict access control and that all logons must be by authorized company or approved external users, which is an authentication/authorization security requirement.

RequirementText: The product shall have an intuitive user interface.
AI_Rationale: Statement pertains to ease of use and intuitiveness of the user interface, which is a usability non-functional requirement.

RequirementText: The product shall have a customizable Look and Feel.
AI_Rationale: Specifies customizable look and feel (UI appearance) which is a functional requirement describing UI capability and a Look & Feel quality. No mention of usability, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: The product shall be able to send meeting notifications via different kinds of end-user specified methods.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability (sending meeting notifications via user-specified methods), which is a functional behavior. It does not state availability, performance, security, portability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: The product will allow priviledged users to view meeting schedules in multiple reporting views.
AI_Rationale: This describes a functional capability (allow privileged users to view meeting schedules in multiple reporting views). Although it mentions 'privileged users', access control is implied but the requirement primarily specifies functionality; similar example is labeled as Functional.

RequirementText: The product shall notify building personnel of equipment transport requests.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system behavior (notify building personnel of equipment transport requests). This is a functional requirement; no quality attributes (availability, security, performance, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: The product will update existing room equipment.
AI_Rationale: Statement specifies a functional capability (updating existing room equipment). No non-functional quality attributes (availability, performance, security, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (the system shall record reserved equipment). It does not mention availability, performance, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The product shall display conference rooms according to search parameters.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (displaying conference rooms filtered by search parameters), which is a functional requirement. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: The product shall display room equipment according to search parameters.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (displaying room equipment filtered by search parameters). It does not mention non-functional aspects such as performance, security, availability, or usability.

RequirementText: The product shall record updated meeting agendas.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing a capability — the product shall record updated meeting agendas. No non-functional qualities (performance, security, availability, etc.) are specified.

RequirementText: The product shall display a map of the company building showing conference room locations.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (displaying a map with conference room locations). It does not state non-functional constraints such as availability, performance, security, usability, or others.

RequirementText: The product shall record the transportation status of equipment reserved.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a functional behavior: the product shall record transportation status of reserved equipment. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: Each time a conference room is reserved the conference room schedule shall be updated to reflect the time and date of the reservation.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (updating the conference room schedule when a reservation is made), which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: The product shall allow an organizer to invite other employees to meetings.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (organizer can invite employees to meetings). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The product shall record different meeting types.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying that the product shall record (capture/store) different meeting types. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The product shall be able to be installed in any operating environment within 2 days.
AI_Rationale: Specifies installation capability and timeframe (operability/admin tasks) and explicitly mentions any operating environment (portability requirement).

RequirementText: The product shall store new conference rooms.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional capability (storing new conference rooms). No quality attributes (availability, security, performance, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: The product shall be translated into foreign languages other than the target market countries92 languages in future releases. For each emerging target market it shall take no more than 5 days to configure the product for that market92s language.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies adding translations for many languages and a limit of 5 days to configure for a new market, which implies maintainability (ease and speed of making changes/extensions), scalability (supporting many target markets/languages), and usability (language affects user experience). It does not specify functional behavior, performance metrics like latency, security, legal, look-and-feel, portability, or operability/admin tasks explicitly.

RequirementText: The product shall allow for intuitive searching of available conference rooms.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a system capability (searching for conference rooms) -> Functional. The word 'intuitive' indicates usability/UX quality -> Usability. No mention of availability, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: The product shall use a standard navigation menu familiar to most web users.
AI_Rationale: Specifies using a familiar standard navigation menu to improve ease of use and learnability—primarily a usability requirement. No functional behavior, legal, performance, or other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.
AI_Rationale: Allows users to customize start page and view preferences, which is a usability/user experience requirement (personalization). No functional behavior beyond UI preference, and no other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: The product shall allow the user to select a chosen language from one of the target market countries.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functionality (allow user to select language) and addresses usability (user choice, internationalization). No mention of performance, availability, security, etc.

RequirementText: The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies user feedback quality with a measurable target (80% survey) — this is a usability concern and includes a measurable performance-like metric. No legal, security, availability, or other NFRs are implied.

RequirementText: The product shall be easy to use. 90% of users will be able to successfully reserve a conference room within 5 minutes of product use.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies ease of use and a measurable usability success criterion (90% of users can perform a task within 5 minutes), which is a clear usability (US) non-functional requirement. No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.
AI_Rationale: This requirement concerns user engagement and ease-of-use metrics (80% regular use after two weeks), which is a usability quality attribute. It does not specify functional behavior or other non-functional categories.

RequirementText: The product shall have a conservative and professional appearance.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly refers to appearance/aesthetics ('conservative and professional appearance'), which maps to Look & Feel (LF). No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: The product92s Look and Feel shall be able to incorporate aspects of the customer92s organization such as logo branding and identity
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly concerns the product's Look & Feel and incorporation of customer branding/identity, which maps to the LF (Look & Feel) non-functional category. No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: A database management system such as Oracle DB2 MySql or HSQL will need to be integrated with the product.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies integration with a DBMS, which concerns operability/administration (ability to connect and operate with external databases). It does not explicitly state portability, performance, availability, security, or other qualities, so only O is set.

RequirementText: The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.
AI_Rationale: Specifies required deployment technology (web/application server) and examples, which pertains to operability/administration and runtime environment rather than functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The product will require collaboration with a database management system (DBMS). The DBMS may be located on the same machine as the product or on a separate machine residing on the same computer network.
AI_Rationale: Specifies integration/operation with a DBMS and that it may be local or remote on the network — concerns operability and portability across deployment environments.

RequirementText: The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.
AI_Rationale: Specifies ability to run on any operating system with a Java runtime, which is a portability requirement. Does not mention availability, performance, security, or other qualities.

RequirementText: The product must work with most database management systems (DBMS) on the market whether the DBMS is colocated with the product on the same machine or is located on a different machine on the computer network.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies compatibility with most DBMS whether colocated or remote, which relates to portability (support across different DBMS/platforms) and operability (ability to operate with DBMS in different deployment configurations). No explicit availability, performance, security, maintainability, scalability, legal, look-and-feel, or functional behavior requirements are stated.

RequirementText: The product is expected to integrate with multiple database management systems. The product will operate with Oracle SQL Server DB2 MySQL HSQL and MS Access.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies integration with multiple DBMS (operability/administration) and compatibility across platforms (portability). No performance, security, availability, maintainability, or UI requirements are mentioned.

RequirementText: The product shall conform to the Americans with Disabilities Act.
AI_Rationale: This requirement explicitly mandates conformance to the Americans with Disabilities Act, which is a legal/regulatory compliance requirement. It does not specify functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The response shall be fast enough to avoid interrupting the user92s flow of thought. 90% of tasks shall complete within 5 seconds. 98% of tasks shall complete within 8 seconds.
AI_Rationale: Specifies response-time targets (90% within 5s, 98% within 8s) — a clear performance requirement about latency; no functional behavior or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes. After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.
AI_Rationale: Specifies user learnability and task completion within minutes (time-to-success for reserving rooms), which is a usability requirement.

RequirementText: The product shall create an exception log of problems encountered within the product for transmission to our company for analysis and resolution.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a functional capability (create an exception log and transmit it) and implies maintainability concerns (logging and reporting for analysis/resolution aids maintenance). It does not mention availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, legal, look-and-feel, operability, fault tolerance, or usability explicitly.

RequirementText: The customer shall be able to easily integrate new building maps with the product throughout the product92s lifecycle. Integration of new maps with the product shall be possible with little to no support from product support staff.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies ease of integrating new maps throughout product lifecycle with little/no support — pertains to maintainability (ease of modification/extension). No functional behavior or other quality attributes are explicitly stated.

RequirementText: Every registered user will have access to the product92s support site via the Internet. 70% of registered users shall find a solution to their problem within 5 minutes of using the support site.
AI_Rationale: The requirement states a functional capability (registered users will have access to the support site) and specifies a usability/efficiency metric (70% find a solution within 5 minutes), which is a usability/quality-of-use requirement. It does not explicitly state availability/uptime, security, look-and-feel, performance, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, fault tolerance, or legal constraints.

RequirementText: Maintenance releases will be offered to customers once a year. The releases shall take no longer than 5 minutes for 80% of the customer base to install.
AI_Rationale: Specifies release cadence and characteristics of maintenance releases (frequency => maintainability). Specifies installation time constraint for majority of customers (performance-related requirement: installation duration/latency). No functional behavior, security, availability, scalability, portability, UI, or operability aspects are explicitly required.

RequirementText: Aside from server failure the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.
AI_Rationale: Specifies target uptime (99.99%) excluding server failure; this is an availability requirement.

RequirementText: The product must be designed using Design Patterns and coding best practices. 90% of maintenance software developers are able to integrate new functionality into the product with 2 working days.
AI_Rationale: Specifies use of design patterns and coding best practices and a measurable goal for maintenance developers to integrate new functionality within 2 working days — explicitly addressing maintainability (ease of modification and understandability). No availability, performance, security, portability, scalability, usability, operability, fault-tolerance, or legal aspects are mentioned.

RequirementText: A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.
AI_Rationale: Specifies time constraints/acceptability for adding users and login within 10 minutes (performance/response metric). Does not explicitly address usability, availability, security, or other qualities.

RequirementText: The product will be available for licensing as a one-server two-five servers or five-or-more servers license.
AI_Rationale: Specifies licensing/packaging options (number of servers per license), which relates to product availability/operability and distribution/administration. Does not specify functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The product shall be available for distribution as a packaged CD.
AI_Rationale: Specifies distribution/packaging format (packaged CD), which concerns how the product is delivered and administered rather than functionality or other quality attributes—matches Operability (distribution/availability method).

RequirementText: The product must be highly configurable for use with various database management systems for the end users. 80% of end users are able to integrate new database management systems with the product without changing the product92s software code.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies configurability to work with various DBMSs and ability for end users to integrate new DBMS without code changes. This indicates portability (compatibility across platforms/environments) and maintainability (configurability reducing need to modify product code). No explicit availability, performance, security, usability, or other qualities mentioned.

RequirementText: The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies the product must interface with various email servers and send email—this concerns operability (integration/administration) and portability across server platforms. No availability, performance, security, or other quality attributes are explicitly stated.

RequirementText: The product must be able to interface with various database management systems. The product shall communicate successfully with the database management system on 100% of all transactions.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies interoperability with multiple DBMS (portability) and demands successful communication on 100% of transactions (availability/reliability). It also concerns operability/admin integration with databases. No explicit functional behavior, security, performance, scalability, maintainability, legal, look-and-feel, or usability requirements are stated.

RequirementText: The product must be able to interface with any HTML browser. The product shall transmit data between the user and the product without problems. The product shall display HTML properly in 80% of all HTML browsers tested (minimum is to test 8 browsers).
AI_Rationale: Requirement concerns interfacing with HTML browsers, proper display (look & feel), and compatibility across browsers; it also implies operability (integration/interaction) and portability across browser platforms. No security, performance, availability, or maintainability aspects are stated.

RequirementText: The product shall be used in office environments.
AI_Rationale: Specifies intended operating context/environment (office environments) which concerns operability/administration constraints rather than functionality, performance, security, etc. Matches given similar example.

RequirementText: The product shall be expected to operate for at least 5 years for each customer installation.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies expected operational lifespan per customer installation (operability/administration concern). It does not state functional behavior, performance, security, scalability, or maintainability explicitly.

RequirementText: The product shall be able to process 10 000 transactions per hour within two years of its launch. This number will increase to 20 000 by Release 2.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies target transaction processing capacity goals over time (growth targets for number of transactions per hour), which primarily addresses the system's ability to scale. It does not explicitly state performance metrics like latency or response time, nor other qualities such as availability, security, or usability, so only Scalability is marked.

RequirementText: The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.
AI_Rationale: Specifies capacity for concurrent requests and planned increase by release and handling peak times—this is a scalability requirement about growth and load handling. No functional behavior, performance metrics (latency/throughput) or other quality attributes are explicitly stated.

RequirementText: The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.
AI_Rationale: Specifies distribution/delivery method (available for distribution via Internet as binary/ZIP), which concerns operability/deployment. Does not state uptime, performance, security, portability, or UI requirements.

RequirementText: Product formula ingredients shall allow defining substitutionary ingredients.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (the system shall allow defining substitutionary ingredients). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Product formula substitutionary ingredients shall be entered automatically by the PFE subsystem.
AI_Rationale: This specifies functional behavior: the PFE subsystem shall automatically enter product formula substitutionary ingredients. No quality attribute (availability, security, performance, etc.) is implied.

RequirementText: Product shall allow entering storing and modifying product menus used by POS terminals.
AI_Rationale: This requirement describes functional capability (entering, storing, modifying product menus for POS). It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional attributes.

RequirementText: PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.
AI_Rationale: Requirement describes a functional capability (building product menus from accounting system product list). No availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: The RMS System shall have Windows XP look and feel and use GUI futures making its use intuitive.
AI_Rationale: Specifies Windows XP look-and-feel and GUI features — explicitly a look & feel requirement (LF) and aims to make use intuitive, i.e., usability (US). No functional, performance, security, or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: PME Subsystem shall allow for a product to exist in more than one submenu
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability of the PME subsystem (allowing a product to be assigned to multiple submenus). It does not mention availability, performance, security, UI/look-and-feel, maintainability, operability, portability, scalability, or legal constraints.

RequirementText: The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document based on product daily sales data and product formulas.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system behavior: generating an Inventory Quantity Adjustment document from sales data and formulas. No availability, performance, security, or other non-functional constraints are mentioned.

RequirementText: The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically when daily Product Sales data is available.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior: automatic generation of an Inventory Quantity Adjustment document triggered by available daily product sales data. It does not state availability, performance, security, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: Product formulas shall allow use of semi-products which have own formulas.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional behavior: product formulas must allow semi-products that have their own formulas. It describes what the system should do rather than a quality attribute.

RequirementText: PME Subsystem shall allow keeping submenus within menus and products within submenus in a managed and persisted order.
AI_Rationale: Specifies maintaining a managed and persisted visual/structural order of menus and submenus — this affects look & feel and usability (navigation/ordering). It does not state functional behavior beyond presentation or imply availability, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: The System shall allow entering storing and modifying product formulas.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional behavior — the system must allow entering, storing, and modifying product formulas. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: Formula substitutionary ingredients shall be kept in persisted order
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (keeping substitutionary ingredients in persisted order). It does not state availability, performance, security, UI, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: The System shall allow on demand generation of all Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents since certain point of time.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (on-demand generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents since a given time). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: The IQA subsystem shall take into account current inventory status and adjust inventory of substitutionary ingredients accordingly.
AI_Rationale: Describes a functional behavior of the IQA subsystem (taking inventory status into account and adjusting substitutionary ingredients). No non-functional concerns (availability, performance, security, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: The System shall allow for a minimum of 6 users to work at the same time.
AI_Rationale: Specifies required concurrent user capacity (minimum of 6 users simultaneously), which is a scalability/capacity requirement rather than a functional behavior or other quality attribute.

RequirementText: The System shall utilize currently owned computer equipment.
AI_Rationale: This requirement constrains deployment/operation by specifying the system must run on existing (currently owned) computer equipment, which relates to operability/manageability. It does not describe functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The System shall be able to automatically backup business data and restore them on demand.
AI_Rationale: Specifies functional capability (backup and restore) and implies fault tolerance/resilience through automatic backups and on-demand restore; no mention of availability, performance, security, or other qualities.

RequirementText: Recreation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment for the period of previous 30 days shall take no more than 30min.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional operation (recreation of inventory adjustment) with a quantitative performance constraint (completion time ≤ 30 min). No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: The System shall granularly control access rights to all major subsystems. It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.
AI_Rationale: Requirement describes fine-grained access control and assignment of access rights to subsystems, which is a security (authorization) concern. No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: The System shall meet all applicable accounting standards. The final version of the System must successfully pass independent audit performed by a certified auditor.
AI_Rationale: Requires compliance with accounting standards and independent audit by a certified auditor — this is a legal/regulatory requirement (L). The audit/pass requirement implies maintainability and traceability practices to ensure the system can be audited and certified, so Maintainability (MN) applies. No explicit functional, performance, availability, security, or other quality attributes are stated.

RequirementText: The System shall not require additional third party licenses resulting in royalty fees.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies licensing and royalty constraints on third-party components, which is a legal/compliance constraint. It does not describe functionality or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The System shall allow generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents on demand.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability: the system must allow on-demand generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents. It does not mention availability, performance, security, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies consistency of security-related changes (passwords and permissions) across the system, which is a security property (authn/authz/state propagation). No functional behavior beyond security nor other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.
AI_Rationale: Scheduled data integrity checks are primarily a maintainability activity (ensuring data quality and ease of maintenance) and address security-related integrity concerns; no functional behavior or other quality attributes are explicitly specified.

RequirementText: The website should cater to all tribes in Nigeria.
AI_Rationale: The requirement concerns inclusive design and presentation targeting all Nigerian tribes, which relates to look-and-feel (cultural/visual design) and usability (accessibility/appeal). It does not specify functional behavior, performance, security, or other NFRs.

RequirementText: The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.
AI_Rationale: Specifies installation of anti-virus software to prevent infection — a security control focused on protecting system integrity/confidentiality. No functional behavior or other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: All credit card information will be encrypted in the database.
AI_Rationale: Specifies encryption of credit card data in the database, which is a security requirement (confidentiality). No other quality attributes or functional behavior are specified.

RequirementText: All customer information will be stored on a secure database accessible only to authorized personnel.
AI_Rationale: The requirement concerns restricting access to customer information and securing the database, which is a security concern (authorization and data protection). It does not specify functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The system shall reveal private information only in compliance with the organization92s information policy.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that disclosure of private information must comply with organization’s information policy — a legal/compliance constraint and a security/confidentiality requirement. No performance, availability, UI, or other quality attributes implied.

RequirementText: The system shall notify customers of changes to its information policy.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (notify customers) — a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state availability, legal compliance, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The website shall make its user aware of its information practices before collection data from them via a Privacy Policy accessible on all pages of the website.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a functional behavior (inform users via a Privacy Policy accessible on all pages). It relates to security/privacy (SE) and affects usability (US) by requiring accessibility on all pages. No explicit availability, scalability, legal compliance, or other NFRs stated.

RequirementText: The website shall protect itself from intentional abuse and notify the administrator at all occurrences.
AI_Rationale: Requirement concerns protection from abuse (security) and notifying administrator implies operational/maintenance concern (maintainability/administration). No functional behavior, performance, or other qualities specified.

RequirementText: A customer can only stream a movie if they purchased it and are within the 2 day viewing period.
AI_Rationale: The statement defines a functional access-control rule (system must only allow streaming when purchase and time conditions are met) and implies authorization (security) enforcement. It does not mention availability, performance, legal compliance, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Only authorized personnel can access sales information.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies access restriction to authorized personnel, which is an access control/security constraint. It does not mention availability, performance, usability, legal, or other quality aspects.

RequirementText: Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies an access-control restriction (only administrators may perform activation), which is a security/authorization constraint rather than functional or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Only authorized personnel can access customer records in the database.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly restricts access to authorized personnel, which is a security (access control) requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, usability, legal, or other qualities.

RequirementText: The website shall not be offensive to religious or ethnic groups.
AI_Rationale: Requirement constrains the website's presentation/content to avoid offense, which is a look-and-feel/aesthetic requirement. No availability, security, functional or other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.
AI_Rationale: Requirement restricts purchase action to registered customers, indicating an access control/authentication constraint (security). No performance, availability, functional detail beyond access, or other quality attributes are specified.

RequirementText: The product shall be able to be installed in the specified environment within 1 working day.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies time to install the product in the specified environment (installation/admin task), which pertains to operability (ease of operating/administring). It does not mention portability, functionality, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.
AI_Rationale: Specifies staff availability hours for phone support (operational availability). Does not state functional behavior, fault tolerance, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.
AI_Rationale: This requirement describes a functional feature (providing a help section with answers/solutions). It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The system will provide a 24 hour 800 toll free number for support to its customers.
AI_Rationale: Specifies continuous (24-hour) toll-free support availability for customers, which is an availability requirement rather than functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The website shall prevent its data from being corrupted when incorrect data is entered in.
AI_Rationale: Requirement concerns preventing data corruption when incorrect/malicious input occurs — this implies fault tolerance (resilience, recovery, input validation) and security (data integrity). No explicit availability, performance, usability, etc., are mentioned.

RequirementText: The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.
AI_Rationale: Specifies the website's visual/content appeal and target audience (presentation and look-and-feel). No explicit usability, functional, performance, or other quality requirements.

RequirementText: viewing a movie details the website will display the movies description actor and director entered in by the administrator.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (display movie description, actor, director entered by administrator). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: IzognMovies shall meet the licensing requirements set forth by the appropriate organizations in order to stream African movies.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly mandates meeting licensing requirements from appropriate organizations for streaming — a legal/compliance constraint. No performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: Izogn Administrator must be able to add new products to the website within 2 minutes.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement (ability to add products). The 2-minute constraint implies performance. The phrasing about an administrator performing the task on the website implies UI/look-and-feel concerns and usability (ease/speed of use). No mention of availability, security, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, fault tolerance, or legal constraints.

RequirementText: The owner shall have free access to all of the streaming movies.
AI_Rationale: Specifies access permission for owner (availability/reachability and usability of content) and implies authorization/control (security). No functional behavior, performance, legal, or other qualities are specified.

RequirementText: Daily usage statistics should be logged and accessible by the administrator.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a functional capability (log daily usage statistics and make them accessible), and implies maintainability concerns (logging for audit/maintenance). No explicit availability, security, performance, or other NFRs are stated.

RequirementText: All registered customer information shall be stored and maintained in the database even after the customer cancels their account.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a functional behavior (data retention/persistence of customer records after account cancellation). It does not mention availability, security, legal compliance, or other quality attributes, so only Functional is set.

RequirementText: All streaming movie sales will be logged in the database and accessible by the administrator.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional requirement to log sales and make them accessible to an administrator (functionality). Implies availability/accessibility for the administrator, but does not state fault tolerance, security, or other quality concerns.

RequirementText: Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a capability (support free trial periods with configurable parameters set by a manager), which is a functional feature. It does not explicitly state availability, performance, security, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: Movies can only be streamed if the customer has purchased a movie and is within the 2-day time period to stream the movie.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional behavior/constraint (who may stream and when) — an access-control business rule. It does not explicitly specify availability, security mechanisms, legal/compliance, or other quality attributes, so only Functional is marked.

RequirementText: Pre-paid cards shall be distributed via email or via a printed paper card.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (how pre-paid cards are to be distributed — via email or printed paper). It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the 93My Account94 section of the website.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system capability—users can update billing and contact information via the My Account section. This is a functional requirement; no non-functional qualities (availability, security, usability, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: The website should use Flash to provide animation on the home page.
AI_Rationale: Specifies use of Flash for homepage animation, which is a look-and-feel/UI presentation requirement (LF). Using Flash also has operational implications (deployment, plugin management, browser support), so Operability (O) is marked. No functional behavior, performance, security, portability, scalability, maintainability, availability, or usability requirements are explicitly stated.

RequirementText: Website shall allow customers to purchase pre-paid cards of $5 $10 or $20 value either by credit card or mail-in payment option.
AI_Rationale: Describes functional behavior: allowing customers to purchase pre-paid cards with specified values and payment methods. No non-functional quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: Website shall allow the Izogn administrator to approve a review posted by a customer.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability (administrator can approve customer reviews), which is a functional behavior. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: Website shall allow customers to add their own movie review for a selected movie.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user-facing capability (adding movie reviews). No availability, performance, security, or other quality constraints are mentioned.

RequirementText: Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.
AI_Rationale: Requirement describes a functional capability: users viewing other customers' reviews for selected movies. No non-functional constraints (performance, security, availability, etc.) are specified.

RequirementText: Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing a capability (browsing movies by admin-defined categories). It does not specify availability, performance, security, UI look-and-feel, or other non-functional attributes.

RequirementText: shall be able to stream purchased movie via Windows Media Player for up to 2 days aftere purchase date.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (stream purchased movies via Windows Media Player) with a temporal constraint (up to 2 days after purchase). It describes what the system should do, not availability, performance, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Website shall request and authorize credit card payment before allowing a user to stream a movie.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system behavior: require and authorize credit card payment before allowing streaming. This is a functional requirement; it does not explicitly state security, availability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: The website will allow customers to search for movies by title actor or director.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (search by title, actor, or director). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: The PHP code will comply with PEAR standards.
AI_Rationale: PEAR coding standards are a formal compliance requirement (legal/policy) and also include security-related best practices (coding conventions that affect security), so label as Legal and Security. No explicit performance, usability, or other concerns are stated.

RequirementText: The website will comply with W3C standards.
AI_Rationale: Compliance with W3C standards is typically a legal/regulatory/standards requirement (L). It also implies adherence to web security and interoperability best practices (SE) as in provided examples; no explicit functional, performance, or usability claims are made.

RequirementText: System will allow customers to pay for a streaming movie with a pre-paid card.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability (allow customers to pay with a pre-paid card), which is functional. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: Izogn Administrator must be able to update the category listings on the website within 2 minutes.
AI_Rationale: Specifies an admin capability (functional) with a time bound (performance). Implies UI/update workflow (look & feel) and usability (quick, efficient for user). No availability, security, scalability, etc., are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional behavior: automated weekly update of the main page and displaying the 4 latest movies. No availability, performance, security, UI/look-and-feel, or other non-functional constraints are mentioned.

RequirementText: Movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams.
AI_Rationale: Specifies how movies must be encoded for particular stream bitrates—an operational/media-preparation requirement about how the system is operated/managed. Does not state functional behavior, performance metrics, security, etc.

RequirementText: The product shall retain the customer92s buying preferences and information.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability to retain/store customer buying preferences and information (Functional). It also implies improved user experience by preserving preferences (Usability). No explicit availability, performance, security, or other non-functional constraints are stated.

RequirementText: An anonymous survey will show that 95% of customers are comfortable using and purchasing pre-paid cards after a month of using the system.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies user comfort and acceptance after using the system (measurable via anonymous survey), which relates to usability. It does not specify functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: An anonymous survey will show that 70% of customers are comfortable purchasing streaming movies after 2 weeks using the website.
AI_Rationale: This requirement expresses a user satisfaction/comfort metric from an anonymous survey (usability/acceptance), not a functional behavior or other non-functional category. It specifies a usability/acceptance target (70% comfortable after 2 weeks).

RequirementText: Users should only have to navigate through a maximum of 4 pages to create an account with the website.
AI_Rationale: Specifies UI navigation constraint (maximum pages) affecting layout/flow and user experience; this is a look-and-feel/usability requirement, not functional or other NFR types.

RequirementText: The product should be able to be used by 90% of novice users on the Internet.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a usability target (90% of novice Internet users should be able to use the product). This is a usability requirement (learnability/accessibility). No functional behavior or other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: The website design should be modern clean and concise.
AI_Rationale: Specifies visual/appearance qualities of the website (modern, clean, concise), which maps to Look & Feel. No functional or other quality attributes implied.

RequirementText: The website should have an African feel but should not alienate non-Africans. The website should use animation on pages which are describing the services to grab the users attention and encourage them to sign up.
AI_Rationale: Specifies visual style ('African feel') and use of animation — clearly look & feel. The goal to grab attention and encourage sign-up implies usability/UX considerations.

RequirementText: The website shall be attractive to all audiences. The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.
AI_Rationale: Requirement addresses visual appearance and aesthetic qualities (attractive, fun, bright/vibrant colors), which maps to Look & Feel. No explicit usability, performance, availability, security, or other quality requirements mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall let administrators generate unique pre-paid pins in under 2 minutes and generate an Excel file with the generated PINs.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a functional capability (generate pre-paid PINs and Excel export) and includes a performance constraint (under 2 minutes). The time constraint implies usability concerns (administrators should complete task quickly), so labels F, PE, and US apply.

RequirementText: The product shall be easy for customers with novice skills on the Internet to purchase and watch streaming movies. Customers should be able to purchase and watch a pre-determined movie in under 3 minutes.
AI_Rationale: Specifies user-facing capability (purchase/watch) => Functional; includes time constraint (<3 minutes) => Performance; emphasizes ease for novice users => Usability. No mention of security, availability, scalability, etc.

RequirementText: System shall let Izogn Manager access sales and usage statistics in under 2 minutes.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a time constraint for accessing statistics (performance/response time). No functional details beyond access, nor other quality attributes are explicitly mentioned.

RequirementText: Promotional updates to the website should take a day to update.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a timeliness requirement for content updates (one day), which implies how maintainable/operable the content management process must be (MN). It also sets an expectation for end-user experience regarding freshness of promotional content (US). No explicit functional behavior, security, performance, availability, or other quality concerns are stated.

RequirementText: System shall let administrator add/remove movies on the website in under 5 minutes. Entered movie information will be stored in the database and will now be available on the website.
AI_Rationale: Contains a functional requirement (admin add/remove movies, stored in DB and available on site). The explicit time bound ('under 5 minutes') implies a performance/response requirement. The time constraint also targets user experience, indicating usability.

RequirementText: System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.
