AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user action and the system functionality (accessing the main menu and available menu options), so it is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state quality attributes like availability, security, usability, or look-and-feel constraints.

RequirementText: User shall input information about their child's routine care, including weight, feedings, and oxygen saturation, on the "Track Your Child" page.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user action and system functionality (entering routine care data on the 'Track Your Child' page), so it is a functional requirement. No non-functional qualities (security, performance, usability, etc.) are explicitly stated.

RequirementText: User shall be able to view the application logo and affiliate logos upon startup.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a user-facing capability to view logos (functional) and concerns the visual presentation/branding of the UI (look & feel). No indications of availability, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: User shall have access to LLU phone numbers, emails, local resources, personal contacts, and healthcare providers on the Contacts page.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (access to various contact types on the Contacts page). It does not mention availability, security/authorization, performance, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: User shall find hospital information, including email and website links, cafeteria hours, daily menu, area map, and shower availability, on the Hospital Information page.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a user-facing capability to find specific hospital information on a page, which is a functional behavior. It does not mention non-functional constraints such as performance, availability, security, usability, or others.

RequirementText: User shall toggle between English and Spanish languages using a switch located in the top right corner of every screen for enhanced accessibility.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user-facing feature (language toggle) — functional. Also mandates UI element location and appearance (top-right switch) — look & feel. Goal of enhanced accessibility implies usability requirements.

RequirementText: User shall navigate back to the previous screen using the back button located in the top left corner of every screen except the Homepage.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional behavior (navigation back to previous screen) and also prescribes UI placement (back button top-left) which affects look-and-feel and usability (easy navigation). No indications of availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, fault tolerance, maintainability, or operability requirements.

RequirementText: System shall generate alert messages for upcoming or overdue vaccination dates.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying the system behavior to generate alert messages for upcoming or overdue vaccinations. It does not mention performance, security, availability, usability, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: User shall upload images of prescriptions for illness records.
AI_Rationale: This requirement describes a user capability (uploading prescription images) which is a functional behavior. It does not specify any non-functional concerns such as security, performance, availability, usability, or others.

RequirementText: User shall add vaccination records for each child.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (adding vaccination records for each child), which is a functional behavior. It does not state availability, performance, security, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: System shall provide pop-up messages prompting profile updates for children.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional behavior the system must provide (pop-up messages prompting profile updates). It does not explicitly state availability, security, usability, UI look-and-feel, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: The system shall allow new patients to register by providing necessary personal and contact information.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying that the system must allow new patients to register and enter personal/contact information. No quality attributes such as security, availability, usability, or legal/privacy are explicitly stated.

RequirementText: The system shall validate and verify the registration details to ensure accuracy and prevent duplicate entries.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies system behavior (validate/verify registration details and prevent duplicate entries), which is functional. It does not explicitly state availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, operability, legal, look-and-feel, maintainability, fault-tolerance, or usability constraints.

RequirementText: Registered patients shall be able to log in to the portal using their credentials.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a login capability (functional). It also implies authentication/access control restricting access to registered patients (security). No quality attributes like performance, availability, usability, etc., are mentioned.

RequirementText: Patients shall have the ability to update and manage their profile information, including personal details, medical history, and insurance information.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability (patients can update/manage profile information), which is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state non-functional aspects such as security, availability, usability, or performance.

RequirementText: Patients shall be able to request appointments with healthcare providers based on their availability.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a capability the system must provide (patients requesting appointments based on provider availability), which is a functional behavior. It does not state non-functional qualities like performance, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: The system shall provide a calendar view of available appointment slots for each healthcare provider.
AI_Rationale: This is primarily a functional requirement specifying that the system must present a calendar view of appointment slots (F). It also implies a user-facing presentation that improves usability (US). It does not mention availability, security, performance, portability, scalability, maintenance, operability, legal, fault tolerance, or specific look-and-feel constraints, so those are not set.

RequirementText: Healthcare providers shall have the ability to accept, reschedule, or cancel appointments.
AI_Rationale: Specifies functional capabilities (accept, reschedule, cancel appointments) for healthcare providers. No non-functional qualities (availability, performance, security, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: Patients shall receive confirmation and reminder notifications for their scheduled appointments.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior: sending confirmation and reminder notifications to patients for scheduled appointments. It does not specify quality attributes like availability, performance, security, or usability.

RequirementText: The system shall securely store and manage patient electronic health records, including medical history, diagnoses, treatments, and lab results.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies a functional capability: storing and managing patient electronic health records (functional). It also explicitly requires that this be done securely, indicating security concerns (confidentiality/integrity), so Security is marked. No explicit mentions of availability, scalability, legal compliance, performance, portability, fault tolerance, operability, maintainability, look-and-feel, or usability.

RequirementText: Authorized healthcare providers shall have access to view and update patient EHRs.
AI_Rationale: Specifies access rights to view and update EHRs (functional capability) and restricts access to authorized healthcare providers (security / access control). No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: The system shall support the integration of external systems for importing and exporting EHR data.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a system capability (support integration of external systems for importing/exporting EHR data), which is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly state availability, security, portability, maintainability, performance, scalability, or usability constraints, so those labels are not set.

RequirementText: Healthcare providers shall have the ability to create and send electronic prescriptions to pharmacies.
AI_Rationale: This requirement describes a specific system capability (creating and sending electronic prescriptions), which is functional behavior. It does not explicitly state availability, security, legal, performance, scalability, portability, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: The system shall maintain a record of prescribed medications and dosages for each patient.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior: maintaining records of medications and dosages per patient. It does not explicitly state availability, security, performance, or other non-functional attributes.

RequirementText: Patients shall be able to view and request prescription refills through the portal.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies what users (patients) shall be able to do (view and request prescription refills) — a clear functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Patients and healthcare providers shall be able to communicate securely through the portal.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability (communication between patients and providers) and explicitly requires that communication be secure (security/confidentiality). No mention of availability, performance, usability, etc.

RequirementText: The system shall support real-time messaging and notifications for instant communication.
AI_Rationale: Requirement describes a feature (real-time messaging/notifications) — functional. It also explicitly implies low-latency/real-time performance constraints, so Performance is set. Other qualities (availability, scalability, security, usability, etc.) are not explicitly stated, so they are not marked.

RequirementText: Attachments and images shall be allowed in messages, subject to file size restrictions.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system capability (allow attachments/images in messages) with a constraint on file size. This is primarily a functional requirement; the file-size limit is not quantified as performance, security, or other NFR.

RequirementText: Patients shall have the option to make payments for services provided through the portal.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability (allow patients to make payments via the portal), which is functional. It does not explicitly state availability, security, performance, usability, legal, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: The system shall securely process online payments using standard payment gateways.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a functional capability (process online payments) and explicitly mandates security ('securely process'), so mark F and SE. No explicit mention of availability, fault tolerance, performance, portability, legal, usability, etc.

RequirementText: Healthcare providers shall have access to billing and payment history for each patient.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies who shall have access to patient billing/payment history, which is primarily an access-control/security concern. It does not state performance, availability, usability, or other quality attributes, nor additional functional behavior beyond access permission.

RequirementText: The portal shall provide a repository of informative articles, FAQs, and health tips for patients.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (providing a repository of articles/FAQs/health tips for patients). It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes explicitly.

RequirementText: The content shall be categorized and easily searchable.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a functional capability (content must be categorized) and a quality/usability concern (content should be easily searchable). No indication of availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, or legal/look-and-feel constraints.

RequirementText: Patients shall have the ability to bookmark and save their favorite resources for future reference.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (bookmark/save favorite resources), which is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly address availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: The system shall generate analytics and reports for healthcare providers, including patient demographics, appointment statistics, and EHR insights.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a system function — generating analytics and reports (patient demographics, appointment stats, EHR insights). It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, scalability, maintainability, legal, portability, fault tolerance, or look-and-feel constraints, so only Functional is marked.

RequirementText: The reports shall be accessible through a user-friendly interface and exportable in common formats.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that reports must be accessible and exportable (functional behavior) and that the interface must be user-friendly (look & feel/usability). No mention of availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, maintainability, or fault tolerance.

RequirementText: The healthcare portal shall be accessible and optimized for mobile devices, ensuring a seamless user experience across different screen sizes and orientations.
AI_Rationale: Requirement focuses on mobile accessibility and optimization across screen sizes/orientations, which implies UI/look-and-feel (responsive layout), usability (seamless user experience), and compatibility across device platforms (portability). No mention of performance, security, availability, or maintainability.

RequirementText: The user interface shall be responsive, adapting to various devices and browsers.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies the user interface must be responsive and adapt to various devices and browsers, which directly concerns UI appearance/behavior (Look & Feel) and cross-platform/browser compatibility (Portability). It does not explicitly state usability, performance, availability, security, or other concerns.

RequirementText: The healthcare portal shall employ industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect patient data from unauthorized access.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly mandates encryption and security measures to protect patient data from unauthorized access, which is a security (confidentiality/integrity) concern. It does not mention availability, fault tolerance, legal compliance, usability, performance, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User authentication shall be implemented using strong password policies and, optionally, additional authentication factors.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that user authentication must be implemented (functional behavior) and mandates strong password policies and multi-factor options, which are security requirements.

RequirementText: Access controls shall be enforced to ensure that only authorized users can view and modify patient data.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies enforcement of access controls to restrict viewing and modification of patient data, which is a security (authz/authn) requirement. It does not explicitly state functional behavior beyond security controls or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The system shall be capable of handling a large number of simultaneous users without significant performance degradation.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly addresses handling many simultaneous users and avoiding performance degradation, which pertains to performance (throughput/latency) and scalability. No mention of other concerns.

RequirementText: Response times for critical operations, such as appointment scheduling and EHR access, shall meet acceptable benchmarks.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly specifies response times for operations shall meet benchmarks, which is a performance (timing/latency) concern. It does not mention availability, scalability, security, or functional details beyond naming operations, so only Performance is set.

RequirementText: The healthcare portal shall have high availability, with minimal downtime for scheduled maintenance and updates.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly specifies 'high availability' and 'minimal downtime for scheduled maintenance and updates', which directly concerns system availability. It does not specify fault tolerance, maintainability, operability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The system shall include backup and disaster recovery mechanisms to safeguard against data loss.
AI_Rationale: Specifies backup and disaster recovery mechanisms—this is a functional capability (system shall include) and primarily addresses fault tolerance/data resilience. No explicit availability, security, or other quality constraints mentioned.

RequirementText: The user interface shall be intuitive, user-friendly, and accessible to users with varying levels of technical expertise.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies the user interface should be intuitive, user-friendly, and accessible to users with varying technical expertise, which directly concerns usability (learnability, ease of use, accessibility). It does not specify functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Clear instructions and tooltips shall be provided where necessary to guide users through different features and processes.
AI_Rationale: Specifies user guidance via instructions and tooltips to aid interaction — a usability requirement focused on helping users learn and use features. No explicit functional, performance, security, or other quality attributes mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall store the starting, closing, intraday high, and intraday low of a stock in the database.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a concrete system action: storing specific stock values (opening, closing, intraday high/low) in the database. It is a functional requirement; it does not specify availability, security, performance, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall save the dividend released by each company for client information.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability: the user shall save dividend information for clients. It does not state availability, security, performance, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: User shall display a tabular representation of the current stock value, highest and lowest values recorded, and the P/E ratio.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system behavior to display stock data (functional) and explicitly mandates a tabular representation (layout/look & feel). No indications of other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall plot a graphical representation of time versus stock value using closing rates.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying a feature: plotting a time vs. stock value chart using closing rates. It does not state quality attributes like performance, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: System shall validate Client ID format as AADDMMYYYY99 and reject other formats immediately.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a concrete system behavior: validate Client ID format and reject other formats immediately. This is a functional requirement about input validation. No explicit availability, security, usability, or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall dissolve details from both tables into a single form or make them accessible from one form.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional behavior (combine or link table details into one form). It also implies usability improvement (making information accessible from a single form). No explicit constraints about performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: System shall validate Client ID format as AADDMMYYYY99 before proceeding.
AI_Rationale: This is an input validation requirement specifying functional behavior (validate Client ID format) rather than an availability, performance, security, or other non-functional constraint.

RequirementText: System shall use the current stock value in calculations.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior — which data (current stock value) the system must use in calculations. It does not mention availability, performance, security, UI, maintainability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: User shall calculate transaction amount by multiplying shares by current stock rate.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (calculate transaction amount = shares * current stock rate). It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: User shall determine brokerage by multiplying transaction amount by brokerage percentage.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a concrete functional behavior (calculation of brokerage = transaction amount * brokerage percentage). It does not state any non-functional quality such as availability, performance, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: User shall provide an option to set and update brokerage percentage.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing that the system must provide an option for users to set and update a brokerage percentage. No quality attributes (availability, security, performance, etc.) are explicitly stated or strongly implied.

RequirementText: User shall validate Client name to include only alphabets and spaces, rejecting inputs with numbers or other ASCII characters.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying input validation behavior (what the system should do): allow only letters and spaces for Client name and reject other characters. No explicit non-functional concerns are stated.

RequirementText: User shall establish Address of Communication using four lines, each 25 characters long, for house name/number, street name/place, and state.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a functional capability (user shall establish an address) and also prescribes presentation/format constraints (four lines, each 25 characters) which relates to look-and-feel/layout. No implication of availability, security, performance, portability, scalability, maintainability, operability, or usability beyond layout.

RequirementText: User shall validate PAN card number format as AAAA9999A, with first five characters as letters, followed by four digits, and ending with a letter.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a concrete system behavior (input validation of PAN format AAAA9999A), which is functional. It does not mention availability, security, performance, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall specify bank details for issuing cheques obtained from selling stocks.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (specify bank details for issuing cheques) describing what the system should do. It does not mention availability, security, performance, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall utilize Client ID and Demat account number for quick data retrieval.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional requirement: the system shall use Client ID and Demat account number to retrieve data (search/retrieval behavior). It does not specify availability, security, performance metrics, or UI/usability details, so other non-functional labels are not justified.

RequirementText: System shall lock databases to protect sensitive client information from intrusion and unauthorized modifications.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies an action (system shall lock databases) — functional — with the explicit goal of protecting sensitive client information from intrusion and unauthorized modification, which is a security concern. No mention of availability, legal compliance, performance, scalability, portability, etc.

RequirementText: Administrator shall have exclusive editing access to databases.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies role-based exclusive editing access (authorization) to databases, which is a security access-control constraint. It does not specify availability, performance, UI, or other qualities.

RequirementText: Authorization login shall be required when the software starts.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that a login/authorization is required at startup — this is a security requirement (authentication/authorization) and also describes a functional behavior (requirement to prompt/login at start). No mention of availability, performance, usability, etc.

RequirementText: Access to client details shall require Client ID for data protection.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies that access to client details requires a Client ID for data protection, which is an access control/authentication constraint. This is a security requirement (confidentiality/access control). It does not specify availability, performance, usability, or other non-functional categories.

RequirementText: System shall ensure that transactions reflect accurately in databases without any data loss.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies that transactions must be accurately reflected in databases without data loss — this describes a functional behavior (ensuring transaction handling) and a fault-tolerance/durability constraint (no data loss). It does not mention availability, security, performance, or other qualities explicitly.

RequirementText: There shall be no data loss or loss of data integrity during share buying or selling transactions.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies no data loss or loss of data integrity during share transactions. This is primarily an integrity/security concern (SE). It also implies transactional behavior of the system (functional context) and resilience/durability to faults (FT). Other quality attributes are not explicitly implied.

RequirementText: Stock Master shall be reusable and extendable to other exchanges or stock types.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies reusability and extendability to other exchanges/stock types, which are qualities of maintainability (ease of modification/extension) and portability (ability to be used in different environments/domains). No functional behavior or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: Testing of Stock Master shall include traversing all forms, stress testing, and Authorization tests.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies types of testing: 'Authorization tests' directly map to security (SE). 'Stress testing' concerns system performance under load, so performance (PE) is applicable. Other quality attributes (availability, fault tolerance, scalability, usability, etc.) are not explicitly mentioned, so they are not set.

RequirementText: System shall offer a registration form for users.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies a functional capability (providing a registration form) which is a functional requirement. No quality attributes (security, usability, performance, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: Users shall input a unique username.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a functional behavior/requirement: users must provide a unique username. It defines what the system must enforce (uniqueness constraint) rather than availability, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: Users shall provide a valid email address.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying that users must supply a valid email address (input validation). It does not explicitly state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: Users shall set a secure password complying with password constraints.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that users must set passwords (functional capability) and mandates secure password constraints, which is a security requirement about authentication/credentials.

RequirementText: Upon submission, the system shall validate and check for duplicate or invalid entries.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a functional behavior (validate and check duplicates/invalid entries) and implies data integrity/confidentiality concerns (security) similar to example mapping. No explicit availability, performance, scalability, portability, operability, legal, UI, or maintainability aspects are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall present users with a clear login interface requiring username/email and password inputs.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a system behavior (present a login interface) = Functional. It specifies that users must provide username/email and password, which implies authentication/security concerns = Security. Describing the interface as "clear" implies usability concerns (clarity, ease of use) = Usability. No explicit mentions of availability, performance, portability, scalability, maintainability, fault tolerance, operability, or legal requirements.

RequirementText: The login interface shall include a "Forgot Password?" link.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a UI element to be present on the login interface (a 'Forgot Password?' link). This is a look-and-feel / interface requirement rather than an operational, performance, security, or maintenance constraint.

RequirementText: System shall cross-verify entered credentials with the stored user database.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (verifying entered credentials against stored user database) — functional. It also concerns authentication/security of user credentials, so it implies Security. No explicit statements about availability, performance, portability, etc.

RequirementText: Upon successful login, the system shall create a secure session for the user.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a system behavior (create a session upon login) — functional. The adjective 'secure' explicitly implies security concerns (session confidentiality/integrity), so Security is applicable. No explicit availability, performance, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, legal, look-and-feel, or usability requirements are stated.

RequirementText: Users shall remain authenticated until they choose to log out.
AI_Rationale: Specifies authentication/session management policy (users remain authenticated until they log out), which is a security requirement about authn/session handling rather than functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: After registration, users shall be directed to a profile customization page.
AI_Rationale: This specifies functional behavior (post-registration navigation to a profile customization page). It also implies a usability concern (user flow/experience) by directing users to customize their profile immediately.

RequirementText: Users shall input their date of birth, address, and phone number.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (that users shall input specific personal data). It does not state any non-functional constraints such as availability, performance, security, usability, etc., so only the Functional label is set.

RequirementText: System shall provide the option to link social media accounts for easier sharing and connectivity.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing a feature (link social media accounts). It also mentions 'easier sharing and connectivity', which implies an improvement to usability.

RequirementText: Users shall add specific stocks to their portfolio.
AI_Rationale: This is a clear functional requirement specifying that users can add specific stocks to their portfolio. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: Users shall view a list of their stocks, including current price, change percentage, and total value.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability: presenting a list of the user's stocks with specific data fields (current price, change percentage, total value). It does not specify availability, performance, UI styling, security, or other non-functional properties.

RequirementText: Users shall update the number of shares for each stock in their portfolio.
AI_Rationale: This describes a functional behavior: users must be able to update the number of shares in their portfolio. No quality/constraint about availability, performance, security, usability, etc., is specified.

RequirementText: Users shall remove stocks from their portfolio.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (allow users to remove stocks from their portfolio). It does not mention availability, security, performance, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: System shall present users with updated stock prices, percentage changes, and volume for the current day.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior: presenting updated stock prices, percentage changes, and volume to users for the current day. It does not explicitly state availability, performance, UI look-and-feel, security, scalability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: Users shall view trending and new stocks on a weekly basis.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability — users shall be able to view trending and new stocks (functional). The 'weekly basis' indicates the period of content (timing), not an availability, security, or maintenance constraint, so no other NFR labels are implied.

RequirementText: Users shall be displayed prominent stock market indices like the S&P500 and NASDAQ.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a display behavior (functional) and calls for these indices to be shown 'prominent', which is a presentation/look-and-feel concern. No indications of availability, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: Users shall search for specific stocks using stock symbols or company names.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (search by stock symbol or company name). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: Users shall purchase stocks, specifying the number of shares and order type (e.g., market order, limit order).
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability: users can purchase stocks and provide parameters (share count and order type). No availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints are stated.

RequirementText: Users shall sell their stocks for successful trade.
AI_Rationale: Defines a functional capability: users must be able to sell their stocks to complete a trade. No quality attributes (performance, security, usability, etc.) are specified.

RequirementText: System shall provide real-time price updates.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability (providing price updates) and a real-time quality constraint implying performance (latency) and scalability considerations for timely delivery; no mention of availability, security, portability, etc.

RequirementText: Users shall view a detailed log of all their past trades, including date, price, and quantity.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a system capability (provide/view a detailed log of past trades with date, price, quantity), i.e., a functional requirement. No quality constraints (performance, security, usability, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: Filtering options by date, instrument, or trade type shall be available.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a feature (availability of filtering options by date, instrument, or trade type), which is functional. It does not explicitly address non-functional aspects like availability, usability, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: Users shall specify a timeframe (e.g., one day, one week, one month) for forecasts.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (ability to specify forecast timeframe), which is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly state quality attributes such as usability, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: System shall display a prediction graph based on the user-selected timeframe.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior: presenting a prediction graph filtered by a user-selected timeframe. It describes functionality (what the system shall do). It does not mention availability, performance, security, look-and-feel, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Past data up to the present date shall be available for context.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies functional behavior: historical data must be available up to present date for context. It describes what the system should provide, not availability/uptime, performance, security, or other NFRs.

RequirementText: The system shall highlight and provide a numerical value for the predicted price of the next trading day.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a system behavior (display/highlight and show a numerical predicted price) — functional. It also prescribes presentation (highlighting), which relates to look & feel. No explicit performance, availability, security, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, or usability quality constraints are stated.

RequirementText: Stockify shall achieve a two-second response time for user requests under normal load conditions.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a quantitative response-time requirement (two-second response under normal load), which is a performance-related quality attribute. It does not specify availability, scalability, security, usability, or other categories.

RequirementText: The system shall support concurrent user access without experiencing performance degradation.
AI_Rationale: Specifies support for concurrent users without performance degradation, which directly concerns performance (latency/throughput) and scalability (handling growing concurrency). No mention of other qualities.

RequirementText: User data, especially sensitive financial details, shall be encrypted both in transit and at rest.
AI_Rationale: Specifies encryption of sensitive financial data in transit and at rest, which is a security (confidentiality/integrity) requirement.

RequirementText: Security audits shall be conducted quarterly to identify potential vulnerabilities.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies conducting security audits to identify vulnerabilities, which directly concerns security practices (SE). It does not specify functional behavior, availability, fault tolerance, legal, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The system shall implement comprehensive security measures to safeguard users from harm.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly calls for comprehensive security measures to safeguard users, which directly maps to Security (SE). It does not specify availability, fault tolerance, functional behavior beyond security, or other quality attributes, so other labels are not set.

RequirementText: Stockify shall seamlessly integrate with various external news sources, stock exchanges, and other financial APIs.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies interoperability with external systems (integration with news sources, exchanges, APIs), which concerns operability and platform compatibility/portability. It does not specify functional behavior details, performance, security, availability, or other NFRs.

RequirementText: The system shall react to user input for routine activities in two seconds or less.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional behavior (react to user input) with a quantitative timing constraint (response time ≤ 2 seconds), indicating a performance requirement.

RequirementText: The system shall maintain reaction times of less than 5 seconds even under heavy loads.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a quantitative response-time requirement (<5s) which is a performance constraint (PE). The phrase 'even under heavy loads' implies scalability/resilience to load (SC). Response-time requirements also impact perceived usability/responsiveness (US). No functional behavior or other qualities are specified.

RequirementText: User data will be encrypted using industry-standard encryption algorithms, including payment information and personal data.
AI_Rationale: Specifies encryption of user, payment and personal data using industry-standard algorithms, which is a security requirement (confidentiality). No mention of availability, performance, scalability, legal, or other qualities.

RequirementText: Only authorized workers will be able to access the administrative panel.
AI_Rationale: Specifies access restriction to the administrative panel for authorized workers — an access control/security requirement (authentication/authorization). No availability, performance, usability, or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: The system will offer defense against widespread online vulnerabilities like cross-site scripting (XSS) and SQL injection.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly addresses defense against security vulnerabilities (XSS, SQL injection), which is a security (SE) concern. No explicit mentions of availability, performance, usability, etc.

RequirementText: User experience (UX) design best practices will be adhered to by the user interface.
AI_Rationale: This requirement mandates adherence to UX design best practices, which primarily targets usability (US). It also implies visual/interface design considerations (Look & Feel, LF). No other quality areas (security, performance, etc.) are specified.

RequirementText: User shall be able to change perspective and orientation through a touch scroll bar, serving as the central mechanic of the game.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user-facing capability (functional). Describes UI interaction (touch scroll bar) and central mechanic, implying look-and-feel and usability concerns (interaction design and user experience). No indications of availability, performance, security, portability, scalability, maintainability, operability, or legal requirements.

RequirementText: User shall be able to perform sudden movements upward from solid ground, as a necessary movement mechanic.
AI_Rationale: This describes a system capability/behavior (a movement mechanic) that the user must be able to perform, i.e., a functional requirement. It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: System shall identify areas triggering the restart of the level, whether encompassing stage boundaries or spike-like traps.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a functional behavior: the system must identify areas that trigger level restarts (stage boundaries or traps). It does not state availability, performance, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Upon starting up the application, the first viewable screen shall contain buttons for play game options.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies the UI layout and controls on the initial screen (presence and placement of play buttons), which pertains to look-and-feel and usability. It does not state availability, performance, security, portability, etc.

RequirementText: In-game option to halt gameplay shall be provided, allowing access to fields displayed on the title screen.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional feature: an in-game option to halt gameplay and access title-screen fields. No availability, security, performance, or other non-functional constraints are stated.

RequirementText: User shall be able to connect via IP address.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user capability (ability to connect using an IP address), which is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly impose availability, security, portability, performance, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: User shall be able to start a game once two users are connected.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (ability to start a game when two users are connected). It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: User shall be given the choice of playing single or multiplayer.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a user-facing capability (choice between single-player and multiplayer), which is a functional requirement. It does not state availability, performance, security, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: Each user shall select different modes and maps.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a user-facing capability (ability to select modes and maps), which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: A stable internet connection shall be required for the player.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies a requirement about the need for a stable internet connection (system availability/connectivity). It does not describe fault tolerance, functionality, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: A player will be able to quit the game at any time.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (players can quit the game at any time). It does not mention availability, performance, usability, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Quitting will end the game immediately.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system behavior: quitting triggers immediate game end. No quality attributes (availability, performance, security, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: In games, players shall be able to peek, fire, view maps, use vehicles, revive others, and use emotes for conversation.
AI_Rationale: Specifies concrete game capabilities players shall have (peek, fire, view maps, use vehicles, revive, emotes) — these are functional requirements. No non-functional constraints (performance, usability, security, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: User shall be able to render the scene at a minimum of 30 frames per second.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that the user must be able to render a scene (functional) with a quantitative performance requirement of minimum 30 frames per second (performance). No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to complete matchmaking in less than 3 minutes.
AI_Rationale: The requirement states a user action (complete matchmaking) so it includes a functional aspect. The explicit time bound (<3 minutes) is a performance/response-time quality constraint, so PE is set. It does not explicitly address usability, availability, security, scalability, or other categories.

RequirementText: User shall be able to load the game within 1 minute on subsequent visits, benefiting from cache optimization.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a user capability to load the game (functional) with an explicit time bound of 1 minute on subsequent visits and mentions cache optimization, which is a performance-related quality constraint. No aspects of availability, security, portability, scalability, etc., are stated.

RequirementText: System shall be able to ensure that the time elapsed between a player making a move and other players updating the game state is under 5 seconds.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a strict maximum time (under 5 seconds) for state updates after a player move, which is a performance/response-time requirement. Does not describe functional behavior beyond timing, nor explicitly address usability, availability, scalability, or other qualities.

RequirementText: System shall be able to provide a visual response to user input within 100 milliseconds.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a timing constraint for the system's visual response (response within 100 ms), which is a performance (timing/latency) requirement. It does not state functional behavior, legal, security, or other quality attributes explicitly.

RequirementText: User shall find the Gambler Agent application's client side very easy to use and enjoyable, with a simple interface allowing newcomers to quickly start playing.
AI_Rationale: Requirement focuses on ease of use, enjoyability and a simple interface for newcomers — primarily usability (US). Mention of a 'simple interface' and 'enjoyable' implies look & feel (LF). No functional, performance, security, availability, or other qualities are specified.

RequirementText: System shall ensure reliability by storing user accounts in the database, preventing users from suffering from errors and maintaining consistent data.
AI_Rationale: The requirement prescribes storing user accounts in the database (functional behavior) and emphasizes reliability, preventing errors and maintaining consistent data (fault tolerance/reliability). Ensuring data corresponds and remains consistent implies data integrity concerns, which map to Security (integrity) in the given labeling examples. No mention of availability, performance, scalability, portability, maintainability, legality, look-and-feel, operability, or usability.

RequirementText: System shall ensure availability by implementing precautions against server failures, such as checkpoints and regular backups, to maintain a stable state for users.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly targets system availability and describes precautions against server failures (checkpoints, regular backups) which are fault-tolerance measures to maintain stable state for users; no other quality attributes or functional behavior are specified.

RequirementText: System shall guarantee security by not sharing or selling any personal information to third-party companies.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies privacy/legal constraint (no sharing/selling personal information to third parties) which implies security/privacy controls and legal/compliance obligations. It does not address availability, performance, usability, etc.

RequirementText: System shall ensure maintainability by designing a flexible structure that allows for easy integration of new functionalities.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly states maintainability and designing for easy integration of new functionalities, which is a maintainability concern. It does not specify functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall ensure portability by enabling access to the Gambler Agent application from any platform, as it is an online game application.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly states portability/access from any platform (portability). Similar example labeled both Portability and Operability; enabling access from any platform also implies operational/manageability concerns, so Operability is set.

RequirementText: User shall initiate the play function by selecting the play icon, transitioning the menu screen to the play game screen.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user action (select play icon) and resulting behavior (transition to play game screen), which is a functional requirement. No explicit non-functional qualities (performance, availability, UI aesthetics, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: System shall match the player with another player upon selection of the play icon.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (match a player with another when play icon is selected). It does not state availability, performance, security, UI look-and-feel, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Upon finding a matched user, the ingame screen shall prompt the matched user's name.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (when a match is found, the in-game screen shall prompt the matched user's name), which is a functional requirement. It does not state availability, performance, security, UI aesthetics, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: Once the prompt disappears, the game shall start in the ingame screen with a two-dimensional environment where all objects rest on the ground.
AI_Rationale: Primarily a functional requirement specifying the behavior/state transition (start game, show ingame screen, 2D environment where objects rest on ground). It also includes presentation/layout details about the visual environment, so Look & Feel is marked. No indication of availability, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: Characters in the ingame screen shall be able to move in up, down, right, and left directions.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a game capability (characters must be able to move in four directions), which is functional behavior rather than a quality/non-functional constraint.

RequirementText: User shall be able to drag the chosen object and rotate the chosen mirror in the ingame screen.
AI_Rationale: Specifies user actions (drag and rotate) in the in-game screen — clearly a functional requirement. Also impacts user interaction/usability (direct manipulation), so US is included. No mention of availability, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: Only enlightened places shall be visible in the ingame screen.
AI_Rationale: This sentence specifies a functional constraint on system behavior (what shall be visible in the in-game screen). It does not state availability, security, performance, usability, or other quality attributes explicitly.

RequirementText: Movement shall be facilitated by touching the respective buttons (up, down, left, right) for character movement, with interruptions if there is no light at the destination or if the movement path is blocked.
AI_Rationale: Specifies how character movement is to be performed and conditions that interrupt movement — a functional behavior requirement. No explicit non-functional aspects (performance, availability, security, usability quality metrics) are stated.

RequirementText: Objects shall be chosen by touching them once in the ingame screen, with the selected object brightened and distinct from others.
AI_Rationale: Defines a user interaction (single-touch selection) => Functional. Specifies visual treatment (brightened, distinct) => Look & Feel. Impacts ease of use (single-tap selection, clear feedback) => Usability. No implications of other NFRs.

RequirementText: Each object shall have its own allowed operations, such as rotating mirrors or firing the torch.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional behavior: each object must expose/define its allowed operations (examples given). It does not state availability, security, performance, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: The torch will be able to be fired up by touching it, and objects will be able to be dropped by leaving them at their initial place.
AI_Rationale: Both clauses specify system behaviors (how the torch is activated by touch and how objects are dropped by leaving them), which are functional requirements. No non-functional quality attributes are stated.

RequirementText: Upon touching the how to play button on the menu screen, the how to play screen shall be displayed, and users shall be able to see screenshots of tutorial screens by sliding the windows.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies concrete system behavior (displaying the how-to-play screen and allowing users to view/touch-slide screenshots) — thus Functional. It also prescribes an interactive UI behavior that affects ease of use (sliding to view tutorial screens), so it implies Usability. No explicit non-functional qualities like performance, security, availability, portability, scalability, maintainability, operability, or legal constraints are stated.

RequirementText: The game shall be closed upon user interaction with the exit icon or the phone's back buttons.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional behavior: closing the game in response to user interaction with exit icon or back button. Does not state non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: Choosing the option button from the menu screen shall display the options screen, where users can adjust game music and sounds using horizontal sliders, and change their nicknames from the textbox.
AI_Rationale: Specifies system behavior (display options screen and enable adjustments) — functional. Also describes UI controls (horizontal sliders, textbox) which concerns look-and-feel. No mention of other quality attributes.

RequirementText: In the ingame screen, users can choose emote buttons by touching them, and upon selection, the chosen emote shall be displayed to the other user.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior: allowing users to select emote buttons via touch and displaying the chosen emote to the other user. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns explicitly.

RequirementText: User shall be able to pause the game by touching the pause button, which shall immediately display the pause screen, and the game shall be continued when any player touches the resume button in the pause screen.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional behavior (pause/resume game interactions and UI screen display). It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: User shall be informed about system failures through error messages displayed on the main screen.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (display error messages on the main screen) — a functional requirement. It also concerns informing users, which relates to usability/UX. It does not specify availability, fault recovery, security, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: System shall ensure availability 24/7, informing users and preventing them from continuing in case of unexpected failures.
AI_Rationale: Specifies 24/7 availability (Availability). Requires handling unexpected failures by notifying users and preventing further actions (Fault tolerance / graceful degradation). Explicitly mentions informing users, which relates to Usability (user feedback). No mention of security, performance, scalability, portability, etc.

RequirementText: Security concerns are mitigated as Light My Way doesn't create user profiles or access credentials.
AI_Rationale: The requirement describes a security/privacy mitigation (no user profiles or credentials), so it is a security-related non-functional requirement. No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: Documentation for all system modules shall be provided for maintainability.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly states documentation shall be provided for maintainability, directly addressing maintainability concerns. It does not specify functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Requirement and change management shall be utilized during the development phase.
AI_Rationale: Mandating requirement and change management practices during development targets the ease of future modification, traceability, and maintainability of the system rather than functional behavior or runtime qualities; thus it maps to Maintainability.

RequirementText: Light My Way shall exclusively run on Android OS without cross-platform compatibility.
AI_Rationale: Specifies the target operating system and excludes cross-platform compatibility, which is a portability/platform constraint. No other quality attributes (availability, security, operability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall easily navigate the system with a simple web page design, ensuring accessibility for all users.
AI_Rationale: Specifies simple web page design (Look & Feel) and that users can easily navigate / accessibility for all users (Usability). No explicit availability, security, legal compliance, performance, or other concerns mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall facilitate quick access to desired content, enabling users to find what they are looking for effortlessly.
AI_Rationale: The requirement focuses on enabling users to find content effortlessly (usability). It also explicitly mentions "quick access," which implies performance/response-time considerations.

RequirementText: System shall execute recipe searches and recommendations swiftly to enhance performance and user experience.
AI_Rationale: Specifies functional behavior (searches and recommendations) and explicitly requires them to be swift (performance). Also mentions improving user experience, implying usability. No mention of availability, security, scalability, portability, etc.

RequirementText: System shall prioritize speed in performing actions such as searching for recipes and providing recommendations.
AI_Rationale: Requirement is a quality constraint explicitly about prioritizing speed (latency/performance) for actions like searching and recommendations. It does not specify functional behavior, availability, security, or other NFRs.

RequirementText: System shall implement robust security measures to protect users' personal information, ensuring user data confidentiality and integrity.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly mandates protection of personal information, confidentiality and integrity—this is a security (SE) requirement. It does not specify availability, legal compliance, performance, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall easily find what they are looking for on the website, with a simple web design ensuring ease of use.
AI_Rationale: Specifies ease of finding information and simple web design—addresses usability (ease of use, findability) and look & feel (simple design). No functional, performance, security, or other non-functional aspects are mentioned.

RequirementText: All functions, particularly complex ones, shall undergo thorough testing to ensure usability.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly mandates testing to ensure usability of functions, which maps directly to the Usability (US) non-functional category. It does not specify availability, security, performance, maintainability, look-and-feel, or other quality attributes, so those are not marked.

RequirementText: The system's response time to users and various time measurements, such as refresh time, shall be optimized for efficiency.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly concerns response time and time measurements being optimized for efficiency, which is a performance concern. It does not specify availability, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Users' personal information shall be securely stored and kept confidential within the system.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies secure storage and confidentiality of personal information, which is a security (confidentiality/integrity) concern. It does not specify availability, performance, legal, usability, or other quality attributes, nor functional behavior beyond the security constraint.

RequirementText: User shall be able to input a correct last watched title string and validate its presence.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability to input a title string and validate its presence—this is a functional requirement describing system behavior, with no explicit non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: User shall be able to retrieve the correct genre from their title or from a list of genres.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user action/functional capability—retrieving the correct genre by title or from a list—so it is a functional requirement. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: User shall be able to process data, reloading if necessary, and accurately handle attributes for recommendations.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a user capability to process data and handle attributes for recommendations (functional). The phrase 'reloading if necessary' implies resilience/recovery behavior (fault tolerance). No explicit mentions of availability, performance, scalability, security, usability, or others.

RequirementText: User shall be able to receive predictions as top 5 recommendations relevant to their data.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional capability: the system must provide predictions as the top-5 recommendations relevant to a user's data. No explicit non-functional constraints (performance, availability, security, usability, etc.) are mentioned, so only Functional is marked.

RequirementText: User shall be able to maintain data by implementing the latest model and performing regular updates for new titles.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a user capability to maintain data and perform updates (functional). It also explicitly references implementing updates/ latest models, which relates to maintainability (process of updating/keeping system current). No mention of availability, security, performance, etc.

RequirementText: System shall be able to provide general recommendations based on recent trends through administrative functions.
AI_Rationale: Requirement describes a system capability/function — providing recommendations via administrative functions. No explicit non-functional constraints (performance, security, availability, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: User shall be able to input correct last watched title string with validation for its presence.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability (input last watched title) and input validation (presence check). This is a functional requirement describing behavior; no explicit non-functional concerns (availability, security, usability, etc.) are indicated.

RequirementText: System shall be able to retrieve the correct genre from the user's title or from a list of genres.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability/action (retrieving the correct genre from a title or a list), which is functional behavior. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: User shall be able to process data, with reloading if necessary, and accurately handle attributes for recommendations.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies a user capability to process data and handle attributes for recommendations, which describes functional behavior. It does not explicitly specify non-functional qualities like availability, performance, scalability, security, usability, or maintainability; 'reloading if necessary' is an implementation detail for functionality rather than a clear fault-tolerance or operability requirement.

RequirementText: System shall be able to make predictions as top 5 recommendations relevant to the user's data.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a system capability/behavior — producing top-5 recommendations/predictions relevant to user data — which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, scalability, UI, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: User shall be able to maintain data by implementing the latest model and regular updates for new titles.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability to maintain/update data (functional). Also implies maintainability/updates processes (ease of updating/keeping models current), so MN is applicable. No explicit availability, security, performance, etc.

RequirementText: System shall be able to provide general recommendations based on recent trends.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability: the system must provide recommendations (behavior) based on recent trends. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Performance of making recommendations and updating them in real-time is crucial, requiring seamless processing to ensure users do not notice data processing.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly stresses real-time, seamless processing and that users should not notice processing — this is primarily a performance/latency requirement (PE). The phrase about users not noticing implies responsiveness and user experience, so Usability (US) is also relevant. Other NFRs are not implied.

RequirementText: System shall update recommendations at the end of listening to a track or after purchasing a track, aiming for real-time functionality.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a behavior: updating recommendations after listening or purchase (functional). It also states 'aiming for real-time functionality', which is a performance/latency constraint, so PE is set. No explicit mention of availability, scalability, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The database must be securely accessed and its data integrity maintained, especially considering the presence of personal user information.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly mandates secure access and maintenance of data integrity, which are security concerns (SE). Mentioning personal user information implies privacy/compliance considerations, supporting a legal/regulatory aspect (L). It does not specify uptime, fault tolerance, performance, portability, UI, or maintainability activities, so other labels are not set.

RequirementText: System shall ensure that database data remains intact and is only modified through authorized updates.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies protecting database integrity and restricting modifications to authorized updates, which concerns security (access control and data integrity). It does not describe functionality, performance, availability, or other NFRs explicitly.

RequirementText: The product shall encompass a broad scope, providing music streaming and downloadable web applications accessible to users of all ages.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies functionality: providing music streaming and downloadable web applications (Functional). The phrase 'accessible to users of all ages' indicates a usability/accessibility concern (Usability). No explicit statements about availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, legal compliance, or other qualities.

RequirementText: Users from every age group shall find the music streaming and downloading web application easy to navigate and use.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly states ease of navigation and use for users of all ages, which is a usability quality. No mention of performance, availability, security, maintainability, portability, scalability, look-and-feel specifics, or functional behavior.

RequirementText: The system, designed as a web service, shall ensure portability to facilitate integration across various platforms within enterprise applications.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly states portability to facilitate integration across various platforms, which directly maps to Portability. It does not specify availability, security, performance, scalability, or other qualities.

RequirementText: User shall be able to register or sign up, providing necessary information.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing a user action (registration/sign-up). It does not specify any non-functional qualities like performance, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: The system shall require users to enter correct credentials for authentication.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies authentication (users must enter correct credentials), which is a security requirement. It does not state functional behavior beyond security nor other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall display input fields for email and password.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional requirement to display input fields (UI behavior). No non-functional qualities (security, usability, performance, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: Upon successful login, the system shall redirect the user to the main screen.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system action (redirect after login), which is a functional behavior. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The user shall be able to browse different categories of content.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability (browsing content categories), which is a functional requirement. No quality attributes (availability, performance, usability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall display the categories available to the user.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (displaying categories to the user), which is functional. It does not specify UI aesthetics, availability, performance, security, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: The system shall allow users to select a specific category to view its contents.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user-facing capability (selecting a category to view contents), which is a functional requirement. No availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: Upon selecting a category, the system shall show the corresponding content.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior: when a category is selected the system must display corresponding content. No non-functional qualities (performance, usability, security, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall have the option to rate or review content.
AI_Rationale: This describes a functional capability (allow users to rate or review content). It specifies what the system should do rather than a quality attribute.

RequirementText: System shall allow users to rate content on a scale of 1 to 8 and provide reviews.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (allow users to rate content on a specific scale and provide reviews). It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: Content ratings and reviews shall be visible to other users.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional requirement to display content ratings and reviews to other users (who can view them); no non-functional qualities are mentioned.

RequirementText: Users shall be able to access ratings and reviews for each piece of content.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a user-facing capability (view/access ratings and reviews) describing what the system should do—i.e., a functional requirement. It does not mention quality attributes like performance, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: The system shall accurately display the average rating for each content item.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior: the system must display the average rating for each content item. The word 'accurately' indicates a quality of the displayed value but does not map to any specific non-functional category listed (e.g., performance, reliability), so only Functional is set.

RequirementText: System shall provide options to search, filter, and sort content.
AI_Rationale: Specifies functional capabilities (search, filter, sort) describing what the system should do; no non-functional quality constraints are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to search for specific content using keywords.
AI_Rationale: Describes a functional capability (keyword search) for users to find content; no non-functional quality requirements (availability, performance, security, usability, etc.) are specified.

RequirementText: System shall allow users to filter content based on various criteria.
AI_Rationale: This requirement describes a functional capability (allowing users to filter content). It does not specify quality attributes like performance, usability, availability, security, or others.

RequirementText: User shall have the option to sort content by relevance, rating, or date.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (ability to sort content by relevance, rating, or date), which is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly state quality attributes like usability, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: The system shall display search results, filtered content, and sorted content accordingly.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional behavior: displaying search results and presenting filtered/sorted content. No explicit non-functional constraints (performance, availability, usability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to log in to Ola Cabs by entering their email address and password.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying the system behavior (user login via email and password). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes explicitly, so only Functional is marked.

RequirementText: System shall check if the entered account exists in the database.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a concrete system behavior (validation of account existence in the database), which is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly address availability, security, performance, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: If the account does not exist, the system shall prompt the user to sign up.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system behavior (prompt user to sign up when account does not exist). This is a functional requirement; it does not state quality attributes like performance, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: User shall be authorized to log in if the entered credentials are valid.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional behavior (authorize login based on valid credentials) and implies a security concern (authentication/authorization). It does not state performance, availability, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall verify the entered ID and password against the database.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies an authentication function (functional). It also implies a security concern (verifying credentials), so Security is applicable. No explicit availability, performance, usability, or other quality constraints are stated.

RequirementText: Access shall be granted if the credentials are valid; otherwise, access shall be denied.
AI_Rationale: Specifies authentication/authorization rule (grant access when credentials valid, deny otherwise). This is a security requirement governing access control, not about availability, performance, or UI.

RequirementText: User shall be able to cancel a ride by tapping on the cancel button.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability (cancel a ride via tapping a cancel button) — a functional requirement. No non-functional qualities (availability, performance, usability, security, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: System shall verify if the ride has not yet been confirmed before allowing cancellation.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional behavior/constraint: the system must check ride confirmation status before permitting cancellation. It does not specify availability, performance, security, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: The system shall allow user registration and login, enabling them to provide personal information for associating with requests.
AI_Rationale: This specifies functional behavior (user registration and login and providing personal information). It does not explicitly state security, availability, performance, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: Upon user login, the system will display personalized information and automatically add certain details to booking requests.
