AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (providing a fast/slow motion editor for users to choose video speed). It does not state availability, performance, security, usability constraints, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: User shall access different modes for adding filters and effects to scenes and images, enhancing versatility and customization options.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies a user capability (access different modes to add filters/effects) which is a functional requirement. It also emphasizes versatility and customization, which relates to usability. No mentions of availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, fault tolerance, legal, or look-and-feel constraints.

RequirementText: System shall comply with relevant privacy regulations and standards to safeguard user privacy and data security.
AI_Rationale: Explicitly requires compliance with privacy regulations and standards (legal/compliance). Also addresses safeguarding user privacy and data security, which maps to security requirements (confidentiality/integrity). No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: User shall utilize the screen recorder function with a facial tracker to capture live movements.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a user-facing capability (screen recorder with facial tracker to capture live movements), which is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state availability, security, performance, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: System shall enable users to export their stories to their gallery and share them directly to social media platforms with ease.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user-facing capability (export and share) — functional. The phrase 'with ease' indicates an ease-of-use requirement, so mark Usability.

RequirementText: User shall experience seamless access to advanced editing features like video collages, themes, and music bank, enhancing their creativity within the VivaVideo app.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies that users shall have 'seamless access to advanced editing features' — this describes functional capabilities (advanced editing features) and emphasizes user experience/usability (seamless access, enhancing creativity). It does not explicitly state availability, performance, security, or other quality aspects, so those labels are not set.

RequirementText: System shall ensure a user-friendly interface for effortless creation of slideshows with customizable elements such as text art and animated texts in VivaVideo.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a user-friendly interface for creating slideshows (usability) and customizable visual elements (look & feel). It also describes functional capability (creation of slideshows and customizable text/animations), but does not mention availability, performance, security, portability, scalability, maintainability, operability, fault tolerance, or legal constraints.

RequirementText: User shall be able to update their information.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing user capability to update their information; it does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall have the ability to change their password.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing a user capability (change password). It also strongly implies a security concern (password management), so Security is marked. No other quality attributes are explicitly referenced.

RequirementText: User shall be able to sign up as a student, admin, or company.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (users can sign up with specific roles: student, admin, or company). It does not mention availability, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall be able to log in as a student, admin, or company.
AI_Rationale: This is primarily a functional requirement specifying that users can log in with different roles (student, admin, company). It also implies authentication/authorization concerns (security), so SE is set. No explicit availability, performance, usability, or other quality constraints are stated.

RequirementText: Students shall be able to apply for jobs.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability: students must be able to apply for jobs. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: Companies shall be able to post jobs and add job details.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a capability the system must provide (companies can post jobs and add job details). No availability, performance, security, or other quality constraints are mentioned.

RequirementText: Students shall have the ability to view the status of their job applications.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (students can view status of job applications). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: Users shall be able to search for jobs.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability (search for jobs) describing what the system should do, which is a functional requirement. No quality attributes such as performance, security, usability, etc., are mentioned or implied.

RequirementText: Admin shall be able to manage students.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement stating that an admin user must be able to manage students (i.e., system behavior/feature). No quality attributes (availability, security, usability, etc.) are specified.

RequirementText: Admin shall be able to manage companies.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying that an Admin user must be able to manage companies. No non-functional aspects (availability, performance, security, usability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: Users shall be able to view student applications.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability (allow users to view student applications), which is functional. It does not mention availability, security, performance, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: The admin-side business logic shall be completely separate from the student interface to ensure optimal performance.
AI_Rationale: This is an architectural/quality constraint rather than a functional requirement. It explicitly states separation to “ensure optimal performance,” so Performance is set to true. The mandate to keep admin business logic separate from the student interface is a clear design-for-maintainability/modularity concern, so Maintainability is set to true. No other quality attributes (availability, security, portability, scalability, operability, look-and-feel, usability, legal, fault tolerance) are explicitly or strongly implied.

RequirementText: The system shall be optimized for high performance by clearly separating the business logic from the UI.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly targets high performance optimization (performance). It prescribes architectural separation of business logic from UI, which also strongly implies improved maintainability (separation of concerns), so Maintainability is marked. No explicit mentions of availability, security, scalability, usability, portability or others.

RequirementText: The system shall be scalable to accommodate numerous concurrent users.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly concerns scalability to support numerous concurrent users. It does not specify performance metrics, availability, fault tolerance, or other quality attributes, so only SC is set.

RequirementText: The student registration process shall complete in 10 seconds or less, company registration and job posting shall each take no more than 15 seconds, and student applications for jobs shall be processed within 20 seconds.
AI_Rationale: Specifies maximum response/processing times for several operations (student registration, company registration, job posting, applications) — this is a performance (timing/response time) requirement. No functional behavior, availability, security, or other quality attributes are explicitly stated.

RequirementText: The system shall maintain availability 24/7.
AI_Rationale: Explicitly specifies continuous availability (24/7), which is an availability requirement. No other quality attributes or functional details are mentioned.

RequirementText: Errors will be minimized, and users will be provided with appropriate error messages to guide them through the issue.
AI_Rationale: Requirement focuses on minimizing user errors and providing helpful error messages to guide users—this is a usability concern (ease of use and user guidance). No explicit functional, security, performance, or other quality attributes are stated.

RequirementText: Users' inputs shall be validated to ensure data integrity and system security.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies input validation behavior (a functional action) aimed at ensuring data integrity and preventing security issues; thus it is both Functional and Security. No explicit availability, performance, scalability, portability, legal, maintainability, operability, look-and-feel, or usability concerns are stated.

RequirementText: The error recovery time shall be less than 10 seconds.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a time constraint on error recovery (recovery time < 10s), which is a fault-tolerance requirement. Because it sets a timing metric, it also relates to performance/response time constraints. It does not explicitly state availability, security, usability, or other qualities.

RequirementText: The system shall ensure a high level of security and integrity for the data it holds.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly specifies security and data integrity, which map directly to Security (confidentiality, integrity). It does not describe functionality, availability, fault tolerance, or other qualities, so only SE is set.

RequirementText: Authorized personnel only, such as admins, shall access private data, and users shall only view their user page with valid credentials.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies access control and authentication constraints (authorized personnel, valid credentials, users may only view their own pages), which is a security requirement. It does not state availability, performance, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The system shall have high availability.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly states 'high availability', which directly pertains to system availability. It does not explicitly mention fault tolerance, scalability, security, usability, or other quality attributes, so only Availability is marked.

RequirementText: The system shall have a simple yet high-quality user interface.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly concerns the user interface's simplicity and quality, which maps to Look & Feel (visual/appearance) and Usability (intuitiveness, ease of use). No mention of functionality, performance, security, availability, etc.

RequirementText: The system shall have descriptive and easily understandable error messages.
AI_Rationale: This requirement concerns the presentation and clarity of error messages for users, which affects the system's look-and-feel and usability. It does not specify functional behavior, performance, security, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: Error messages shall be descriptive and easily understandable.
AI_Rationale: Requirement addresses the wording and clarity of UI error messages, which impacts user experience (Usability) and the presentation of information (Look & Feel). It does not specify functional behavior, availability, performance, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The system shall only be available for the specified college.
AI_Rationale: Requirement restricts availability to a specific college (availability constraint). It also implies access control/authorization (security) since only specified college members should access the system. No mention of other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Users shall access the system using a securely managed login/user-ID and password.
AI_Rationale: Specifies authentication mechanism and secure management of credentials, which is a security requirement (access control/authentication). Does not specify functional behaviors beyond access method nor other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Each student shall only be recruited by one company.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional/business rule enforcing a uniqueness constraint (each student may be recruited by only one company). It specifies system behavior/data integrity, not availability, security, or other NFRs.

RequirementText: Once a company selects a candidate, they shall not be allowed to reject them; otherwise, the company will be blacklisted.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies an enforced system policy/behavior: prevent a company from rejecting a selected candidate and apply blacklisting if violated (functional). It also concerns enforcement of permissions/rules and access control policy, so it maps to security. No explicit availability, performance, portability, legal compliance, UI/look-and-feel, maintainability, scalability, fault-tolerance, operability, or usability aspects are mentioned.

RequirementText: Each student shall have only one account.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a system behavior/constraint (each student must have a single account), which is functional. It also pertains to identity management and data integrity/security (ensuring unique student identities/accounts), so Security is applicable. No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: User shall be able to maintain different types of specialties.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability (maintain different types of specialties) — a functional requirement describing what the system should allow the user to do. No quality constraints (performance, security, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to add a new (unique) specialty.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a capability the system must provide (user can add a new specialty) with a uniqueness constraint; this is a functional requirement. No availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to view and update the details of an existing specialty.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies user actions (view and update an existing specialty), which describes functional behavior (CRUD). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall be able to delete a specialty, provided no doctors are attached to it.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability (deleting a specialty) with a precondition (no doctors attached). This is a functional requirement; no non-functional aspects are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to maintain doctors and associate them with specialties.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability (maintain doctor records and associate them with specialties). No quality, performance, security, or other non-functional constraints are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to add a new (unique) doctor with details such as name, age, sex, qualification, experience, and specialty.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying the ability for a user to add a new unique doctor with specific attributes. No non-functional aspects (availability, performance, security, usability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to view and update the details of an existing doctor, with the specialty remaining unchanged.
AI_Rationale: Specifies user actions (view and update doctor details) and a constraint (specialty unchanged), which are functional requirements. No non-functional qualities (availability, performance, security, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: User shall be able to delete a doctor, only if no new patient consultation requests are pending.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (deleting a doctor) with a precondition (no pending consultation requests). It is a functional behavior; it does not specify availability, performance, security, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: User shall be able to maintain chemists and labs details.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a user-facing capability (maintain chemists and labs details) — a functional requirement. It contains no availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: User shall be able to add a new chemist or lab, with only one lab allowed per pincode.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement: it specifies a user action (add a new chemist or lab) and a business rule (only one lab per pincode). It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: User shall be able to view and update the details of an existing chemist/lab, with pincode remaining unchanged.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional behavior: viewing and updating an existing chemist/lab with a business rule that pincode must not change. No non-functional qualities (availability, performance, security, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: User shall be able to delete a chemist/lab, only if no new prescription is pending.
AI_Rationale: This describes a functional capability (deleting a chemist/lab) with a conditional constraint (only allowed when no new prescription is pending). No non-functional quality attributes are specified.

RequirementText: User shall be able to maintain a master list of symptoms for patient consultation requests.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user capability (maintain a master list of symptoms), which is a functional behavior (CRUD-style). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: User shall be able to add a new symptom.
AI_Rationale: This is a straightforward functional requirement specifying that a user must be able to add a new symptom. No quality attributes (availability, performance, security, usability, etc.) are mentioned or implied.

RequirementText: User shall be able to view and update the details of an existing symptom.
AI_Rationale: Specifies user capability to view and update symptom details — a functional requirement. No availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to delete a symptom, only if no consultation request has ever used it.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying that users can delete a symptom, with a precondition that no consultation request has used it. It describes system behavior/operation; it does not specify availability, performance, security, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: User shall be able to create a patient profile.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (creating a patient profile), which is a functional behavior. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall be able to view and update the details of an existing patient profile, with only the latest details maintained by the system.
AI_Rationale: This describes user-facing capabilities to view and update patient profiles and a storage rule (maintain only latest details). Primarily a functional requirement; no explicit non-functional aspects like security, availability, or usability are stated.

RequirementText: User shall be able to delete a patient profile, provided no consultation requests have been made in the last 3 years.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user action (delete patient profile) with a conditional business rule; this is a functional requirement. No non-functional qualities (availability, security, performance, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: Registered patients shall have the ability to raise consultation requests, with options for appointment and offline consultation.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability (patients can raise consultation requests and choose appointment or offline), which is functional. It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: User shall be able to create a consultation request by entering symptoms, uploading reports, and defining the request mode (offline/appointment).
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability (creating a consultation request with inputs and mode) which is functional. No non-functional constraints (performance, security, availability, usability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: For appointment requests, an entry shall be created in the patient appointment file if the appointment is for the next day.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system behavior: creating an appointment-file entry when appointment is for the next day. This is a functional requirement; no non-functional constraints are stated.

RequirementText: A batch program shall run nightly to create an appointment file for the next 5 days and purge existing files.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system behavior (batch program runs nightly to create and purge files) — a functional requirement. No explicit non-functional quality (availability, performance, security, etc.) is stated.

RequirementText: A batch program shall periodically predict diseases based on consultation requests using a machine learning algorithm and prioritize the requests.
AI_Rationale: Describes a system function: a batch program that periodically predicts diseases using an ML algorithm and prioritizes consultation requests. No explicit non-functional constraints (availability, performance, security, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: Doctors shall see prioritized consultation requests, provide diagnosis, prescribe medicines, and suggest lab requests.
AI_Rationale: Specifies explicit system functionality for doctors: viewing prioritized consultation requests, providing diagnoses, prescribing medicines, and suggesting lab requests. No non-functional attributes (availability, security, performance, usability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: Chemists shall be able to view open prescriptions assigned to them based on pincode and update the status, with medicines delivered offline to patients.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a concrete capability: chemists can view prescriptions by pincode and update status, and delivery is offline — this is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly state security, performance, usability, availability, or other quality constraints, so no other non-functional labels are set.

RequirementText: Lab in-charge shall be able to view open lab requests, update the status, and perform actual sample collection and lab tests offline, with reports submitted to patients offline.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies capabilities (view requests, update status, perform sample collection/tests, submit reports) — these are functional. It also specifies offline operation, which relates to operability/ability to operate/administer the system without network connectivity; no explicit availability, security, scalability, or other quality constraints are stated.

RequirementText: Patients shall have the facility to view and print prescriptions and invoices, with admins having the option to print and email prescriptions and invoices.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies functional capabilities: patients can view/print prescriptions and invoices and admins can print/email them. No non-functional constraints (availability, security, performance, portability, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: Quarterly, patient profiles without consultation requests for the last 3 years and consultation requests more than 3 years old shall be archived to improve performance.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a scheduled system action (archiving) so it's functional. Purpose is explicitly to improve performance, so Performance is applicable. Archiving old data is a maintenance activity affecting maintainability, so Maintainability is also applicable. No mention of availability, fault tolerance, security, scalability, portability, legal, UI, or operability.

RequirementText: Every night, a full backup of the system (database and code) shall be taken and sent to a remote site for safekeeping, with backups rotated every 30 days.
AI_Rationale: Specifies an automated nightly backup to remote site with 30-day rotation — this is a functional operational requirement that primarily addresses fault tolerance/recovery. It also concerns operability (backup management). No explicit availability, security, performance, portability, scalability, legal, look-and-feel, maintainability, or usability aspects are stated.

RequirementText: Administration shall improve the disease prediction database monthly based on the learning from the prior month.
AI_Rationale: Specifies an administrative action the system/administration must perform monthly (functional). It also describes ongoing improvement/maintenance of the database based on learned data, which is a maintainability concern. No explicit non-functional qualities like availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, or usability are stated.

RequirementText: The system shall have a login functionality for doctors, patients, chemists, and labs, with default passwords set up by the admin, and users can change passwords and log in using their own credentials.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a concrete login feature (functional behavior) and describes authentication-related aspects (default passwords, password change, user credentials), which are security concerns. It does not mention availability, performance, scalability, portability, operability, maintainability, legal, look-and-feel, or usability explicitly.

RequirementText: User shall/will be able to access the system using specified pincodes (zones).
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability to access the system via pincodes (functional requirement) and implies an authentication/authorization mechanism (security requirement). No mention of availability, performance, etc.

RequirementText: User shall/will access the system using a login/user-id and password managed securely.
AI_Rationale: Specifies authentication using login/user-id and password managed securely, which is a security requirement (authentication/confidentiality). Does not specify availability, performance, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall/will be able to register themselves by filling out a patient profile, generating a unique ID.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (register by filling a patient profile and generating a unique ID), which is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly state non-functional concerns like availability, performance, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: User shall/will be able to request one or more consultation requests linked back to a specialty.
AI_Rationale: This requirement describes a user capability (request consultations linked to a specialty), which is functional behavior. It does not specify quality attributes like availability, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: User shall/will be able to view and print prescriptions and invoices.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional capabilities (viewing and printing prescriptions and invoices). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns, so only Functional is marked.

RequirementText: User shall/will be able to view reports such as doctor-wise appointment files and revenue earned per month/quarter/year.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a functional capability for users to view specific reports (doctor-wise appointments and revenue by period). It does not mention availability, performance, security, UI look-and-feel, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: User shall/will have access to a simple and intuitive user interface designed for ease of use, especially for elderly patients.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a simple, intuitive user interface and ease of use, particularly for elderly patients—this is a usability requirement. It does not address legal, security, performance, or other quality concerns.

RequirementText: System shall be able to scale to 10,000+ users (patients) concurrently.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly specifies ability to scale to 10,000+ concurrent users, which is a scalability requirement. It does not mention availability, performance metrics (latency/throughput), security, or other qualities.

RequirementText: System shall be able to respond to critical processes within defined time limits, including patient registration, consultation requests, and prescription lookup.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies system behavior (must respond to processes) => Functional. Specifies timing constraints (“within defined time limits”) => Performance (timeliness/latency). No explicit mention of availability, scalability, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall ensure high availability with 99.999% uptime and regular backups with a cycle of 30 days.
AI_Rationale: Specifies explicit uptime percentage (99.999%) — availability. Regular backups (30-day cycle) indicate resilience/recovery capabilities — fault tolerance. No functional behavior, performance, security, or other qualities are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall securely manage user login credentials and patient data confidentiality.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies the system shall manage user login credentials and patient data confidentiality — this describes functional behavior (managing credentials/data) with explicit security/confidentiality concerns. No explicit availability, performance, scalability, legal, usability, or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall comply with healthcare regulations as defined by the Government of India.
AI_Rationale: Explicitly requires compliance with government healthcare regulations, which is a legal/regulatory requirement. No other quality attributes (security, availability, performance, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall support emerging needs based on data analysis.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies a system capability—supporting emerging needs using data analysis—which describes a functional behavior. It does not explicitly mention availability, fault tolerance, scalability, security, usability, or other quality attributes, so only Functional is marked.

RequirementText: System shall back up data every night and restore backups daily to ensure completeness and correctness.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies automatic backup and restore behavior (functional) and addresses resilience/recovery to ensure data completeness and correctness (fault tolerance). No explicit mention of availability metrics, security, performance, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall maintain data securely in a fireproof cabinet 25 km away from the hospital.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies secure, physical off-site storage (fireproof cabinet 25 km away), which directly concerns security (physical protection/confidentiality/integrity) and implies resilience/disaster recovery (fault tolerance). It does not state availability metrics, legal, usability, maintainability, or other qualities.

RequirementText: System shall ensure that each specialty has one or more associated doctors.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying a data/behavior constraint: the system must enforce that each specialty is associated with one or more doctors. It does not specify availability, security, performance, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: System shall ensure that each doctor is mapped to one and only one specialty.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional business rule specifying data/model constraint (each doctor must be mapped to exactly one specialty). It does not specify availability, security, performance, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: System shall ensure that each patient consultation request generates one prescription, mapped to one and only one consultation request.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying system behavior/constraint: each consultation request must generate exactly one prescription with a one-to-one mapping. No availability, security, performance, or other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: System shall ensure that prescriptions are mapped to one and only one chemist or lab based on the patient's pincode.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional behavior/constraint: mapping prescriptions uniquely to a chemist or lab based on patient pincode. No explicit non-functional aspects (security, performance, availability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to record sales transactions, including customer information, medicine name, quantity sold, and unit price.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user capability to record sales transactions and the fields to capture (customer info, medicine name, quantity, unit price), which defines functional behavior rather than non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: User shall be able to use a barcode scanner or manual entry for sales processes.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability (support for barcode scanner or manual entry) for sales processes. Does not state availability, performance, security, or usability metrics.

RequirementText: User shall be able to track and analyze sales performance, including total sales, top-selling medicines, and sales trends.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability — allowing users to track and analyze sales metrics (total sales, top-selling items, trends). It does not explicitly state non-functional concerns such as performance, security, availability, or usability.

RequirementText: User shall be able to create purchase orders for medicines from authorized distributors, specifying details like quantity and expiration dates.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user capability (creating purchase orders with details such as quantity and expiration dates), which is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly state non-functional concerns (availability, performance, security, etc.), so no other labels are set.

RequirementText: System shall automatically update the available quantity of each medicine after a sale is completed.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying behavior: updating medicine quantities automatically after a sale. It does not mention availability, fault tolerance, performance, security, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: System shall generate notifications when the stock of a particular medicine falls below a predefined threshold.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (generate notifications when stock falls below a threshold), which is functional. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall provide tools for tracking and analyzing sales performance, including metrics such as total sales, top-selling medicines, and sales trends over time.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability to provide tools for tracking and analyzing sales metrics (total sales, top-selling medicines, trends), which defines functional behavior. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes explicitly.

RequirementText: User shall be able to process returns of medicines to distributors within the specified time frame, recording relevant details such as reasons for return and quantities returned.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user capability (processing returns and recording details), which is functional. The time-frame clause is a behavioral constraint on the function rather than an explicit availability, performance, or other non-functional attribute.

RequirementText: System shall automatically adjust the available quantity of returned medicines in the inventory.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (automatic adjustment of inventory quantities for returned medicines), which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, scalability, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The return process shall update the inventory system to reflect a decrease in the number of available medicines, ensuring accurate stock levels.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a system behavior: the return process must update inventory counts to reflect decreased medicine availability (functional requirement). It does not explicitly state availability, performance, security, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: User shall have a secure login mechanism with role-based access control, ensuring that employees can only access functions relevant to their roles.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a secure login mechanism and role-based access control, which is primarily a security requirement (authentication/authorization). It also describes a functional behavior (users can access functions relevant to their roles), so Functional is marked as well. No explicit availability, performance, scalability, maintainability, portability, legal, look-and-feel, operability, or usability aspects are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall have a detailed activity log maintained, capturing actions such as logins, logouts, sales transactions, purchases, and any system operations.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability to maintain a detailed activity log capturing specific user and system actions — a functional behavior (logging/auditing). It does not explicitly state availability, fault tolerance, legal/compliance, security controls, performance, scalability, or usability constraints, so other labels are not set.

RequirementText: User shall/will be able to interact with the system with responses within two seconds under normal operating conditions.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that users must be able to interact (functional requirement) with a quantitative response-time constraint of two seconds under normal conditions (performance/latency non-functional requirement). No mention of availability, scalability, security, etc.

RequirementText: User shall/will be provided with reports generated in a time not exceeding five seconds.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a response-time bound for report generation (<= 5 seconds), which is a performance metric. It does not mention uptime/reliability percentages, fault tolerance, security, usability, or functional behavior beyond the quality constraint, so only Performance is set.

RequirementText: User shall/will have access to a system with a mean time between failures of at least 500 hours.
AI_Rationale: Specifies mean time between failures (MTBF) — a reliability/availability metric. This concerns system uptime/reliability (Availability) and implies resilience to failures (Fault Tolerance). No functional behavior or other quality attributes are stated.

RequirementText: In the event of a failure, the system shall/will recover within five minutes with minimal data loss.
AI_Rationale: Specifies recovery time and minimal data loss after failure (recovery/RTO and data integrity), which are availability and fault-tolerance requirements. Does not describe functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall/will have sensitive data encrypted during transmission and storage.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies encryption of sensitive data in transit and at rest, which is a security (confidentiality/integrity) requirement. No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall/will be subject to role-based access control, restricting access based on assigned roles.
AI_Rationale: Specifies role-based access control (authentication/authorization) which is a security requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, UI, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall/will have passwords stored securely using industry-standard hashing algorithms.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies secure storage of passwords using industry-standard hashing algorithms, which is a security-related constraint (confidentiality/integrity). It does not describe functional behavior, performance, availability, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall/will experience a system capable of supporting the addition of new features without requiring a complete system overhaul.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies capability to add new features without complete overhaul, indicating modifiability/maintainability (extensibility). It does not reference availability, performance, scalability, security, or UI.

RequirementText: User shall/will experience optimal performance under increased loads through scalability tests.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly concerns system behavior under increased loads and mentions 'scalability tests' and 'optimal performance', which maps directly to Scalability (SC) and Performance (PE). No mention of availability, security, usability, or other qualities.

RequirementText: User shall/will interact with an intuitive user interface requiring minimal training.
AI_Rationale: Specifies an intuitive UI requiring minimal training, which is a usability (UX) requirement. Does not impose legal, performance, availability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: User shall/will receive clear error messages and guidance in case of input errors.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (displaying error messages and guidance) so it is functional. It primarily concerns clarity and user assistance, which is a usability requirement. It does not mention availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, fault tolerance, or legal/look-and-feel specifics.

RequirementText: User shall/will access a system available 100% of the time during regular business hours.
AI_Rationale: Specifies availability requirement (100% uptime during business hours). Does not mention fault tolerance, scalability, performance, or other quality attributes explicitly.

RequirementText: User shall/will be informed in advance of scheduled maintenance to minimize downtime.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies an operational procedure (informing users in advance of scheduled maintenance) to minimize downtime, which pertains to system operability/operation management. It does not specify availability metrics, maintenance processes, UI/look-and-feel, security, or other qualities explicitly.

RequirementText: User shall/will benefit from regular automated backups of the database and system configuration.
AI_Rationale: Regular automated backups explicitly support recovery and improve system availability after failures (A) and provide fault tolerance/resilience (FT). Automating backups is also an operational/administrative capability (O). No mention of security, performance, portability, scalability, UI, legal or maintainability requirements, so those are not set.

RequirementText: Backup data shall/will be stored in a geographically separate location to ensure recovery in case of a catastrophic event.
AI_Rationale: Storing backups in a geographically separate location is a disaster-recovery requirement addressing system availability and resilience to catastrophic failures (fault tolerance). It does not specify security, UI, performance, or other concerns.

RequirementText: User shall/will experience a system designed with built-in fault tolerance to minimize the impact of failures.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly describes built-in fault tolerance to minimize impact of failures, which maps directly to Fault Tolerance (FT). It does not explicitly mention availability, performance, security, or functional behavior, so other labels are not set.

RequirementText: System shall/will identify dependencies on external services or APIs.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability (identifying dependencies on external services/APIs), which is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly state availability, security, maintainability, operability, or other quality constraints, so those labels are not set.

RequirementText: User shall be able to create a new account and select Free or Premium membership.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability (create account and choose membership type), which is a functional requirement. No availability, performance, security, usability or other quality constraints are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be prompted to sign in to access their account.
AI_Rationale: Specifies system behavior to prompt users to sign in (functional) and enforces authentication for account access (security). Does not mention availability, performance, usability, or other qualities.

RequirementText: User shall have the option to sign out or switch between accounts.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (allow user to sign out or switch accounts). It does not explicitly state availability, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall be limited to 1000 calls per day, with total calls being the sum of all user accounts.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying a rate-limit behavior (what the system must enforce) and also imposes a throughput constraint (calls per day), so labeled Functional and Performance. It does not specify availability, scalability, security, or other qualities.

RequirementText: User shall search for locations using city names for weather information.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior: the system shall allow users to search for locations by city name to retrieve weather information. It does not state any non-functional constraints (availability, performance, security, etc.).

RequirementText: User shall only have access to US cities and locations within the app.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies an access restriction (users may only access US cities/locations), which is an authorization/security constraint. It does not specify availability, performance, UI, or other qualities.

RequirementText: User shall store one location for Free Users and up to five locations for Premium Users.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability and constraint (storing locations with different limits for Free vs Premium users). It describes what the system must do rather than availability, security, performance, UI, or other non-functional properties.

RequirementText: User shall have the ability to remove stored locations.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability (remove stored locations), which is a functional requirement. No explicit non-functional qualities (performance, security, availability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall access a 7-day advance weather prediction for searched and stored cities, in addition to current weather data.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability: provide 7-day forecast for searched and stored cities and current weather data. No non-functional constraints (availability, performance, security, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall expect Weeble to load within 20 seconds for 90% of the time.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a response/load time requirement (20 seconds for 90% of cases), which is a performance requirement. Often such availability/uptime-style guarantees are also classified as availability; follows similar labeled examples.

RequirementText: User passwords shall be hashed using a key stretching algorithm before storage in the database.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a security control for password storage (hashing with key stretching), which is a security requirement rather than functional or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The database of Webble shall reliably support up to 20 user accounts and associated data.
AI_Rationale: Specifies capacity limit (support up to 20 user accounts) -> scalability. Uses term 'reliably support' indicating reliability/availability requirement, so Availability is applicable. No functional behavior, security, performance, or other quality explicitly stated.

RequirementText: Webble shall allow a maximum of 10 Premium Users with full access to features.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a capacity limit (maximum of 10 premium users), which is a scalability/capacity constraint. It does not describe security, availability, UI, or maintainability aspects, nor general functional behavior beyond the numeric limit.

RequirementText: A maximum of 10 Free Users shall be allowed in Webble with limited access to features.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional constraint on user accounts (max 10 Free Users) and includes access restrictions (limited access to features) which implies authorization control, i.e., security. No indications of availability, performance, scalability, portability, etc.

RequirementText: Premium Users shall be permitted to make up to 66 calls per day.
AI_Rationale: Specifies an allowed action/limit for Premium Users (functional) and imposes a throughput/quota constraint (performance). No indication of availability, security, scalability, or other qualities.

RequirementText: Free Users shall be allowed to make up to 33 calls per day.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional constraint/permission (a per-day quota) describing what the system must allow for Free Users. It does not address availability, performance, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Webble shall depict weather information using graphical icons corresponding to the current weather.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system behavior (display weather info with graphical icons) so it's functional. It also mandates a specific UI presentation (graphical icons), which pertains to look & feel. No explicit availability, performance, security, portability, scalability, maintainability, operability, or usability non-functional concerns are stated.

RequirementText: An FAQ page shall be provided in Webble to explain terms, functionality, and other relevant information.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying that the system shall provide an FAQ page. It does not explicitly state availability, UI look-and-feel, usability metrics, or other non-functional properties.

RequirementText: The design of Webble shall ensure that at least 90% of users can navigate and understand the application after training.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a usability metric (90% of users can navigate and understand after training), which directly concerns usability/learnability. It does not address functionality, security, performance, or other NFR categories.

RequirementText: User shall have the ability to search resumes by keywords, job category, and days since posted.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a search capability (what the system should do) with explicit criteria (keywords, category, days). No non-functional qualities such as performance, security, usability, or availability are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to post jobs with detailed descriptions including job title, company name, location, salary, job type, work type, and required skills.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability (posting jobs with specified fields) describing system functionality; no quality, performance, security, or UI constraints are implied.

RequirementText: User shall have the ability to create and edit a company profile.
AI_Rationale: Describes a user capability (create and edit a company profile), which is a functional requirement. No availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints are specified.

RequirementText: User shall be able to add a company logo to job postings.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (users can add a company logo to job postings). It does not mention availability, security, performance, UI look-and-feel, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: Password resets shall be retrievable by automated email.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a system capability (functional) to provide password resets via automated email. It implies operational concerns (sending/automating email) but does not explicitly state security, performance, portability, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: Employers and recruiters shall be able to create multiple resume agents to receive daily emails matching their keywords.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a user-facing capability (employers/recruiters can create multiple resume agents and receive daily emails) which is functional. It also implies the system must send/receive email notifications/manage agents, which relates to operability (email delivery/administration). No availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, maintainability, legal, look-and-feel or usability concerns are explicitly stated.

RequirementText: Paid features such as making offers bold or highlighting shall be available.
AI_Rationale: This describes a functional capability (paid features: bold/highlight offers) to be provided by the system. No explicit non-functional aspects (availability as uptime, performance, security, UI look-and-feel, etc.) are specified.

RequirementText: The search resume facility shall be activated by paying a fee based on requirements.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional behavior: activation of the search resume facility contingent on payment of a fee. No explicit non-functional constraints (performance, availability, security, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: Employer and agency registration shall be facilitated.
AI_Rationale: The phrase specifies a capability (registration for employers and agencies) => functional. The word 'facilitated' implies ease of use / reduced user effort, indicating a usability concern. No explicit availability, security, performance, etc., are mentioned.

RequirementText: Individual or package job adverts shall be purchasable by credit card.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional capability (ability to purchase job adverts by credit card). It does not explicitly state non-functional qualities like security, performance, availability, etc.

RequirementText: Information on remaining job posting time and CV access shall be reportable.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies that certain information (remaining job posting time and CV access) must be reportable — i.e., the system shall provide a reporting function. It describes functional behavior (what the system should do) and does not specify availability, performance, security, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: Confirmation of remaining credits shall be provided after each job posting.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a system behavior: after each job posting the system shall provide confirmation of remaining credits. It is a functional requirement (what the system should do). No explicit non-functional aspects (availability, UI/look-and-feel, performance, security, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: Payment options shall include invoice or credit/debit card.
AI_Rationale: Specifies supported payment methods (invoice or credit/debit card), which is a functional requirement describing system behavior/capabilities. No explicit non-functional aspects (security, performance, availability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: Company logos shall be attachable to job adverts.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement stating that company logos can be attached to job adverts (feature/behavior). It does not specify non-functional qualities like security, performance, usability, or legal constraints.

RequirementText: Information on vacancy viewings and applications shall be provided.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (providing information about vacancy viewings and applications). It does not mention availability, performance, security, UI look & feel, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Application forms shall be attachable to job adverts.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a system capability/feature (forms can be attached to job adverts), i.e., a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Jobs shall be postable via external sites if used by the advertiser.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a capability of the system (jobs can be posted via external sites when the advertiser uses them), which is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly state availability, security, performance, portability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: High-quality applications shall be received from a customized job board.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional requirement: the system shall receive applications from a customized job board (F). It also implies an integration/operability concern (interface with a job board), so Operability (O) is marked. No explicit availability, performance, security, portability, scalability, usability, legal, maintainability, look-and-feel, or fault-tolerance requirements are stated.

RequirementText: Internal notes on applicants shall be maintainable.
AI_Rationale: Statement explicitly requires that internal notes be maintainable, which is a Maintainability (MN) non-functional requirement. It does not mention availability, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Online registration and signup for memberships, job packages, postings, or resume database access shall be available.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability/feature — providing online registration and signup for memberships, job packages, postings, and resume database access — which is a functional requirement. It does not state availability metrics, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: Quick employer registration shall be possible using email and password.
AI_Rationale: This is primarily a functional requirement (employer registration using email/password). The word "quick" implies a usability and performance concern (speed/response), so US and PE are included. No explicit security, availability, scalability, or other concerns are stated.

RequirementText: Multiple registration accounts for colleagues shall be set up.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a capability the system must provide (ability to set up multiple registration accounts for colleagues), which is a functional requirement. It does not specify availability, performance, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Autoresponder messages shall be sent for new account notifications.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior: the system shall send autoresponder messages when new accounts are created. It does not state availability, performance, security, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: Password retrieval shall be possible via automated email.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional capability (password retrieval via automated email). It does not explicitly state availability, security, operability, usability, or other quality constraints, so only Functional is marked.

RequirementText: Profile updates shall be allowed at any time.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that the system must allow profile updates (functional) and that this capability must be available at any time (availability/uptime requirement). No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: Resumes or CVs submitted by job seekers shall be viewable and downloadable.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a concrete system capability (ability to view and download resumes/CVs), which is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state availability, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Employers shall be able to create questions for applicants to respond to when applying.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (employers can create questions for applicants) describing system behavior, so it is a functional requirement. No non-functional qualities (performance, security, usability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: Search agents shall automatically send resumes matching specified criteria via email daily.
AI_Rationale: Describes a specific system behavior: automated daily emailing of matching resumes (functional requirement). No quality attributes like availability, performance, security, or portability are specified.

RequirementText: Calendar scheduling for meetings shall be provided.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a system capability (providing calendar scheduling for meetings), which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, scalability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: Newsletter subscription or unsubscription shall be possible.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a capability the system must provide (ability to subscribe/unsubscribe to a newsletter), which is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state any quality attributes (availability, security, usability, etc.).

RequirementText: Job listings shall be customizable to include company info, job type, category, requirements, wages, benefits, and an apply button.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a feature (customizable job listings with specific fields and an apply button) — functional. It also implies presentation/UI content and configurability of appearance/fields, so Look & Feel is applicable. No explicit constraints about performance, security, availability, etc.

RequirementText: Statistics on views and applicant counts shall be provided for postings.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability: the system must provide statistics (views and applicant counts) for postings. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Video CVs shall be viewable.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability (ability to view video CVs), which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall have the ability to search for jobs by keywords, category, and work status.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability (search by keywords, category, work status), which is a functional requirement; no non-functional qualities are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to upload a Video CV of up to 3 minutes.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability (upload a Video CV) with a content constraint (max 3 minutes). This is a functional requirement; no non-functional quality attributes are explicitly required.

RequirementText: Applying for a job shall be facilitated with a single click.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (users can apply for a job) and a UI quality constraint (the action must be possible with a single click), which impacts usability. It also implies a look-and-feel/navigation requirement to provide that single-click affordance, so LF is marked. No explicit availability, performance, security, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, or legal aspects are stated.

RequirementText: Resume posting capabilities shall include creation, editing, and expiration.
AI_Rationale: Specifies functional capabilities (creation, editing, expiration) of resume posting. No availability, performance, security, UI or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: Candidates shall be able to opt-in and create Job Agents to receive daily notifications of matching jobs.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (candidates can opt-in and create Job Agents that send daily matching-job notifications), which is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly state qualities like performance, security, availability, or usability.

RequirementText: Saving jobs of interest in a queue shall be possible for candidates.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (candidates can save jobs to a queue). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Password retrieval via email shall be automated.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system capability (automated password retrieval via email), which is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state availability, security, operability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Job Seeker registration shall allow the addition of CV as a Word file to the CV database.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (allowing job seekers to add a Word CV to the CV database). No non-functional constraints (availability, security, performance, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: Login and profile updates, including password reminders, shall be provided.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional capabilities (login, profile updates, password reminders). It does not explicitly state availability, security, usability, or other quality constraints, so only Functional is set to true.

RequirementText: Jobs by email and email-a-friend features shall be available.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies that particular features ('jobs by email' and 'email-a-friend') shall be available, which defines functional capabilities. It does not specify availability/uptime, operability, performance, security, portability, or usability constraints.

RequirementText: Viewing application history from the profile shall be possible.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a capability (viewing application history from the profile), i.e., a functional feature. No quality constraints (performance, security, usability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: An option to remain anonymous on the CV database while allowing employers/agencies to email candidates shall be provided.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a system capability (provide an anonymity option while enabling employers to email candidates) — a functional requirement. It also implies privacy/security concerns (protecting candidate identity/contact information), so Security is applicable. Other non-functional categories are not explicitly implied.

RequirementText: A powerful online job search tool shall be included.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies inclusion of a feature (an online job search tool), which is a functional requirement. The adjective 'powerful' is subjective and does not explicitly quantify performance, usability, security, or other quality attributes, so no additional NFR labels are assigned.

RequirementText: Automated banner ads on email headers shall notify job seekers of relevant jobs.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability/behavior (automatically showing banner ads in email headers to notify job seekers), which is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: Job seekers shall control the privacy level of their information visible to employers through resume searches.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability (job seekers can control privacy settings for resume visibility), which is a functional requirement. It also concerns protection of personal data/privacy, implying security/privacy concerns, so Security is marked. No explicit availability, performance, usability, legal, or other quality attributes are stated.

RequirementText: Job searching by location, qualification, categories, company, experience, and keywords shall be enabled.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (searching jobs by specific attributes/filters). It does not state availability, performance, usability, security, or other quality constraints, so only Functional is set.

RequirementText: Resumes will have options for private/public/confidential settings.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a feature (options for resume visibility) — functional. It concerns access/privacy settings (confidential/public) implying security/authorization/confidentiality controls — security.

RequirementText: Contact information will be optionally hidden.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a feature (option to hide contact information) which is a functional behavior. It also implies a confidentiality/privacy concern (hiding contact info), so it relates to security. No explicit availability, performance, usability, or other quality attributes are stated.

RequirementText: Resumes will be hidden from specific companies.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a system capability/feature (control which companies can view resumes) — functional. It also implies access/confidentiality control (security requirement) for who may see resumes.

RequirementText: Multiple qualifications and experiences will be added and submitted.
AI_Rationale: Describes a functional capability (adding and submitting multiple qualifications/experiences). No non-functional qualities (performance, security, availability, etc.) are specified.

RequirementText: Photos and Cover Letters will be added to profiles and job applications.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a functional capability (ability to add photos and cover letters to profiles and job applications). It does not express availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: Newsletter subscription and customization options will be provided.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a feature (newsletter subscription) and user-facing customization options. This is a functional requirement with usability implications (user preferences/customization). No explicit non-functional constraints like security, performance, or portability.

RequirementText: Jobs will be added to a watchlist for later viewing.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a functional capability (ability to add jobs to a watchlist for later viewing). It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: Statistics on resume views by interested employers shall be available.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies a feature: availability of statistics on resume views (a capability the system must provide). It does not mention availability/uptime, performance, security, UI, or maintenance concerns, so only Functional is set.

RequirementText: Automated responses to job applications shall be provided.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability (providing automated responses to job applications), which is a functional behavior. It does not mention availability, performance, security, scalability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Job Search Agents will be added, edited, activated, or deleted.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional capabilities (CRUD operations) for Job Search Agents (add, edit, activate, delete). It describes system behavior rather than availability, performance, security, UI, or other quality attributes, so only Functional is set.

RequirementText: Arranging job search results by dates or location shall be possible.
AI_Rationale: This describes a functional capability (ability to arrange/sort job search results by date or location). It does not specify quality attributes like performance, usability, security, etc.

RequirementText: Admin shall manage job seeker and employer profiles, payments, and services.
AI_Rationale: This sentence specifies capabilities the admin must have (managing profiles, payments, and services), i.e., a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state availability, security, performance, scalability, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: Messages will be sent to employers and job seekers for subscription-related matters.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior—sending messages to employers and job seekers about subscriptions—so it is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Roles and authentication for users shall be provided by admin.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that user roles and authentication shall be provided (authentication/authorization concern). This is a security requirement rather than availability, performance, or usability.

RequirementText: Admin will set criteria for users and manage static content updates.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies actions the system must provide (admin setting user criteria and managing static content updates), which are functional capabilities. It does not explicitly state availability, security, maintainability, operability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Email notifications to users based on account status will be sent from the admin panel.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior: sending email notifications to users from the admin panel (functional). It also implies operability/admin functionality since it originates from the admin panel (manage/send notifications), but does not mention availability, security, performance, portability, scalability, or UI look-and-feel.

RequirementText: Recent jobs shall be displayed on the homepage.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a display behavior (what the system should do) — showing recent jobs on the homepage. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Newsletter and email sending functionalities to employers and job seekers shall be provided.
AI_Rationale: Statement specifies a capability the system must provide (sending newsletters/emails to employers and job seekers) — a functional requirement. It does not explicitly mention availability, security, performance, operability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Extensive usage statistics for various categories shall be accessible.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies that usage statistics shall be accessible — this describes a system capability (functional). Providing extensive statistics also supports maintenance/monitoring activities, so Maintainability is applicable. No explicit availability, performance, security, scalability, portability, usability, look-and-feel, fault-tolerance, or legal constraints are stated.

RequirementText: Job categories management console shall be available.
AI_Rationale: The requirement states that a management console for job categories shall be available. This implies an operability/administration concern (availability of an admin interface) rather than specifying uptime metrics (availability A) or functional behavior details. No performance, security, or other qualities are specified.

RequirementText: Fully customizable graphic elements and templates shall be editable.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that graphic elements and templates must be editable (a functional capability) and pertains to look-and-feel/customization. No mention of availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, or usability explicitly.

RequirementText: Fees for various features like job posting, premium membership, etc., shall be configurable.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies that fees must be configurable (system configurability/administrability), which maps to Maintainability and Operability (administration/manageability). It does not state functional behavior, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: Billing transactions and reports on system sales shall be viewable.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies the system shall allow viewing billing transactions and sales reports — this is a functional capability. It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System administrators shall have control over dropdown lists and list boxes throughout the site.
AI_Rationale: This specifies an administrative capability (admins must be able to control dropdowns and list boxes) — primarily a functional requirement. It also implies an administrative/operational feature (manageability/operability) since it grants control to system administrators. No explicit reliability, security, UI appearance, portability, scalability, performance, or maintainability constraints are stated.

RequirementText: Job seekers and employers will be searched based on various criteria.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a functional capability of the system (searching job seekers and employers by various criteria). It does not state availability, performance, security, usability or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Multiple membership options with varying prices, time periods, and access levels shall be configurable.

RequirementText: Invoices can be sent to companies, and featured employer showcases can be managed.
AI_Rationale: Both clauses describe functional capabilities: sending invoices and managing featured employer showcases. No explicit non-functional quality attributes (availability, security, performance, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: Reports on total system sales, jobs, job seekers, accounting, and order history shall be viewable.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability of the system—that various reports shall be viewable. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints, so only Functional is marked.

RequirementText: Full lists of job seekers and employers along with their contact information can be printed.

RequirementText: Resumes will be imported directly from an existing database.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a functional capability of the system—importing resumes from an existing database. It does not mention availability, security, performance, portability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Limits for CV views and alerts for abnormal user activity shall be configurable.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies a configurable capability (system shall allow configuration of limits and alerts) which is a functional requirement. Because it concerns alerts for abnormal user activity it relates to security monitoring (SE). The emphasis on configurability/administration implicates operability (O). No explicit availability, performance, portability, scalability, legal, look-and-feel, maintainability, or usability constraints are stated.

RequirementText: Banner management application for serving and tracking banner ads shall be provided.
