AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability: the system must open an online payment gateway to allow the user to complete a purchase. It does not state quality attributes such as availability, security, performance, usability, or others, so only the Functional label is set.

RequirementText: User shall select a mode of payment and enter valid details to continue the payment process.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user action and functional flow (select payment mode and enter details) and validation of input (‘valid details’), so it is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state availability, security, performance, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: System shall authenticate the payment details and proceed to the next interface.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a behavior: authenticate payment details and then proceed in the UI, which is a functional requirement. Because it explicitly involves authentication of payment details, it also implies a security concern (SE). No other quality attributes (availability, performance, scalability, etc.) are mentioned or strongly implied.

RequirementText: User shall enter a one-time password to complete the payment if provided with correct credentials.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional behavior (user must enter a one-time password to complete payment) and implies security/authentication requirement (OTP as part of authentication). No availability, performance, usability, or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall display a successful transaction message after processing the one-time password.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior — displaying a successful transaction message after processing a one-time password — which is a functional requirement. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: User shall provide input through touch, tap, or drag on the screen to perform actions within the application.
AI_Rationale: This defines a user interaction method (touch/tap/drag) — a functional requirement specifying how users perform actions. It also impacts usability/UX, so Usability is applicable. No explicit constraints about performance, security, availability, etc., are stated.

RequirementText: System shall process the user's input and perform the desired action in the application interface.
AI_Rationale: Describes core system behavior: processing user input and performing actions in the interface — a functional requirement. No explicit non-functional qualities (performance, availability, usability, etc.) are specified.

RequirementText: User shall communicate with other users of the application to share resources, compete, or collaborate.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability—users communicating with other users to share, compete, or collaborate. It does not state non-functional constraints (availability, security, usability, scalability, etc.), so only the Functional label is set.

RequirementText: User shall view their progress within the game through graphics and stats generated by the application.
AI_Rationale: This is primarily a functional requirement (feature allowing users to view progress). It also specifies presentation via graphics and stats, which pertains to the look-and-feel/UI, so LF is set. No explicit availability, performance, security, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, legal, fault-tolerance, or usability constraints are stated.

RequirementText: System shall provide stats in numbers and progress bars to display the user's achievements.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a system capability to provide/display stats (numbers and progress bars) describing user achievements — this is a functional display requirement. It does mention UI elements but is primarily about functionality (displaying information), not broader look-and-feel or usability constraints.

RequirementText: User shall be guided through the application functions with a graphics-oriented startup guide.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a graphics-oriented startup guide (visual/look-and-feel) intended to guide users, which impacts usability. No availability, security, performance, portability, scalability, maintainability, or operability requirements are implied.

RequirementText: System shall help the user understand how the application works and how to approach its various functions.
AI_Rationale: Requirement concerns helping users understand and approach functions (guidance, learnability, user assistance). This maps to usability (US). It does not specify functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall be able to delete their account, which will update the database and notify the server.
AI_Rationale: Describes a user-facing capability (delete account) and related backend actions (update database, notify server) which are functional requirements. No availability, security, performance, or other quality constraints are specified.

RequirementText: System shall process the account deletion request and update the database accordingly.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies an action the system must perform (process account deletion and update database) which is functional. No explicit non-functional quality attributes (security, availability, performance, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: System shall have a strong network of servers managed by a qualified team to handle application functionality worldwide.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a global network of servers to handle application functionality (implies availability/reliability) and handling worldwide (implies scalability). Mention of being managed by a qualified team indicates operational/administrative concerns (operability). It does not explicitly mention security, performance metrics, fault-tolerance mechanisms, legal, UI, portability, maintainability, or a specific functional behavior.

RequirementText: System shall maintain a database to store user progress for a seamless gaming experience across sessions.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a system function: maintaining a database to store user progress (persistence across sessions), which is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly state non-functional concerns such as availability, fault tolerance, security, scalability, maintainability, operability, performance, portability, legal, look-and-feel, or usability, so those labels are not set.

RequirementText: System shall authenticate the user before launching the application using the saved username.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies an authentication action (functional behavior) and concerns security (authenticating users). It does not mention availability, performance, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall update the user account after any in-app purchases and display a message for successful transactions.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies concrete system behavior: updating user account after in-app purchases and showing a success message, which is functional. The explicit demand to display a message implies a usability/user-feedback concern, so US is set. No mention of availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, fault tolerance, legal, or look & feel.

RequirementText: System shall provide visual feedback in the form of infographics such as numbers and progress bars for profile changes.
AI_Rationale: Requires the system to provide a feature (visual feedback) — functional. Specifies UI elements (infographics, numbers, progress bars) — look & feel. It also concerns ease of use/feedback to users — usability. No indication of availability, security, performance, etc.

RequirementText: System shall establish a safe connection between users over the network for optimal gaming experiences.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies establishing a "safe connection between users over the network" which indicates security-related concerns (confidentiality/integrity/authentication). It also describes a system capability (establish connection), so it has a functional aspect. Other quality attributes (performance, availability, scalability, etc.) are not explicitly stated; "optimal gaming experiences" is vague and does not firmly specify performance metrics, so those labels were not set.

RequirementText: System shall notify the recipient user of a connection request and allow them to accept or decline.
AI_Rationale: Describes specific system behavior (notify recipient and allow accept/decline), which is a functional requirement. No explicit quality, security, performance, or other non-functional constraints are stated.

RequirementText: System shall notify the sender if the requested user is unavailable.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional behavior (the system shall notify the sender when requested user is unavailable). It does not impose availability, fault-tolerance, security, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: User shall receive a message for any successful or unsuccessful action performed.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior: it must send a message/notification to the user for any successful or unsuccessful action (functional behavior). It also implies user feedback/interaction quality (improves usability), so Usability is marked. Other quality attributes are not explicitly mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall secure in-app purchases via encryption and use a reliable payment gateway.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly mandates encryption for in-app purchases (security) and specifies using a reliable payment gateway, which implies availability/reliability of payment processing. It does not specify fault-tolerance mechanisms, legal, usability, performance, portability, scalability, maintainability, or operability concerns.

RequirementText: System shall update user stats in real time after every achievement or completed action for an enhanced gaming experience.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a functional behavior (update user stats after achievements/actions) and includes a quality constraint of real-time updates, which is a performance/latency requirement. It does not explicitly mention availability, fault tolerance, scalability, security, usability, or other non-functional categories.

RequirementText: User shall receive a message when network coverage is low.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a system behavior (notify user when network coverage is low), which is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state availability, fault tolerance, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: System shall ensure response time between requests and completion is minimal.
AI_Rationale: This requirement explicitly concerns minimizing response time (latency), which is a performance-quality constraint. It does not mention availability, fault tolerance, usability, or other categories.

RequirementText: System shall be optimized for fast loading on supported devices.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly concerns optimization for fast loading, which is a performance (speed/latency) concern. It does not specify functional behavior, availability, portability, scalability, security, or usability aspects explicitly.

RequirementText: The application must be accessible to all users without any charges.
AI_Rationale: "Accessible to all users" implies broad reach/availability (A) and inclusive usability/accessibility (US). "Without any charges" specifies a cost constraint but is not clearly a legal/regulatory requirement or functional behavior in this context, so other labels not set.

RequirementText: System shall provide all necessary security measures during online payments to maintain user privacy and integrity.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly specifies security measures for online payments to maintain privacy and integrity, which maps directly to Security (SE). No mention of availability, performance, fault tolerance, usability, or other qualities.

RequirementText: User data, such as username and email, shall be kept confidential for security purposes
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly states that user data shall be kept confidential for security purposes, which directly maps to Security (confidentiality). It does not specify availability, fault tolerance, legal compliance, or functional behavior beyond the security property.

RequirementText: System shall minimize the response time between user requests and task completion.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly concerns minimizing response time between user requests and task completion, which is a performance (timing/latency) quality attribute. It does not mention availability, fault tolerance, usability, scalability, or other categories.

RequirementText: System shall ensure the application loads quickly on supported devices.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies loading speed/quickness on devices, which is a performance/latency constraint. It does not explicitly state availability, scalability, portability, usability, or other qualities, so only Performance is marked.

RequirementText: The application shall be available to all users without any charges.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies the application must be available to all users (availability requirement) and that access is free of charge, which is a functional/business constraint on what the system should provide. It does not mention performance, security, legal compliance, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall provide necessary security measures during online payments to maintain user privacy and integrity.
AI_Rationale: Specifies security measures for online payments to ensure user privacy and data integrity; this is a clear security (confidentiality/integrity) non-functional requirement. No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: User data such as username and email shall be kept confidential for security purposes.
AI_Rationale: Explicitly requires confidentiality of user data (username and email) for security purposes, which is a security requirement. Does not specify availability, fault tolerance, legal, or other qualities.

RequirementText: The application shall be easy to maintain, with access restricted to a select group of authorized personnel to maintain integrity.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly states 'easy to maintain' (Maintainability) and 'access restricted to a select group of authorized personnel' (Security - access control/integrity). No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to download the Skype application from an application store or similar service on their mobile phone without any charge.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user action/feature: ability to download the application (functional requirement) and that it be free; no non-functional qualities like performance, security, portability, etc., are implied.

RequirementText: User shall have a profile page where they can edit information such as password, email address, and phone number.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a feature: a user profile page with editable fields (password, email, phone), which is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state availability, security, usability, performance, or other quality constraints, so no additional NFR labels are set.

RequirementText: User shall be able to register easily through the mobile application by providing a username, password, and email address; a phone number may also be provided optionally.
AI_Rationale: This is primarily a functional requirement describing user registration (F). The word 'easily' implies a usability concern (US). No explicit performance, security, availability, or other quality constraints are stated.

RequirementText: User shall be able to log in to the mobile application after registering, with the option for automatic login in the future.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional behavior: user login after registration and an optional automatic login feature. It does not explicitly state availability, security, usability, or other quality constraints, so only Functional is set.

RequirementText: User shall be able to retrieve their password via email.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying a feature (password retrieval via email). It does not explicitly state availability, security, performance, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: System shall display the search page as the first page once the user is logged in, enabling them to search for other users based on their preferences.
AI_Rationale: Specifies system behavior: which page to display after login and ability to search for users by preferences — a functional requirement. No quality attributes (performance, security, usability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to choose the type of conversation (video chat, messaging, file transfer, etc.) after selecting the user to communicate with.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user capability (choosing conversation type) which is functional behavior; it does not state any quality, performance, usability, security, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: User shall be able to make Skype-to-Skype calls, calls to mobile and landline phones, and group calls, and use Skype numbers.
AI_Rationale: Specifies user capabilities (making various types of calls and using Skype numbers), which is a functional requirement. No quality attributes (availability, performance, security, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: User shall be able to participate in one-to-one and group video chats.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability: users must be able to participate in one-to-one and group video chats. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: User shall have access to various messaging features, including emojis, emoticons, internet messaging, text messages, and voice messages.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a functional capability (access to various messaging features). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall be able to share files, screen share, conduct group screen sharing, and send contacts.
AI_Rationale: Describes specific user capabilities (sharing files, screen sharing, group screen sharing, sending contacts) — these are functional requirements. No explicit non-functional constraints (performance, security, availability, usability, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: System shall not function without an internet connection.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that the system will not operate offline (i.e., no offline/fault-tolerant behavior). This is a fault-tolerance/offline-capability constraint rather than availability, security, or functional behavior.

RequirementText: The search feature shall be prominent and easy for the user to find, enabling efficient navigation.
AI_Rationale: Requirement concerns prominence and ease of finding the search feature and efficient navigation—these are user interface/look-and-feel and usability concerns rather than functional, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: System shall provide high-quality images and clear quality video calling for an optimal user experience.
AI_Rationale: The requirement requests the system to provide images and video calling (functional). It emphasizes image/video quality affecting user experience, which relates to look-and-feel and usability. Quality of video implies performance constraints (latency/bandwidth), so Performance is included. No explicit security, availability, scalability, portability, maintainability, or operability aspects are stated.

RequirementText: System shall offer quick calling features with minimal response time.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a feature (quick calling) — functional — and explicitly requires minimal response time, which is a performance requirement. No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall tolerate faults and inform the user if the connection to the internet, GPS device, or other inputs are disrupted.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies runtime behavior (tolerate faults and notify the user) — this is both a functional behavior and a fault-tolerance (resilience) quality. No explicit mention of availability, security, performance, usability, or other categories.

RequirementText: System shall handle errors effectively.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies error handling capability, which relates to fault tolerance (resilience, graceful handling/recovery). It also implies maintainability because effective error handling typically aids diagnosing and fixing problems. It does not explicitly mention availability, security, UI, or other qualities.

RequirementText: System shall ensure secure communication between the user and server by encrypting messages during log-in sessions to protect usernames and passwords.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly mandates encrypting communication during log-in to protect usernames and passwords, which is a security (confidentiality/integrity) requirement. It does not specify availability, performance, UI, portability, or other qualities.

RequirementText: System shall encrypt all communication messages during log-in sessions.
AI_Rationale: Requires encrypting communications during log-in sessions, which is a security/confidentiality requirement. No explicit functional behavior beyond quality, nor other quality attributes are specified.

RequirementText: System shall deny access to admin accounts that attempt to log in with non-existing credentials and notify the admin of the log-in failure.
AI_Rationale: Specifies system behavior (deny access and notify) => Functional. Involves authentication/authorization and protection against invalid credentials => Security. Notification to administrator implies maintainability/administration support (monitoring/management) similar to examples, so Maintainability flagged. No explicit availability, performance, scalability, portability, UI look-and-feel, fault-tolerance, or legal aspects stated.

RequirementText: User shall be able to create user credentials by entering first name, last name, address, email, and password, and upon successful creation, be redirected to the dashboard with a confirmation message.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a user-facing capability (creating credentials and redirection with confirmation) — clearly functional. The redirection and confirmation message imply user experience/usability concerns. No explicit availability, security, performance, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, legal, fault-tolerance, or look-and-feel constraints are stated.

RequirementText: User shall be able to post queries, sell, or advertise products by entering personal information such as first name, last name, address, phone number, email, and password, and upon successful submission, receive replies and facilitate sales.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies system behavior: users posting queries and ads, entering personal data, receiving replies and facilitating sales — this is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state availability, security, performance, usability, legal, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: System shall facilitate connections between agricultural product wholesalers and retailers, and farmers and other customers, allowing users to be redirected to the admin dashboard with a success message.
AI_Rationale: Requirement describes system functionality: facilitating connections between parties and redirecting users to an admin dashboard with a success message. No explicit non-functional constraints (availability, performance, security, scalability, usability, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: User shall be able to ask questions to agricultural experts by entering a question and additional information, which will be stored in the database for further processing.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user-facing capability (ask questions and store them in the database) — a functional requirement. No explicit non-functional constraints (performance, security, availability, usability, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: Agricultural experts shall be able to respond to user queries, which will be displayed on the user’s dashboard upon successful reply.
AI_Rationale: Describes a system capability: experts respond to queries and replies are displayed on user's dashboard—clearly a functional requirement. No availability, security, performance, or other quality constraints are mentioned.

RequirementText: Agricultural exports shall be able to post information for users to view by entering agricultural news, books, and technology developments for display.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a capability (posting and viewing agricultural news, books, and technology developments) describing system behavior—this is a functional requirement. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: Agricultural and animal product producers shall be able to add items for sale with product details such as product name, quantity, product rate, required place, and contact details.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a user capability to add items for sale with specific product details — this is a functional behavior. No availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints are mentioned.

RequirementText: Customers shall be able to search for new products in the database by entering item names, and upon successful search, view detailed product information.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies what the system should do (search by item name and show product details), which is a functional requirement. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: Consumers shall be able to purchase agricultural products by searching the database for items for sale, and upon successful search, be redirected to the search results page.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies functional behavior: consumers must be able to search the database, purchase products, and be redirected to the search results page. No non-functional constraints (performance, security, usability, etc.) are stated or implied.

RequirementText: The system shall support concurrent users, enabling multiple users to access information simultaneously with efficient and quick display time changes.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies support for concurrent users (scalability) and emphasizes efficient/quick display time (performance). It does not state legal, security, availability, or usability specifics, nor is it primarily a functional feature request with detailed behavior.

RequirementText: The system shall maintain reliability by ensuring the separate components within the application work consistently, responding smoothly to network errors, handling large datasets and user volume, and avoiding crashes unless due to operating system errors.
AI_Rationale: Requirement describes system reliability: continuous operation (availability), graceful handling of network errors and avoiding crashes (fault tolerance), handling large datasets and user volume (scalability), and implied performance aspects for handling large loads (performance). It is a quality requirement, not functional.

RequirementText: The application shall be available for download on the Google Play Store, allowing users to access it at any time.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional requirement (making the app downloadable from Google Play) and explicitly mentions availability ('access it at any time'), implying an availability requirement. No explicit mention of security, portability, performance, etc.

RequirementText: The system shall provide security by encrypting user passwords stored in the database and protecting against online threats such as SQL injection attacks.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly specifies security measures: encrypting stored passwords and protecting against SQL injection attacks, which are security concerns (authentication/data protection and input validation). No availability, performance, usability, or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: The database shall be maintained using MySQL, and the server will be Apache; in case of system failure, both the database and server can be reinitialized.
AI_Rationale: Specifies recoverability in case of system failure (can be reinitialized) => Fault Tolerance. States specific technologies (MySQL, Apache) which constrains deployment/platform => Portability. The reinitialization capability implies an operational/admin feature (ability to reinitialize) => Operability.

RequirementText: The application shall be built for the Android operating system, limiting compatibility with other systems; it may not function on other operating systems due to system-dependent technologies.
AI_Rationale: Specifies target operating system (Android) and limited compatibility with other OSes, which concerns portability/platform compatibility.

RequirementText: The system shall facilitate the booking of LPG cylinders for users.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a core system capability (booking LPG cylinders for users), i.e., a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, scalability, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: Users shall be able to voluntarily give up their subsidy through the system.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a capability the system must provide (allow users to voluntarily give up subsidy), which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, legal, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The system shall provide information about new government schemes related to LPG.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying that the system shall provide information about new government LPG schemes. No non-functional qualities (security, performance, availability, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: Users shall be able to participate in discussion forums within the system.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a system capability/function (users can participate in discussion forums). It describes what the system should do, with no explicit non-functional quality constraints (availability, performance, usability, security, etc.).

RequirementText: Notifications about important updates and events shall be sent to users through the system.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (sending notifications to users about updates/events), which is a functional requirement. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints explicitly.

RequirementText: Users shall be able to register for a new LPG connection using the system.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying a system capability: allowing users to register for a new LPG connection. No non-functional quality (performance, security, usability, etc.) is specified.

RequirementText: The system shall allow users to provide feedback on their experiences and suggestions.
AI_Rationale: This sentence specifies a system capability (allow users to provide feedback), which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: User shall be able to book LPG cylinder online by registering on the website and selecting the company to be redirected to their portal for booking.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (ability to book an LPG cylinder online via registration and redirection to company portal), which is functional. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: System shall redirect user to the particular company's portal upon selecting a company from the list.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system action (redirect user to a company's portal) triggered by selection—this is a functional requirement about behavior/navigation, with no explicit quality/constraint aspects.

RequirementText: User shall be able to select the online booking option for LPG cylinder.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user capability (selecting the online booking option), i.e., functional behavior. It does not state availability, performance, usability, security, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: User shall be able to enter their consumer number to verify and complete the booking.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user action/functional capability (enter consumer number to verify and complete booking). It does not mention quality attributes like security, usability, performance, etc.

RequirementText: User shall be able to give up LPG subsidy by being redirected to their company's portal and selecting the option.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user capability (functional behavior): ability to give up LPG subsidy via redirection and selection. It does not state availability, security, performance, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: System shall redirect user to the particular company's portal upon selecting 'give up LPG subsidy' option.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional behavior: when user selects an option, the system must perform a redirect to a company portal. No quality attributes (availability, security, usability, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: User shall be able to enter their consumer number to verify and abandon the subsidy.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user capability (enter consumer number to perform verification and abandon subsidy), which is a functional requirement. No explicit non-functional constraints (availability, security, usability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to register for a new LPG connection by being redirected to their company's portal and filling out the registration form.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a user capability (register for new LPG connection via redirection to company portal and completing form), which is a functional requirement. It does not state non-functional aspects like availability, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: System shall redirect user to the particular company's portal upon selecting 'new LPG connection' option.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a concrete system behavior (redirect when user selects 'new LPG connection'), which is a functional requirement. No quality attributes like availability, security, usability, etc., are implied.

RequirementText: User shall be able to enter required details in the registration form for a new LPG connection.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user action/capability (entering details in a registration form), which is functional. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: User shall experience optimal performance above 40 kbps internet speed.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a performance-related constraint (optimal performance dependent on >=40 kbps internet speed). Does not describe functionality, security, availability, scalability, portability, or other qualities explicitly.

RequirementText: System shall require minimum 40 kbps internet speed for optimal performance.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a minimum network bandwidth requirement (quality constraint) affecting system performance, and also represents an operational/environmental prerequisite for deployment/operation.

RequirementText: System shall require users to have Java plug-ins enabled and CSS functioning properly.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies client-side technical prerequisites (Java plug-ins and CSS) which affect UI rendering (Look & Feel) and represent an operational/deployment constraint. It also implies platform/environment compatibility concerns (Portability). It does not state functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System recommends using Google Chrome browser for best experience.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a preferred browser for best experience, indicating a platform/browser compatibility constraint (portability) and impacting user experience/usability. It is a recommendation rather than a strict functional requirement.

RequirementText: System shall authenticate logins and signups for users with accounts.
AI_Rationale: Specifies the system must perform authentication for logins and signups (functional behavior) and enforces security (authentication) requirements.

RequirementText: System shall maintain data integrity by preventing data loss through proper database management.
AI_Rationale: Requirement focuses on maintaining data integrity and preventing data loss via proper database management. This implies security concerns (integrity/confidentiality/anti-loss) and practices that affect maintainability (database management tasks, scripts, procedures). It does not specify availability, performance, portability, UI, legal, or usability aspects.

RequirementText: System shall utilize sessions for transactions to ensure data consistency.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a required system behavior (use of sessions for transactions) so it is a functional requirement. The purpose is to ensure data consistency (integrity), which aligns with security concerns (integrity), so SE is marked. It does not explicitly mention availability, fault tolerance, performance, scalability, portability, usability, maintainability, operability, or legal/look-and-feel aspects.

RequirementText: System shall implement security measures to protect the database from unauthorized access.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly specifies implementing security measures to prevent unauthorized access to the database, which is a security-related constraint. It does not mention functionality, performance, availability, scalability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall restrict users to access only their own accounts after login.
AI_Rationale: Specifies access control limiting users to their own accounts after login — an authorization/security requirement (confidentiality/integrity). Not a performance, availability, or UI requirement.

RequirementText: System shall validate email and phone numbers during signup to ensure uniqueness.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (validation of email and phone during signup and enforcing uniqueness). It does not explicitly mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: System shall encrypt transactions to protect them from unauthorized interception.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly states a functional action ('System shall encrypt transactions') and its purpose is security (protect from unauthorized interception). Thus it is both Functional and Security-related. No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: System shall display new government notifications related to LPG.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a system behavior: displaying new government notifications related to LPG. This is a functional requirement; it does not state availability, performance, security, usability, legal, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: System shall allow users to participate in online discussions about LPG.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing a capability (users participating in online discussions). It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: System shall showcase the latest safety tips and tools for LPG usage.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a system behavior: presenting/showcasing latest safety tips and tools for LPG usage — this is a functional feature. It does not explicitly state quality attributes such as availability, performance, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: System shall display the number of people who have given up LPG subsidy.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying that the system shall display a specific data item (the number of people who gave up LPG subsidy). No non-functional attributes like performance, security, or usability are implied.

RequirementText: System shall advertise new and attractive LPG schemes.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a system action (advertise new LPG schemes), so it's functional. The word 'attractive' likely describes the schemes themselves rather than UI appearance, so Look & Feel not assigned.

RequirementText: User shall not be able to reclaim a subsidy after giving it up.
AI_Rationale: This requirement forbids a user action (reclaiming a subsidy) and therefore describes an access/control constraint. It is best classified as a security requirement (authorization/permission). It does not mention availability, performance, usability, legal compliance, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall not be able to cancel an LPG cylinder booking after 24 hours.
AI_Rationale: This is a business rule restricting user behavior (cancellation allowed only within 24 hours), i.e., functional requirement. It does not specify availability, security, performance, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: User shall not be able to register multiple times on the system.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a constraint on system behavior (preventing multiple registrations) which is functional, and it also relates to account integrity/security (preventing duplicate accounts/abuse), so Security is applicable. No indication of other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Users who give up subsidy will be displayed on the Scroll of Honor.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system behavior: displaying users who give up subsidy on a 'Scroll of Honor'. This is a functional requirement; no quality attributes (performance, security, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: The system shall verify if the image adheres to a standard format.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a system behavior (verify image format), i.e., a functional requirement. It does not explicitly mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: The system shall prompt the user to enter the desired height and width of the cropped image.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user-interaction behavior (prompting for input) which is a functional requirement; no quality/ non-functional aspects are mentioned.

RequirementText: The system shall rotate the picture by 90 degrees.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a concrete system action (rotate an image by 90 degrees), which is a functional requirement describing behavior/feature. No quality/constraint attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: Upon image editing completion, the edited image shall be saved.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system action (saving the edited image) with no quality/constraint aspects, so it's a functional requirement only.

RequirementText: The system shall prompt the user to specify the destination for the import operation.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system behavior (prompt the user to specify destination for import), i.e., a functional interaction requirement. No explicit non-functional quality attributes are stated.

RequirementText: The system shall provide functionalities for adding, updating, and deleting user information.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional behavior (CRUD operations on user information). It does not mention security, availability, performance, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: The system shall prioritize continuous operation and ensure that any interruptions can be demonstrably attributed to a trusted operating system issue.
AI_Rationale: Requirement emphasizes continuous operation (availability) and the ability to attribute interruptions to OS issues (fault tolerance/resilience and diagnostic capability). The need to demonstrably attribute interruptions implies operational logging/traceability and thus operability. It does not specify legal, UI, performance, portability, scalability, security, maintainability, or functional behavior beyond the availability/diagnostic aspects.

RequirementText: The software shall be designed for cross-platform compatibility, ensuring it runs on Microsoft Windows, Apple Macintosh, Android phones, iPhones, and personal computers.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly specifies cross-platform compatibility (runs on Windows, macOS, Android, iPhone, PCs) which is a portability concern. It also relates to operability/deployment across target platforms, so Operability is included. No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: The system shall employ security measures considered standard for software applications that access user email.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly mandates security measures for applications that access user email, which is a clear security (SE) concern. It does not specify availability, fault tolerance, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Adobe Photoshop shall be designed to achieve a rapid operational restart, minimizing customer inconvenience.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies rapid operational restart to minimize customer inconvenience — this primarily concerns fault tolerance/resilience (FT) and reduces downtime (availability, A). It also pertains to operability (O) since it concerns operational restart procedures and manageability.

RequirementText: The system shall be accompanied by well-documented code, user documentation, and help systems, all designed for clarity and ease of understanding.
AI_Rationale: Specifies presence of developer and user documentation and help systems for clarity—this directly targets maintainability (documentation for developers/changes) and usability (user documentation and help). No mention of other qualities.

RequirementText: The Khan Academy platform shall be accessible for use by participating schools.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies that the platform must be accessible to a particular user group (participating schools) — implying availability/accessibility and likely access control (authorized access), so Availability and Security are applicable.

RequirementText: The Khan Academy platform shall offer instructional resources in mathematics.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying that the platform shall provide instructional math resources. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: The Khan Academy platform shall provide students with opportunities to practice and refine math skills.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability of the platform — providing students opportunities to practice and refine math skills. It does not explicitly address availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: The Khan Academy platform shall provide students with immediate feedback on their performance.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a functional capability (providing feedback), and the qualifier 'immediate' indicates a timeliness/performance constraint. It also implies usability concerns (helps users learn quickly). No other quality attributes are specified.

RequirementText: The Khan Academy platform shall provide opportunities for students to learn independently.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies a capability the platform must offer (opportunities for independent learning), i.e., a functional requirement. It does not explicitly mention usability metrics, availability, performance, security, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: The Khan Academy platform shall be easy to use for students and teachers with varying levels of technical experience.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies ease of use for users with varying technical experience, which is a usability concern. It does not mention specific UI look-and-feel, performance, availability, security, or other non-functional categories.

RequirementText: The Khan Academy platform shall be accessible on a variety of devices, including computers, tablets, and laptops.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies support across multiple device types (computers, tablets, laptops), which indicates platform/device portability/compatibility. It does not explicitly mention availability, usability, performance, or other qualities.

RequirementText: The Khan Academy platform shall be reliable and available for use during school hours.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly specifies availability during school hours ('available for use during school hours') and mentions reliability, which pertains to availability. It does not specify fault tolerance mechanisms, performance, security, usability, or other qualities, so only Availability is marked.

RequirementText: The Khan Academy platform shall provide data and reports to help teachers monitor student progress.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (providing data and reports for teachers to monitor student progress). It does not explicitly state availability, security, performance, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: The Khan Academy platform shall be engaging for students.
AI_Rationale: ‘Engaging for students’ describes a user experience quality (usability/UX). It does not specify functionality, performance, availability, security, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, or legal concerns, nor explicitly mention visual design details.

RequirementText: The system shall store customer and prospect information in a centralized CRM database.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (storing customer and prospect information in a centralized CRM database). It does not explicitly state availability, security, legal, performance, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: The system shall allow users to create, schedule, track, and manage tasks related to sales activities.
AI_Rationale: Describes functional capabilities (create, schedule, track, manage tasks). No non-functional constraints (performance, availability, usability, etc.) are specified.

RequirementText: The system shall integrate with Gmail and Outlook to provide access to sales productivity tools within user inboxes.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies integration with external email platforms (Gmail and Outlook), which is about interoperability/operability and platform compatibility (portability). It does not state performance, security, availability, or UI aesthetics, nor is it framed as a usability metric, so only O and PO are set.

RequirementText: The system shall provide tools for sending bulk emails, creating customized emails, and tracking email performance.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies system functionality (tools to send bulk emails, create customized emails, and track performance), which is functional. It does not explicitly state availability, security, scalability, operability, or other quality constraints, so those labels are not applied.

RequirementText: The system shall offer built-in analytics to track marketing activities, user sessions, engagement metrics, and campaign performance.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (built-in analytics to track various metrics). It does not explicitly mention availability, performance, security, scalability, usability, or other non-functional attributes.

RequirementText: The system shall provide tools for capturing leads through forms, landing pages, and chatbots.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (tools to capture leads via forms, landing pages, chatbots). It does not explicitly state non-functional concerns such as availability, security, usability, performance, etc.

RequirementText: The system shall offer automation tools and workflows to streamline tasks, engage leads, and nurture customer relationships.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies functional capabilities (automation tools and workflows for tasks, lead engagement, and relationship nurturing). No non-functional qualities such as performance, security, availability, or usability are stated.

RequirementText: The system shall allow users to segment contacts based on various criteria for targeted communication.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a system capability (allow users to segment contacts) — a functional requirement. It does not explicitly address availability, performance, security, scalability, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: The system shall enable users to generate reports and analyze sales data and marketing trends.
AI_Rationale: The statement describes a functional capability: users generating reports and analyzing sales/marketing trends. It does not specify non-functional aspects like availability, performance, usability, security, scalability, etc., so only Functional is set.

RequirementText: The system shall provide an API for integration with other software applications.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a functional capability (providing an API for integration). It does not explicitly state non-functional concerns such as security, portability, performance, availability, or usability.

RequirementText: The system shall offer a meeting scheduling tool and live chat functionality to connect with prospects and customers.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies functional features (meeting scheduling tool and live chat). It does not state non-functional constraints like availability, performance, security, usability, scalability, etc.

RequirementText: The system shall provide a mobile app for accessing CRM functionalities on the go.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability — providing a mobile app to access CRM features. It does not explicitly state non-functional aspects such as security, performance, portability across platforms, usability, availability, or scalability, so only Functional is marked.

RequirementText: The system shall offer a customer support portal for managing customer relationships and resolving post-service issues.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (a customer support portal for managing relationships and resolving issues). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes explicitly, so only Functional is set to true.

RequirementText: The system shall provide a ticketing system for organizing and managing customer queries.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (providing a ticketing system to organize/manage customer queries). It does not mention availability, security, performance, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The system shall offer SEO recommendations for improving website and content search engine ranking.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability: offering SEO recommendations (a functional feature). It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: The system shall integrate with various third-party applications (e.g., SurveyMonkey, Eventbrite) to enhance functionality.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a functional capability (integration with third-party applications) so F=1. Integration implies interoperability/operability concerns (administration, interfacing), and compatibility with external platforms, so O=1 and PO=1. No explicit mentions of availability, security, performance, scalability, legal, look-and-feel, or maintainability.

RequirementText: The system shall be scalable to support at least 200 concurrent connections (P1).
AI_Rationale: Specifies scalability target (support at least 200 concurrent connections). This is a capacity/scalability non-functional requirement; does not explicitly state performance, availability, security, or functional behavior.

RequirementText: The system shall not lose any orders or customer payments under any circumstances (P2, P3).
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies that the system must never lose orders or customer payments, which is a reliability requirement implying high availability and fault tolerance (data durability/recovery). It does not explicitly address security, performance, usability, portability, etc.

RequirementText: The system should be accessible on various devices (mobile app implies mobile accessibility).
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies access on various devices/mobile accessibility — this concerns portability (cross-device compatibility) and usability (user access on mobile). No mention of availability, security, performance, etc.

RequirementText: User shall be able to log in and log out to the system to verify authorization for system usage.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies the authentication functionality (login/logout), so it is Functional. It also relates to authorization/security (verifying authorization), so Security is applicable. No explicit non-functional qualities like availability, performance, usability, etc., are stated.

RequirementText: User shall be able to register students through the website, and the admin shall be able to register new students.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional capabilities (users and admins registering students). It does not mention availability, performance, security, UI look-and-feel, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall be able to generate fee challans from the site, and the admin shall update fee details.
AI_Rationale: Specifies functional capabilities: users generate fee challans and admins update fee details. No non-functional quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: User (teacher) shall be able to update students' marks on the site, and students shall be able to download their marks report.
AI_Rationale: Specifies functional capabilities: teachers updating marks and students downloading reports. No explicit non-functional aspects (security, performance, usability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: User (teacher) shall be able to mark, view, and update students' attendance; the system shall display attendance to the respective student, and students shall be able to download attendance reports from the system.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies actions the system must provide (mark, view, update attendance; display to students; allow download of attendance reports), which are functional behaviors. It does not mention availability, performance, security, UI style, or other non-functional attributes.

RequirementText: User (admin) shall be able to provide information about the courses and teachers, as well as view and update course details.
AI_Rationale: Specifies capabilities for an admin to provide, view, and update course/teacher information — describes system functionality (CRUD). No explicit non-functional constraints (security, performance, usability, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: User (admin) shall be able to provide information about scholarships, and eligible students shall be able to apply for scholarships through the system.
AI_Rationale: Describes functional capabilities: admin enters scholarship info and students apply. No explicit availability, security, usability, performance, or other non-functional constraints mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall respond in less than 2 seconds.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a quantitative response-time constraint (<=2 seconds), which is a performance (PE) non-functional requirement. It does not mention usability, availability, fault tolerance, or other qualities.

RequirementText: System shall remain available to the user without crashing.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies that the system must remain available and not crash, which directly maps to Availability. The 'without crashing' phrasing implies resilience/recovery behavior, so Fault Tolerance is also applicable. No functional behavior or other quality attributes are specified.

RequirementText: System shall be compatible with Windows and Linux operating systems.
AI_Rationale: Specifying compatibility with Windows and Linux refers to running on multiple operating systems, which is a portability requirement. It does not mention availability, operability, performance, security, or other qualities.

RequirementText: System shall be able to store up to 300GB of data.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a capacity limit (ability to store up to 300GB). That is a scalability concern (data volume the system must handle) and also relates to performance/resource usage (storage capacity). No functional behavior, availability, security, or other qualities are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall run on devices with less than 1GB RAM.
AI_Rationale: Specifies target hardware constraint (must run on devices with <1GB RAM). This implies portability to low-memory environments (PO) and a memory/resource usage/performance constraint (PE). No other qualities are explicitly mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall protect against damage.
AI_Rationale: The statement is a capability requirement (system shall protect) so labeled as Functional. It broadly implies protection/resilience against damage, indicating fault tolerance/recovery aspects (FT). It also relates to safeguarding assets, which maps to Security (SE). No explicit mention of availability, legal, usability, performance, scalability, portability, look-and-feel, maintainability, or operability.

RequirementText: System shall restore data if a database crash occurs.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies the system must restore data after a database crash, which is a functional capability and primarily a fault-tolerance/recovery concern. No explicit availability, security, performance, or other non-functional aspects are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall ensure the privacy of students and teachers; data shall not be stolen or accessed by non-users.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies protection of data from unauthorized access and theft (confidentiality), which is a security concern. It also prescribes a system behavior (ensuring privacy/access control), so marked as functional as well. No mention of availability, performance, portability, scalability, or other qualities.

RequirementText: System shall allow only admins to update the database.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a capability (only admins can update the database) — a functional constraint — and imposes an authorization/security restriction, so F and SE apply. No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: System shall restrict access to modules based on user roles, preventing students from updating marks.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies access control based on user roles (preventing students from updating marks), which is a security (authorization) constraint rather than a general functional feature.

RequirementText: System shall be available 24 hours a day.
AI_Rationale: Explicitly states continuous availability (24 hours a day), which is an availability requirement. No other quality attributes or functional details are specified.

RequirementText: System shall protect against data loss.
AI_Rationale: Protecting against data loss primarily concerns resilience, backups and recovery — a fault-tolerance requirement. The statement does not explicitly mention security, availability targets, or other qualities.

RequirementText: System shall interconnect with other systems.
AI_Rationale: Requirement states the system shall interconnect with other systems — this is a functional capability (F) and implies interoperability/compatibility across systems/environments (portability, PO). No explicit availability, security, scalability, or other qualities are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall be reliable with no failures.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies system reliability and 'no failures', which directly implies availability (uptime/reliability) and fault tolerance/resilience. It does not mention security, usability, performance, portability, maintainability, or other aspects.

RequirementText: System shall be easy to learn and use.
AI_Rationale: Statement explicitly specifies ease of learning and use, which corresponds to usability (user experience/learnability). No other quality attributes or functional behavior are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall be flexible.
AI_Rationale: 'Flexible' is a vague quality attribute most commonly referring to the system's ability to be changed or extended, which maps to maintainability. The statement does not explicitly mention availability, performance, portability, usability, security, or other specific qualities, so only Maintainability is set.

RequirementText: System shall be robust.
AI_Rationale: 'Robust' most directly refers to fault tolerance/resilience to failures. Other qualities (availability, performance, security) are not explicitly stated, so only FT is set.

RequirementText: System shall be testable.
AI_Rationale: "Testable" is a requirement about the ease of testing and verification of the system, which maps to maintainability (testability is a subcharacteristic of maintainability). It does not specify functional behavior or other quality attributes explicitly.

RequirementText: Admin shall monitor the whole process.
AI_Rationale: Specifies an administrative capability ('Admin shall monitor the whole process') — a functional requirement to provide monitoring. It also implies operability/administration concerns (monitoring the system/process). No explicit mentions of availability, fault tolerance, security, performance, scalability, portability, look & feel, usability, or maintainability.

RequirementText: HEC rules shall be implemented while creating the system.
AI_Rationale: HEC rules refers to regulatory/business rules to be implemented—this is a compliance/legal requirement. No other quality attributes are specified.

RequirementText: Only teachers shall mark students' attendance; neither admin nor students shall do so.
AI_Rationale: Specifies an authorization constraint (who is allowed to perform attendance marking), i.e., access control—a security requirement.

RequirementText: Fee shall be paid by students and verified by the admin.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior: students pay fees and admin verifies them. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Only eligible students shall apply for scholarships, which shall be verified by the admin.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying behavior: only eligible students may apply and admin must verify eligibility. It does not explicitly state availability, security, performance, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: Users shall be able to register with a unique ID using their email address.
AI_Rationale: This sentence specifies a functional capability: users must be able to register with a unique ID using their email address. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints explicitly.

RequirementText: Users shall be able to log in using a username and password, which must match the authentication criteria. If the login is successful, users can access the provided functionalities of the system.
AI_Rationale: Specifies user login functionality (what system should do) and authentication using username/password, which is a security requirement (authn). No mention of availability, performance, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Admin shall be able to manage tournaments by creating a unique ID for each new tournament, scheduling matches, and conducting one tournament at a time.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies what the admin shall be able to do (create unique IDs, schedule matches, conduct one tournament at a time) — these are functional behaviors. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, scalability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: Admin shall be able to manage teams, including creating a unique ID for each team and managing team details.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability: admins managing teams (create unique team IDs and manage team details). It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: The system shall be able to update match statistics, including match date and result, and display the updated statistics.
AI_Rationale: Requirement describes functional behavior: ability to update and display match statistics. It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The system shall be able to update team statistics, including team and player performance, and display the team statistics.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional behavior: updating and displaying team and player statistics. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints, so only the Functional label is set.

RequirementText: Admin shall be able to schedule matches by specifying the date, time, and location, as well as reschedule matches due to bad weather conditions.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a capability (admin can schedule and reschedule matches with date/time/location and handle weather-related rescheduling), which is functional behavior. It does not explicitly state availability, fault-tolerance, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: Admin shall be able to declare match results, including the names of the winning and losing teams and the final score.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system capability (an admin function) to declare match results and record specific data fields (winning/losing teams and final score), which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: Admin shall be able to edit match and stadium details, including match descriptions and stadium locations.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (admin can edit match and stadium details). It does not mention availability, security, performance, UI look/feel, maintainability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: Only admin shall know the number of bidders bidding on teams and their details.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies an access restriction (only admin may know bidder counts and details), which is a security (confidentiality/authorization) concern. It also implies functional behavior (who can view this information), so marked as Functional as well. No indication of availability, performance, portability, etc.

RequirementText: Only admin shall know the percentage of bidders bidding on a particular team, and the system shall display the bidding percentages.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system behavior to display bidding percentages (functional) and restricts visibility to admins (security/authorization/confidentiality). No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: Bidders shall be able to view the bidder leaderboard, including the top three positions, without seeing other bidders' predictions.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a capability (view leaderboard and top three) — functional. Also requires hiding other bidders' predictions (information confidentiality/privacy), which is a security requirement. No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: Bidders shall be able to view the team leaderboard in ascending order of points and use the information for bidding decisions.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability: bidders must be able to view the team leaderboard in ascending order and use that information for bidding. This describes functional behavior (what the system should do). It does not explicitly specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: Bidders shall be able to choose the team they wish to bid on until the toss occurs; once the toss happens, the match is frozen.
AI_Rationale: Specifies system behavior: bidders can select teams until a specific event (toss), after which the match is frozen. This describes functional requirements (what the system should do) with no explicit non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: Bidders shall score points based on their predictions, with point values varying depending on the point difference between the two teams playing.
AI_Rationale: Describes functional behavior: how bidders are scored based on predictions and point differences. No quality/constraint requirements (availability, security, performance, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: User shall be able to initialize the ATM with a specified amount of cash and other parameters.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a capability the system must provide (ability for a user to initialize the ATM with cash and parameters), which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, security, operability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall display the initial screen if no cash card is present.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a concrete system behavior (display initial screen) under a specific condition (no cash card present), which is a functional requirement. No non-functional qualities are implied.

RequirementText: System shall not accept cards if running out of cash and display an error message.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies system behavior: reject card transactions when cash is depleted and show an error message. This is a functional behavior; it does not explicitly state availability, fault tolerance, security, usability metrics, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: User shall be able to insert a cash card, and the ATM shall check its validity, including card information readability and expiration date.
AI_Rationale: Describes a user-facing capability and system behavior: inserting a cash card and the ATM checking its validity (readability and expiration). This is a functional requirement; no explicit non-functional constraints (security, availability, performance, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: System shall read the serial number and bank code from a valid cash card and initiate the authorization dialog.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies concrete system behavior (reading card serial and bank code and initiating an authorization dialog). It describes functional operations rather than availability, security mechanisms, UI look-and-feel, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall log the serial number of a valid cash card.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a concrete system action (logging a serial number) — a functional requirement. No explicit non-functional aspects (security, availability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall enter a password, and the ATM shall verify the password and bank code with the bank's computer.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing user action and system behavior (verify password and bank code). It also implies security/authentication concerns (password verification), so Security is applicable. Other non-functional labels are not explicitly stated.

RequirementText: System shall handle different negative responses from the bank, such as incorrect password, unsupported bank code, or account issues, and reject the card.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies system behavior (handling negative bank responses and rejecting the card), which is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly address availability, fault-tolerance, security, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: System shall proceed with the authorization process if the password and serial number are correct.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (proceed with authorization when password and serial number are correct), so it is functional. It explicitly concerns authentication/authorization, a security concern, so Security is also marked. No explicit mentions of availability, performance, portability, scalability, usability, maintainability, legal, operability, or fault tolerance.

RequirementText: System shall retain a cash card if entered more than three times with incorrect passwords and prompt the user to contact the bank.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement prescribing specific system behavior (retain card after three incorrect PIN attempts and prompt user). It also addresses security (fraud prevention/account protection), so SE is set. No explicit availability, performance, usability, legal, or other NFRs are implied.

RequirementText: User shall be able to withdraw cash by entering the desired amount, and the ATM shall check if the amount is within predefined limits.
AI_Rationale: Specifies user action (withdraw cash) and system behavior (check amount within predefined limits), which are functional requirements. No explicit non-functional constraints (performance, security, availability, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: System shall redo the transaction if the withdrawal amount exceeds allowed limits.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a system action (redo the transaction) in response to a condition (withdrawal amount exceeds allowed limits) — a functional requirement. It also describes a recovery/handling behavior (redo on error/limit breach), which aligns with fault-tolerance/resilience, so FT is set. No explicit mentions of availability, security, performance, usability, etc.

RequirementText: System shall perform the transaction by sending a request to the bank computer and waiting for a response.
AI_Rationale: The statement describes a system behavior: performing a transaction by sending a request to the bank computer and waiting for a response, which is a functional requirement. It does not specify availability, performance, fault tolerance, security, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: System shall dispense cash if the transaction is successful and print a receipt while updating the cash amount and ejecting the card.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies concrete system behaviors (dispense cash, print receipt, update cash amount, eject card) which are functional requirements. It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: User shall collect the dispensed cash, and the ATM shall log the transaction amount against the serial number and send a response to the bank.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies concrete system behaviors: dispensing cash, logging the transaction with serial number, and sending a response to the bank — these are functional actions. It does not state availability, security, performance, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: System shall display an error message and return the card if a transaction is unsuccessful.
