RequirementText: Owner's input for updating the stocks shall be processed, and the database shall be updated accordingly.
AI_Rationale: Describes system behavior: processing owner's input and updating the database. This is a functional requirement; it does not state availability, performance, security, maintainability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: The updated product list shall be shown to the customer.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior — presenting an updated product list to the customer. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes, so only Functional is marked.

RequirementText: Customer shall add products to their cart and proceed to checkout.
AI_Rationale: Specifies user actions (adding products to cart and proceeding to checkout) — a functional requirement. No explicit quality constraints (performance, usability, security, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: During checkout, the customer shall input details such as name, mobile number, and location.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying that the system shall collect customer input (name, mobile, location) during checkout. It does not specify quality attributes such as availability, performance, security, or usability.

RequirementText: After checkout, the system shall send the list of ordered products to the grocery store owner.
AI_Rationale: This is a clear functional requirement describing a system action (sending ordered products list to store owner after checkout). It does not specify availability, performance, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: The owner shall confirm and pack the order and hand it over to the delivery person.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies functional behavior (owner confirms, packs, and hands over order). It does not mention availability, security, performance, usability, or other non-functional attributes.

RequirementText: After confirmation, the customer shall receive a notification that the order is confirmed and will be delivered shortly.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behaviour (send a notification to the customer after confirmation) describing what the system should do; it does not impose availability, security, performance, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: User shall expect the Big Basket server to be operational 24*7 without any interruptions.
AI_Rationale: Specifies continuous operational uptime (24x7, no interruptions) — an availability requirement. Does not explicitly mention fault tolerance, performance, scalability, or other qualities.

RequirementText: System shall ensure maximum security by encrypting user data such as name, password, and account balance during transmission.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies encrypting user data during transmission to ensure security/confidentiality; this is a security (SE) non-functional requirement and does not imply other qualities.

RequirementText: The system shall be designed for easy maintenance to quickly address any errors that occur in the project.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly states the system shall be designed for easy maintenance to quickly address errors, which directly targets maintainability. It does not specify availability, fault-tolerance mechanisms, usability, security, or other quality attributes, so only MN is set.

RequirementText: User shall register for the examination.

RequirementText: User shall login to access the examination portal.

RequirementText: User shall view and select available examination categories.

RequirementText: User shall submit answers and view results after completion.

RequirementText: User shall login to access the examiner portal.

RequirementText: User shall view examination schedules and details.

RequirementText: ReCaptcha shall be implemented to enhance security during authentication.

AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional capability (user can select multiple options for searching). It does not impose availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: User shall display only 10 matching results on the current screen.

RequirementText: User shall enable navigation between the search results.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (ability to navigate between search results), which is a functional requirement. It also implies a usability concern (navigation/UX). No performance, security, availability, or other non-functional aspects are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall notify the user when no matching product is found on the search.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (notify the user when no matching product is found), which is functional. It does not specify availability, performance, UI appearance, security, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: System shall utilize user cookies to study the buying pattern of the user.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies a system behavior: using user cookies to study buying patterns (a functional data-collection/analytics requirement). It does not explicitly state security/privacy, legal, performance, or other quality attributes, so only the Functional label is set.

RequirementText: System shall customize the user's homepage based on previous interactions, including wish-list additions, page views, and previous searches.
AI_Rationale: Specifies system behavior to customize homepage based on user interactions (functional). The goal is personalization to improve user experience, so usability is also implied.

RequirementText: System shall display related items to the items already bought by the user.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a functional behavior: the system must display related items (a recommendation/display feature). No non-functional qualities (performance, security, usability, etc.) are explicitly stated.

RequirementText: System shall recommend similar items based on the user's buying pattern.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability: recommending similar items based on a user's buying pattern (recommendation feature). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, scalability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall display similar products with high ratings, newly in-stock items, or items featured at special discount prices.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies what the system should display (similar products filtered by high ratings, newly in-stock, or special discounts), which is a functional behavior. It does not specify availability, performance, UI layout, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall display all related items that other users purchased in addition to the selected product.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (display related items other users purchased). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall provide an interface for sellers to add product description and price through their account.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a functional capability: providing an interface for sellers to add product description and price via their account. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, look-and-feel, or other non-functional aspects explicitly, so only Functional is marked.

RequirementText: System shall list all sellers offering a common product and prioritize them based on the percentage of discount.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies functional behavior: list sellers and prioritize by discount percentage. No non-functional qualities (availability, performance, security, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: User shall be able to return items to the seller if not satisfied and provide feedback.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a user capability (return items and provide feedback), which is a functional requirement. It does not state non-functional qualities like availability, security, usability metrics, etc.

RequirementText: User shall be able to exchange items with the seller in case of delivery of defective items and provide feedback.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user capability (exchange defective items and provide feedback), which is a functional behavior. It does not state non-functional constraints such as performance, security, availability, usability, or others.

RequirementText: System shall notify the seller about the customer's reasons and feedback regarding the product.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (the system shall notify the seller about customer reasons and feedback). It does not mention availability, performance, security, UI, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: User and seller profiles shall contain contact, location, address, and seller's license details.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies what data fields must be present in user and seller profiles (contact, location, address, seller's license), which is a functional specification of system behavior/data. It does not mention availability, security, UI/look-and-feel, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall display both active and completed order history in the customer profile.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior: the system must display active and completed order history within the customer profile. It does not impose availability, performance, security, UI style, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: System shall allow users to select orders from the order history and view detailed information.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (select orders from history and view details). It does not specify availability, performance, usability, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall display the most frequently searched items by the user in the profile.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying that the system shall display personalized content (most frequently searched items) in the user profile. It does not specify non-functional aspects like performance, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: System shall assist sellers in keeping a list of products and their information in their profile.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability: the system should assist sellers in maintaining a product list and related information in their profile. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: System shall safely transfer money to the seller's bank account after successful transactions.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a system action (transfer money after successful transactions) — functional. The word "safely" implies security measures (confidentiality/integrity/secure transfer), so Security is applicable. No explicit mentions of availability, performance, scalability, fault tolerance, legal, usability, portability, or maintainability.

RequirementText: System shall add details of money transfer to the company's event logs and database.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (adding money transfer details to event logs and database), which is a functional specification. It does not mention availability, security, operability, or other quality attributes explicitly.

RequirementText: System shall send order confirmation to the user and seller through email or SMS.
AI_Rationale: Specifies an action the system must perform (sending order confirmations via email or SMS). No quality attributes (availability, performance, security, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: System shall display a detailed invoice for the current order once confirmed.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (displaying a detailed invoice when an order is confirmed). It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: User shall be able to print the invoice.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user capability (printing an invoice), which is a functional behavior. It does not mention quality attributes such as availability, performance, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: System shall display detailed information of seller's details to the customer and vice versa.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a system action to display seller and customer details (functional). It does not mention availability, security, usability, performance, or other non-functional aspects explicitly.

RequirementText: System shall provide a shopping cart during online purchase.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (providing a shopping cart) during online purchase. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall be able to add/remove products in the shopping cart.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (ability for user to add/remove products in cart). It does not state availability, performance, usability, security or other quality constraints, so only Functional is marked.

RequirementText: User shall confirm orders for purchase later.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing a user action (confirming orders to purchase later). It does not specify quality attributes like availability, security, performance, etc.

RequirementText: System shall allow users to enter order information for tracking.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies a system capability: allowing users to enter order information for tracking, which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall display the current tracking information about the order.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior (displaying current tracking information), which is functional. It contains no explicit non-functional constraints such as performance, availability, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: System shall notify the seller about the delivery of the product to the consumer.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional behavior (system shall notify seller upon delivery). No quality attributes (availability, security, performance, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall display available payment methods for payment.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (displaying available payment methods). It does not mention any non-functional qualities such as performance, security, availability, usability, or legal constraints.

RequirementText: User shall be able to select the payment method for the order.
AI_Rationale: This is a basic functional requirement specifying that the user can choose a payment method for an order. It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability enhancements, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall provide online help, FAQs, and sitemap options for customer support.
AI_Rationale: Describes a feature the system must provide (online help, FAQs, sitemap) — functional. These features directly support ease of use and user assistance, so usability is indicated. No explicit quality attributes like security, availability, scalability, etc., are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall be able to select the support type.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing a user action (select support type). It does not specify availability, performance, security, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: User shall enter customer and product information for support.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing a user action to enter customer and product information for support. No non-functional quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall display user contact of the seller and Flipkart support desk.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (displaying contact information for seller and support). It does not state quality attributes like availability, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: System shall display online help and FAQs upon request.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement specifying that the system shall display online help and FAQs on user request. It does not explicitly state non-functional aspects such as availability, performance, security, usability standards, or others.

RequirementText: User shall access the product through a web server.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies the operational deployment/access method (users access via a web server), which is an operability/operational environment constraint. It does not specify security, performance, portability, or functional behavior beyond access channel.

RequirementText: User shall experience initial load time based on internet connection strength and the media used to run the product.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies initial load time depending on internet connection and media, which is a performance-related quality attribute (latency/load time). It does not specify functionality, portability, availability, or other NFRs explicitly.

RequirementText: System shall use secure sockets in all transactions involving confidential customer information.
AI_Rationale: Specifies use of secure sockets for transactions involving confidential customer information, which is a security requirement (confidentiality/integrity in transit). No other qualities (availability, performance, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: System shall confirm all transactions with the customer’s web browser.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a system behavior (confirm transactions via the customer's web browser), so it is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state availability, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall not store any cookies containing the user’s password or confidential information on the customer’s computer.
AI_Rationale: This requirement explicitly prohibits storing sensitive information (passwords, confidential data) in cookies on the user's computer, which is a confidentiality/security constraint. It does not specify functional behavior, performance, availability, etc.

RequirementText: User's password shall be displayed in the web browser with special characters representing typed characters.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a concrete system behavior (masking password characters) — functional. It explicitly prescribes UI presentation (special characters) — Look & Feel. Masking implies a confidentiality/security requirement, so Security is marked. Other qualities not mentioned.

RequirementText: User's credit card number shall only display the last 4 digits after retrieval from the database.
AI_Rationale: Specifies system behavior (only show last 4 digits) which is a functional display requirement, and primarily enforces confidentiality/privacy of card data (security). No indications of availability, performance, portability, etc.

RequirementText: System’s back-end servers shall not display a customer’s password and shall only be accessible to authenticated administrators.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies access control (only authenticated administrators) and confidentiality (do not display customer passwords), which are security concerns. No indications of availability, performance, usability, etc.

RequirementText: Back-end databases shall be encrypted and within the company’s perimeter.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that back-end databases must be encrypted and kept within the company perimeter — both are security-related constraints (confidentiality and deployment to a trusted network). No functional behavior or other quality attributes are explicitly required.

RequirementText: Reliability of the system depends on the reliability of its separate components.
AI_Rationale: The statement concerns system reliability and its dependence on component reliability, which relates to availability and fault tolerance (resilience to component failures). It does not specify functional behavior, security, performance, or other qualities.

RequirementText: Backup of the database shall be continuously maintained and updated to reflect the most recent changes.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies that the system must maintain and continuously update database backups to reflect recent changes. That is a functional behavior (the system must perform backups) and primarily addresses fault tolerance/resilience (ensuring data can be recovered), so F and FT are set. It does not explicitly mention availability, security, performance, portability, scalability, maintainability, operability, legal, look-and-feel, or usability.

RequirementText: System shall ensure protection against various types of failures, damage, or harm, including physical, social, financial, and psychological.
AI_Rationale: The requirement concerns protecting the system and stakeholders from failures, damage, or harm, which implies resilience and recovery capabilities (Fault Tolerance). It also addresses protection/security aspects (physical, social, financial, psychological), so Security is applicable. It does not specify functional behavior, availability metrics, legal, usability, or other listed quality attributes.

RequirementText: Maintaining the database will be facilitated by a commercial database and the application server.
AI_Rationale: The statement concerns facilitating maintenance of the database via use of a commercial database and application server. This explicitly relates to maintainability (ease of maintenance) and also to operability/administration (deployment/runtime platform). It does not specify functional behavior, performance, security, scalability, portability, legal, look-and-feel, or usability requirements.

RequirementText: In case of failure, the program will undergo re-initialization.
AI_Rationale: Specifies behavior upon failure (the system will re-initialize), which is a fault-tolerance/recovery requirement. It does not state availability metrics, general functional features, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Software design will prioritize modularity for efficient maintainability.
AI_Rationale: Explicitly states prioritizing modularity to enable efficient maintainability, which directly targets the Maintainability quality attribute.

RequirementText: User interacts with the payment processing feature through HTML and CSS code.
AI_Rationale: Specifies how the user interacts with the payment feature (functional) and indicates presentation/UI technologies (HTML/CSS), which pertains to look-and-feel. No explicit availability, security, portability, or other quality constraints mentioned.

RequirementText: User inputs their UPI ID into the designated fields.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing a user action (entering their UPI ID into specified fields). It does not state quality attributes like performance, security, or usability.

RequirementText: The system handles the click event on the "Pay Now" button using JavaScript code.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional behavior (handling the Pay Now button click) and an implementation detail (use of JavaScript). No explicit non-functional quality attributes like availability, performance, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: Upon successful payment processing, users are redirected to the payment success page.
AI_Rationale: This describes a specific system behavior (post-payment redirect), which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: The payment success page structure and content are defined using HTML code.
AI_Rationale: Specifies the payment success page's structure and content (a functional requirement) and concerns presentation implemented in HTML (look & feel). No availability, security, portability, or other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: JavaScript code includes error handling mechanisms to display error messages if payment processing fails.
AI_Rationale: Specifies showing error messages (functional behavior). Mentions error handling for failures, implying graceful handling/resilience (fault tolerance). Displaying errors impacts user experience (usability). No explicit constraints about availability, performance, security, portability, etc.

RequirementText: User adds items to the cart using JavaScript code.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional behavior: the user adds items to the cart. Mentioning JavaScript is an implementation detail but does not introduce a non-functional constraint (security, performance, etc.). Therefore only Functional is set.

RequirementText: User views the cart contents, which are managed by JavaScript code.
AI_Rationale: Describes a user capability — viewing cart contents — which is functional. Mention of JavaScript is an implementation detail, not a quality attribute like performance, security, or usability.

RequirementText: HTML and CSS define the structure and styling of the cart interface.
AI_Rationale: Specifies structure and styling of the cart interface (HTML/CSS), which pertains to look-and-feel/UI presentation rather than functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: JavaScript functions process user actions and update the cart display accordingly.
AI_Rationale: Describes functional behavior: JavaScript processes user actions and updates the cart display. No explicit non-functional constraints (availability, performance, security, look-and-feel, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: HTML code generates the cart display based on the current contents of the cart.
AI_Rationale: Describes a functional behavior: generating/displaying the cart based on its contents. No quality attributes such as performance, availability, security, look-and-feel details, or maintainability are specified.

RequirementText: JavaScript code includes error handling functionality to ensure a smooth user experience.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies error handling in JavaScript to ensure a smooth user experience. This implies fault tolerance/resilience (FT) and improved usability (US). It does not state functional behavior, availability, security, or other qualities explicitly.

RequirementText: User updates the cart contents using JavaScript functions.
AI_Rationale: This statement describes a functional behavior (users update cart contents) and even prescribes an implementation detail (using JavaScript functions). It does not specify availability, performance, security, UI look-and-feel, maintainability, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: JavaScript functions manage updating the cart based on user actions such as quantity adjustments or item removal.
AI_Rationale: Describes a functional behavior: JavaScript functions update the shopping cart in response to user actions (quantity adjustments, item removal). No non-functional quality attributes are specified.

RequirementText: User shall receive the product list within 2 seconds of requesting it, ensuring a responsive interface.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that the user shall receive the product list within 2 seconds (functional behavior) and includes an explicit time constraint (performance). The phrase 'responsive interface' implies usability expectations.

RequirementText: User shall add items to the shopping cart with a response time of less than 1 second, enhancing the shopping experience.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability (add items to cart) together with an explicit performance constraint (response time < 1 second). No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall access the system concurrently with a minimum capacity of 100 simultaneous users, maintaining performance.
AI_Rationale: Specifies simultaneous user capacity (scalability) and requires maintaining performance under that load (performance). Does not mention availability windows, security, or other concerns.

RequirementText: User shall access the system reliably with an uptime of at least 99% over a 30-day period.
AI_Rationale: Specifies required system uptime (99% over 30 days), which is an availability requirement.

RequirementText: User shall experience regular backups of data, ensuring data integrity and preventing loss in case of failure.
AI_Rationale: Specifies regular backups (functional behavior) to prevent data loss and ensure integrity—this implies fault tolerance/resilience to failures (FT). Ensuring data integrity and preventing loss also relates to security concerns (data integrity/confidentiality/integrity) (SE). No explicit requirements about availability metrics, maintainability, performance, portability, UI, scalability, legal, or operability.

RequirementText: User shall expect the system to recover to a stable state within 5 minutes in the event of a system failure.
AI_Rationale: Specifies recovery time after failure (recovery to stable state within 5 minutes) — this is fault tolerance and impacts availability (uptime/SLA). No functional behavior, security, performance, or other qualities explicitly mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall access the system 24/7, with planned maintenance during off-peak hours.
AI_Rationale: Specifies continuous access (24/7) and handling of downtime via scheduled maintenance in off-peak hours, which are explicit availability requirements. No explicit mentions of security, performance, fault tolerance, maintainability, or other qualities.

RequirementText: User shall rely on critical system components with a Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF) exceeding 30 days.
AI_Rationale: Specifies MTBF (>30 days) for critical components, which is a reliability/availability requirement and relates to fault tolerance (resilience to failures). No functional behavior or other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: User's authentication credentials shall be encrypted and protected against brute force attacks.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly concerns encrypting credentials and protecting against brute-force attacks, which are security measures (confidentiality and authentication protection). No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: User's personal and payment data shall be encrypted during transmission and storage, ensuring confidentiality.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly mandates encryption of personal and payment data in transit and at rest, which is a security (confidentiality) requirement. No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: User's access to administrative functions shall be restricted to authorized personnel through role-based access control (RBAC).
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies restricting access to administrative functions to authorized personnel via role-based access control, which directly concerns security (authentication/authorization). It does not state availability, performance, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall benefit from a modularized and well-documented system for ease of maintenance and future enhancements.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly targets modularization and documentation to enable ease of maintenance and future enhancements, which directly maps to maintainability. It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional categories.

RequirementText: User shall have access to version control systems for tracking code changes and updates.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a functional capability (users shall have access to version control systems for tracking code changes). It does not mention availability, security/authorization, maintainability, or other quality attributes explicitly.

RequirementText: User shall access the system across different platforms and devices with compatibility with modern web browsers.
AI_Rationale: Specifies compatibility across platforms/devices and modern web browsers, which is a portability requirement. It does not state availability, security, UI/look-and-feel, performance, or other qualities explicitly.

RequirementText: User shall experience optimized mobile responsiveness for seamless access from smartphones and tablets.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies optimized mobile responsiveness and seamless access from smartphones/tablets, which primarily concerns look-and-feel (responsive UI) and usability. It also implies cross-device compatibility (portability). No functional behavior or other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall see a list of blogs upon clicking the button on the homepage, providing access to individual post pages.
AI_Rationale: This requirement describes a functional behavior: showing a list of blogs when a homepage button is clicked and linking to individual post pages. It does not specify availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional qualities.

RequirementText: User shall be able to search for blogs using a search query string, with results displayed based on the query.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (searching blogs and displaying results) which is a functional behavior; it does not mention availability, performance, security, UI look-and-feel, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: User shall log in using a username and password, with successful authentication redirecting to the respective home page.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a login mechanism and post-authentication redirect (functional behavior) and requires authentication using username/password, which is a security concern. No availability, performance, usability, or other quality attributes are specified.

RequirementText: User shall register by filling out a registration form, with success or failure based on data availability.
AI_Rationale: Describes a user action and system behavior for registration (form submission and success/failure based on data availability), which is a functional requirement. No explicit non-functional constraints (performance, security, availability, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: User shall add a new blog by filling out a form with title, description, and content, with validation ensuring data integrity.
AI_Rationale: Primary requirement describes a functional capability (adding a blog via a form). The mention of validation to ensure data integrity implies a non-functional concern related to data integrity/security controls, so Security is marked. No explicit availability, performance, scalability, portability, maintainability, operability, legal, look-and-feel, or usability constraints are stated.

RequirementText: User shall update a blog by filling out a form with title, description, and content, with validation ensuring data integrity.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a functional behavior (user updates a blog via a form) and explicitly requires validation to ensure data integrity. Validation for data integrity is treated as a security-related constraint in the provided examples, so SE is set. No other quality attributes (availability, performance, usability, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: User shall delete a blog by clicking a button, with validation ensuring data integrity.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a functional capability (delete a blog via button) and includes validation to ensure data integrity, which is a security-related concern (integrity). It does not explicitly mention availability, performance, portability, scalability, operability, maintainability, legal, look-and-feel, or usability beyond the basic functional UI action.

RequirementText: User shall log out by clicking a button, with the session terminated and redirection to the home page.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a logout function (functional). It requires session termination which is a security requirement. It also prescribes a simple click-and-redirect interaction, implying usability considerations. No availability, performance, portability, scalability, maintenance, operability, legal, or look-and-feel (aesthetics) aspects are specified.

RequirementText: System shall display a list of blogs on the homepage upon user request, accessible to all users.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a concrete system behavior (display a list of blogs on the homepage upon user request, accessible to all users), which is functional. It does not state non-functional constraints such as performance, availability targets, security, usability metrics, or visual design.

RequirementText: System shall allow users to search for blogs based on a query string, displaying matching results.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user-facing capability (search blogs by query and display results), which is functional behavior. No quality attributes such as performance, usability, security, etc., are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall authenticate users using a username and password, redirecting to the respective home page upon successful login.
AI_Rationale: Specifies user authentication mechanism (username/password) and post-login redirect—this is a functional requirement that also directly concerns security (authentication). No availability, performance, usability, or other quality attributes are specified.

RequirementText: System shall register new users by validating input data and updating the database accordingly.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior (register new users: F). It also explicitly requires validating input data, which relates to security/data integrity concerns (input validation to prevent malformed or malicious data and ensure database integrity), so SE is marked. No explicit mentions of availability, fault tolerance, performance, portability, scalability, legal, usability, maintainability or operability.

RequirementText: System shall facilitate the addition of new blogs by validating input data and updating the database accordingly.
AI_Rationale: Primary requirement describes functional behavior (adding blogs, updating database). It also specifies validating input data, which relates to preventing invalid/malicious input and preserving data integrity—mapped as a security concern.

RequirementText: System shall enable users to update existing blogs by validating input data and updating the database accordingly.
AI_Rationale: Describes core system functionality: allowing users to update blogs, validate input, and update the database. No explicit non-functional attributes (availability, security, performance, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: System shall support the deletion of blogs by validating user actions and updating the database accordingly.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a functional capability (deletion of blogs and database update), and includes validation of user actions which implies security-related concerns (authentication/authorization and integrity). No explicit availability, performance, scalability, portability, legal, UI, maintainability, operability, or fault-tolerance requirements are stated.

RequirementText: System shall terminate user sessions upon logout, destroying the session and redirecting to the home page.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a functional behavior (terminate sessions on logout and redirect), so F=1. Destroying sessions is a session-management security measure (prevents reuse), so SE=1. No explicit availability, performance, portability, scalability, fault-tolerance, legal, look-and-feel, maintainability, operability, or usability constraints are stated.

RequirementText: User shall experience smooth performance as data queries involve small pieces of data and screen changes occur quickly.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly specifies smooth performance and quick screen changes, which map to performance (speed/latency). It does not specify functional behavior, availability, scalability, security, or other qualities.

RequirementText: User shall have access to the website 24/7, except during maintenance periods.
AI_Rationale: Specifies uptime/availability requirement (24/7 access except maintenance). Does not mention security, performance, scalability, fault tolerance, or other qualities.

RequirementText: User shall access the application without experiencing heavy load on their device due to its lightweight design.
AI_Rationale: Requirement constrains device resource usage and implies a lightweight design to avoid heavy load (performance/resource usage). It also addresses the user's experience interacting without device strain, so usability applies. No legal, security, scalability, or other concerns are specified.

RequirementText: Only the project admin shall have backend database access, allowing for secure modifications and updates.
AI_Rationale: Specifies access restriction to backend database to 'project admin' only, which is an access control/security requirement. No other quality attributes (performance, availability, portability, etc.) are implied.

RequirementText: System shall provide a secure login/registration system to prevent unauthorized access.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a login/registration feature (functional) with the explicit goal of preventing unauthorized access (security). No other quality attributes are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall store data securely in the database, ensuring protection of sensitive information.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies secure storage and protection of sensitive information, which is a security (confidentiality/integrity) concern. It does not describe availability, performance, UI, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall maintain consistency in performance, ensuring reliable and predictable operation.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly refers to consistency in performance and predictable, reliable operation — directly addressing performance (speed/consistency) and overall reliability/availability. It does not mention fault recovery, scalability, security, UI, or maintenance, so those labels are not set.

RequirementText: System shall enforce business rules, allowing blog owners to manage only their own blogs and not interfere with others'.
AI_Rationale: Specifies enforcement of business rules restricting blog owners to manage only their own blogs (access control) — this is a functional requirement describing behavior and a security requirement (authorization).

RequirementText: System shall be robust, scalable, flexible, and user-friendly to meet diverse user needs effectively.
AI_Rationale: ‘Robust’ implies fault tolerance/resilience (FT). ‘Scalable’ maps to scalability (SC). ‘Flexible’ suggests adaptability/maintainability (MN). ‘User-friendly’ corresponds to usability (US). No explicit mentions of availability, performance, security, portability, legal, or look-and-feel.

RequirementText: System shall be available at all times, providing stable access to users.
AI_Rationale: Explicitly states continuous availability and stable access to users, which corresponds to Availability. Does not explicitly mention fault tolerance, performance, security, or other qualities.

RequirementText: System shall ensure correctness in displaying blog details and content, preventing inaccuracies.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies that the system must ensure correctness in displaying blog details and content, which is a functional behavior (what the system should do). It does not explicitly mention availability, security, usability, or other quality attributes, so those are not set.

RequirementText: System shall prioritize usability, striving to satisfy the maximum number of customer needs efficiently.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly focuses on prioritizing usability and satisfying customer needs efficiently, which is a usability/UX quality goal. It does not specify functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall seamlessly translate text input from one language to another in real-time, preserving meaning and conveying nuance effectively.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability (real-time text translation). 'Real-time' implies performance/latency requirements (PE). Terms like 'seamlessly' and 'preserving meaning/nuance' relate to user experience quality (US). No explicit availability, security, scalability, portability, maintainability, legal, or look-and-feel constraints.

RequirementText: User shall transcribe spoken language input into text format before initiating the translation process, enabling instant translations for conversations and voice commands.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (transcribe spoken input to text before translation). It also implies usability (enables instant translations for conversations/voice commands), but does not explicitly state availability, performance, security, scalability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: User shall hear spoken output in the target language generated from translated text, enhancing accessibility and pronunciation assistance.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability (spoken output generated from translated text = text-to-speech), and it explicitly mentions enhancing accessibility and pronunciation assistance, which are usability concerns. It does not state availability, performance, security, scalability, portability, legal, look-and-feel, maintainability, or operability constraints.

RequirementText: User shall benefit from automatic language detection, streamlining the translation process and enhancing user convenience in multilingual environments.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a system capability (automatic language detection) — a functional requirement. It also emphasizes enhancing user convenience in multilingual environments, indicating a usability concern. No explicit non-functional attributes like availability, performance, security, etc., are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall experience continuous improvement in translation accuracy over time through machine learning algorithms analyzing user interactions and feedback.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a system capability (automatic continuous improvement of translation via ML) so it's functional. It implies ongoing model updates/learning lifecycle which affects maintainability. It also affects user experience (translation quality), so usability is relevant. No explicit availability, performance, security, scalability, portability, UI look-and-feel, operability, or legal constraints are stated.

RequirementText: User shall integrate the app with communication platforms for real-time translation of conversations, chat messages, and social media posts.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability (integration and real-time translation) -> Functional. Requires real-time processing, implying performance/latency constraints -> Performance. 'Integrate with communication platforms' implies interfacing/operability concerns -> Operability. No explicit mentions of availability, security, scalability, portability, etc., so those are not marked.

RequirementText: User shall download language packs containing essential language data for offline use, ensuring access to translation services without internet connectivity.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user-facing capability to download language packs for offline translation (functional). It explicitly requires offline access to translation services when no internet is available, which is a fault-tolerance/offline-operability requirement. Does not address availability metrics, security, usability, portability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall perform on-device translation locally without internet reliance, delivering responsive and reliable translation experiences.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies the system shall perform on-device (functional capability) without internet reliance (implies availability/offline operation and resilience to network faults) and calls out "responsive" (performance/latency) and "reliable" (fault tolerance/availability). No explicit legal, UI, portability, scalability, security, maintainability, operability, or usability constraints are stated.

RequirementText: User shall access a limited feature set for offline usage, prioritizing essential translation functionalities for usability and efficiency.
AI_Rationale: Requires offline access to a limited feature set (functional requirement). Emphasis on prioritizing essential translation features for usability and efficiency indicates a usability/efficiency quality constraint, so US is set. No explicit statements about availability, performance, security, scalability, portability, maintenance, or look-and-feel.

RequirementText: User shall receive automatic updates for downloaded language packs to ensure access to the latest translations and language improvements.
AI_Rationale: Specifies an automatic update capability (functional). This feature relates to maintainability/keeping content current (MN). No explicit availability, security, usability, or other quality constraints are stated.

RequirementText: User shall experience optimized resource usage, minimizing storage space, processing power, and battery consumption during offline usage.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies resource optimization (storage, CPU, battery) during offline use, which is a performance/efficiency quality attribute; it does not state functional behavior or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall access fallback mechanisms in situations where offline resources are unavailable, assisting in understanding foreign language content.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a fallback mechanism when offline resources are unavailable (fault tolerance). It also describes assisting users to understand foreign language content, which is a functional capability and improves usability.

RequirementText: User shall toggle between online and offline modes within the app settings to manage connectivity preferences based on environment and usage requirements.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a user-facing capability to toggle online/offline modes (functional). Providing offline mode implies resilience to loss of connectivity and continued operation, which relates to fault tolerance. Other quality attributes (availability, usability, security, etc.) are not explicitly mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall experience smooth and efficient translation requests handling, even during concurrent usage, facilitated by effective concurrency control mechanisms.
AI_Rationale: Requirement focuses on smooth and efficient handling under concurrent usage via concurrency control mechanisms, which are quality concerns of performance (efficiency, responsiveness) and scalability (handling concurrent load). It does not state functional behavior, availability targets, security, or other NFRs.

RequirementText: User shall benefit from optimized resource utilization to minimize memory, CPU, and network bandwidth consumption, ensuring scalability and performance in resource-constrained environments.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly targets minimizing memory/CPU/network consumption and ensuring performance and scalability in resource-constrained environments. This directly maps to Performance and Scalability concerns; it does not specify availability, security, portability, maintainability, or functional behavior.

RequirementText: User shall have access to continuous performance monitoring and profiling to identify and address performance bottlenecks proactively, ensuring optimal system efficiency.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly states users shall have access to continuous performance monitoring (a functional capability) and focuses on identifying/addressing performance bottlenecks to ensure optimal system efficiency (performance concern). It also implies operational/manageability concerns (monitoring and profiling as an operational/admin feature). Other categories are not explicitly mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall experience evenly distributed translation requests across multiple servers through load balancing strategies, optimizing resource allocation and scalability.
AI_Rationale: Specifies load balancing to evenly distribute requests and optimize resource allocation and scalability, which directly concerns performance (throughput/latency) and scalability. No explicit mentions of availability, fault tolerance, security, usability, or other categories.

RequirementText: User shall have access to predefined emergency response protocols and procedures within the app, providing assistance during critical incidents such as medical emergencies or natural disasters.
AI_Rationale: This requirement describes a functional capability (providing access to predefined emergency protocols and in-app assistance). It does not explicitly state security, availability, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: User shall have their privacy protected through data anonymization techniques, encryption methods, and data masking mechanisms, ensuring confidentiality and reducing the risk of data breaches.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly mandates privacy protection via anonymization, encryption, and data masking to ensure confidentiality and reduce breach risk, which maps directly to security concerns. It does not mention availability, legal compliance, usability, performance, maintainability, scalability, portability, or operability, nor is it a general functional behavior beyond security controls.

RequirementText: User shall receive safety training materials and awareness campaigns within the app, promoting safe behaviors and fostering a culture of responsibility among users.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies that the system shall deliver training materials and awareness campaigns within the app (functional behavior). It also concerns user training/education which impacts usability and user competence, so Usability is applicable. No explicit availability, security, performance, scalability, legal, or other non-functional aspects are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall benefit from regular vulnerability assessments, security audits, and penetration testing to identify and remediate security vulnerabilities in the app's codebase and infrastructure.
AI_Rationale: Requirement explicitly describes performing vulnerability assessments, security audits, and penetration testing to identify and remediate security vulnerabilities in codebase and infrastructure, which maps directly to Security (SE). No other quality attributes (availability, fault tolerance, maintainability, etc.) are explicitly mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall have access to a well-defined incident response plan and incident management procedures within the app to handle security incidents effectively, minimizing their impact.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies access to incident response plan and incident management procedures to handle security incidents and minimize impact — this is a security-related requirement (incident handling). It does not explicitly state availability, fault tolerance, usability, or other non-functional categories.

RequirementText: User shall experience adaptability and flexibility in the app, accommodating evolving user needs, technological advancements, and market trends through modular architectures and extensible design patterns.
AI_Rationale: Requirement emphasizes modular, extensible design to accommodate evolving needs—this is primarily a maintainability (extensibility/modularity) concern. The phrasing about user 'experience adaptability and flexibility' also implies a usability/UX quality.

RequirementText: User shall benefit from interoperability with third-party systems and services, enabling seamless integration with external applications, devices, and ecosystems through support for industry-standard protocols and open APIs.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies interoperability and support for industry-standard protocols and open APIs to enable integration with external systems — this primarily concerns portability/compatibility across platforms (Portability). It does not explicitly address availability, performance, security, maintainability, operability, or functional behavior.

RequirementText: User shall generate reports at the Admin Login page by clicking on the link provided.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional action: users shall generate reports from the Admin Login page by clicking a provided link. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: System shall check for the existence of requested reports and redirect control to the generated report screen, displaying information on paid members, free members, and all members.
AI_Rationale: Describes specific system behavior: checking for report existence, redirecting to report screen, and displaying member categories. This is a functional requirement; no explicit non-functional qualities (performance, security, usability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: User shall send and read emails by clicking on the respective links or shortcuts.
AI_Rationale: Specifies functional capabilities (send/read emails) and explicitly mandates the user interaction method (clicking links/shortcuts), which implies a usability/interaction requirement. No indications of availability, security, performance, etc.

RequirementText: System shall redirect control to the mail screen, providing options to read or send emails to the administrator.
AI_Rationale: Describes a system behavior/feature (redirecting to mail screen and offering read/send options) — a functional requirement. No explicit quality constraints (performance, security, usability, etc.).

RequirementText: User shall register as a new user by clicking on the registration link at the login page.
AI_Rationale: This requirement describes a functional action (user registration via clicking a link). It does not specify availability, performance, usability, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall direct the user to the registration page to complete the registration process, storing user data in the database and sending a confirmation email.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies concrete system behaviors: navigate user to registration page, store user data in database, and send confirmation email. These are functional actions; it does not explicitly state non-functional constraints such as availability, security, performance, usability, or others.

RequirementText: User shall log into their account by entering their user-id and password.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a login function (functional). Requires authentication using user-id and password, which is a security requirement. No explicit availability, performance, or usability constraints.

RequirementText: System shall validate the user credentials and provide access to the user's profile, allowing them to update their resume, profile, and search for job matches.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies functional behavior (authenticate users, provide profile access, allow updates and job search) — clearly Functional. It explicitly requires validating user credentials, which implies authentication/authorization concerns, so Security is applicable. No explicit availability, performance, scalability, usability, maintainability, portability, fault tolerance, legal, or look-and-feel constraints are stated.

RequirementText: User shall retrieve forgotten passwords by clicking on the password retrieval link.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-visible capability (password retrieval via a link), which is a functional behavior. It does not explicitly state availability, security, usability, or other quality constraints, so only Functional is marked.

RequirementText: System shall send an email to the user's verified email address with a verification code or link to set a new password.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing system behavior (sending a password-reset verification email). It also implies a security concern (verified email and password reset flow), so Security is marked. Other non-functional categories are not explicitly indicated.

RequirementText: User's session shall automatically redirect to the login page if it expires.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a system behavior (automatic redirect on session expiry) which is functional. It also concerns session management/access control, a security-related control, so Security is applicable. No other quality attributes are explicitly implied.

RequirementText: System shall return the user to the login page when the session expires.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies a system behavior (redirecting user to login when session expires) so it is functional. It also pertains to session management/authentication handling, which is a security-related concern, so Security is marked. No other quality attributes are explicitly implied.

RequirementText: User shall search for potential employees by entering interests and preferences such as salary, location, job category, and profession.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (search for employees by criteria), which is a functional requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: System shall search the database for individuals matching the entered qualifications and preferences, displaying their complete details.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system behavior: searching the database for individuals matching given qualifications/preferences and displaying their details, which is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: User shall apply for a job by filling out the necessary details in the respective form.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user action and system functionality (applying for a job via a form). No non-functional qualities like performance, security, availability, usability, etc., are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall verify if the applicant is eligible for the job and send an email for further procedures if applicable.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies system behavior: checking applicant eligibility and sending an email—functional actions. It does not mention availability, security, performance, portability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: User shall apply for various jobs on the website by providing details regarding date, schedule, and location.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user-facing capability (applying for jobs with date, schedule, and location details), which is functional. It does not state availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality constraints.

RequirementText: System shall search the database for available job options matching the user's preferences and display them along with the company's contact details.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies system behavior: searching database for job options and displaying company contact details. This is a clear functional requirement; no explicit non-functional concerns (availability, performance, usability, security, etc.) are stated.

RequirementText: User shall expect uninterrupted website functionality even during high network traffic.
AI_Rationale: Requirement targets uninterrupted functionality (uptime/reliability) during high network traffic, which maps to Availability. Mention of handling high traffic implies scalability to handle load. It does not specify security, fault-tolerance mechanisms, performance metrics, or functional behavior.

RequirementText: User shall not share their password with anyone, and the system must ensure complete privacy of filtered details and user chats.
AI_Rationale: Requirement concerns preventing password sharing and ensuring privacy/confidentiality of filtered details and user chats, which are security/privacy concerns. No explicit availability, performance, scalability, usability, or functional behavior specified.

RequirementText: User shall have a maximum of three attempts to enter the password, after which an email notification will be sent if there's an additional attempt.
AI_Rationale: Specifies authentication-related control: limiting password attempts and sending notification—this is a security requirement. It also defines system behavior (enforce attempts and send email), so it is functional as well.

RequirementText: System shall prioritize security and performance as the two primary objectives.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly states the system shall prioritize security and performance as primary objectives, directly indicating security (SE) and performance (PE) non-functional concerns. No other quality attributes or functional behavior are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall ensure 24/7 availability of the interface and maximal security of the network.
AI_Rationale: Explicitly states 24/7 availability (Availability) and 'maximal security of the network' (Security). No mention of other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Only the administrator shall have the authority to make changes to the database, including addition, updating, and deletion of data.
AI_Rationale: Specifies access control/authorization restricting database modification rights to the administrator, which is a security requirement (authz). No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: User shall present their ID card for validation.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a user action/functional behavior (present ID for validation). No quality attributes (availability, security, usability, etc.) are explicitly required.

RequirementText: System shall grant access and allow further actions if the ID card is valid.
AI_Rationale: Specifies system behavior: grant access and allow actions based on ID card validity (functional). Involves access control/authentication, so security is implicated.

RequirementText: System shall deny access and display an error message if the ID card is invalid.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies system behavior (deny access and display an error) so it is Functional. It also describes access control for invalid ID cards, which is a security-related requirement, so Security is marked. Other quality concerns are not explicitly implied.

RequirementText: User shall mark attendance using a selected method.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user capability (mark attendance using a chosen method), which describes functional behavior. It does not state any quality/constraint related to availability, performance, security, usability, etc.

RequirementText: System shall confirm successful attendance marking.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a functional behavior: the system must confirm successful attendance marking (an interaction/feature). It does not explicitly state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional concerns.

RequirementText: System shall display an error message if authentication fails or other issues occur.
AI_Rationale: The statement specifies a system behavior (display an error message) in response to authentication failure or other issues, which is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state availability, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall automatically track work/class hours based on user's sign-in and sign-out timestamps.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional behavior: the system must automatically track hours using sign-in/sign-out timestamps. It does not state non-functional constraints such as availability, performance, security, etc.

RequirementText: User shall request leave through the system.
AI_Rationale: This specifies a system capability (users can request leave) which is a functional requirement. No quality constraints (availability, security, usability, etc.) are mentioned.

RequirementText: System shall confirm submission of leave request.
AI_Rationale: This describes a functional behavior (the system must confirm/notify submission). It does not explicitly specify quality attributes like usability, security, performance, etc.

RequirementText: Administrator shall review and approve/deny leave requests.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability: administrators must review and approve/deny leave requests. No quality attributes (availability, security, performance, etc.) are explicitly required.

RequirementText: Administrator shall view submitted leave requests and take appropriate action.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a functional capability: an Administrator must be able to view submitted leave requests and take action. It does not explicitly state availability, performance, security, usability, or other non-functional constraints, so only Functional is set.

RequirementText: System shall generate reports on attendance data based on specified criteria.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a system function (generating attendance reports based on specified criteria). It does not mention availability, performance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall specify desired report criteria, and the system shall display the report accordingly.
AI_Rationale: Describes a specific system behavior: accepting report criteria from user and displaying a report accordingly — a functional requirement. No non-functional qualities (performance, usability, etc.) are specified.

RequirementText: User may export attendance data in a chosen format.
AI_Rationale: This is a functional requirement describing an export capability (user can export attendance data in a chosen format). It does not explicitly specify UI, performance, security, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: User shall select desired data format and export criteria, and the system shall export data accordingly.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a user action (select data format and export criteria) and the system behavior (export data accordingly), which is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly state non-functional aspects such as availability, performance, security, portability, or usability.

RequirementText: System may send alerts for tardiness or absences.
AI_Rationale: This describes a system capability (sending alerts for tardiness/absences), which is a functional requirement. It does not specify availability, security, performance, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall monitor user attendance data and send notifications for tardiness or absences.
AI_Rationale: This requirement describes functional behavior: monitoring attendance data and sending notifications. It does not specify availability, fault tolerance, security, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Administrator shall manage user accounts.
AI_Rationale: This statement specifies a capability (administrator managing user accounts), which is a functional requirement. It does not explicitly mention availability, security, performance, usability, or other quality attributes, so no additional NFR labels are set.

RequirementText: Administrator shall add, edit, or delete user accounts and assign roles.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies actions the system must provide (add/edit/delete user accounts and assign roles), which are functional capabilities. It does not explicitly state availability, security controls, performance, usability, or other non-functional constraints.

RequirementText: Updated user accounts with corresponding roles shall be reflected in the system.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies system behavior—updated user accounts and roles shall be reflected—which is functional. It also implies a maintenance/consistency expectation (updates are propagated/reflected), so Maintainability is applicable. It does not explicitly address availability, fault tolerance, security controls, usability, scalability, portability, legal, or look-and-feel.

RequirementText: System shall define user roles and access permissions.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies defining user roles and access permissions, which directly pertains to access control/security. It does not explicitly state functional behavior beyond security, nor mention availability, performance, usability, or other quality attributes.

RequirementText: Administrator shall configure user roles and assign permissions for functionalities.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies an administrative capability (configuring roles and assigning permissions) — a functional feature — and directly concerns access control/authorization, which is a security requirement. No explicit references to availability, performance, usability, portability, scalability, maintainability, fault tolerance, legal, or look-and-feel are present.

RequirementText: System shall enforce access control based on assigned user roles and permissions.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies enforcing access control based on user roles and permissions, which is a security-related constraint (authentication/authorization). It does not state availability, performance, usability, or functional behavior beyond security, so only SE is set.

RequirementText: System shall handle concurrent usage by multiple professors during peak times (9:00 AM to 2:00 PM).
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies the system must support concurrent usage during defined peak hours, which implies capacity/scale and ensuring availability under load. It does not specify security, portability, fault tolerance, or UI aspects, nor explicit performance metrics, so only Scalability and Availability are marked.

RequirementText: Transmission of roll data must occur in under 5 seconds.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that transmission of roll data must occur within 5 seconds — this is a performance/time constraint (PE). It also implies the functional capability to transmit roll data, so F is set. No explicit availability, security, usability, or other qualities are mentioned.

RequirementText: Acknowledgement of roll received must be returned within 8 seconds.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that an acknowledgement (a functional response) must be returned and imposes a timing/latency constraint (returned within 8 seconds), so both Functional and Performance apply.

RequirementText: Queries upon the database shall be performed in less than 5 seconds.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a timing constraint (query response time < 5 seconds), which is a performance (PE) quality attribute. It does not mention functionality, availability, fault tolerance, usability, or other non-functional categories explicitly.

RequirementText: Upon start of the roll program, roll information shall be displayed on the instructor’s Pocket PC within 10 seconds.
AI_Rationale: Specifies that roll information shall be displayed (functional) and adds a timing constraint of within 10 seconds (performance).

RequirementText: Email messages to absent students shall be sent within one hour of the conclusion of a class.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a system action (sending email to absent students) and a timing constraint (within one hour), so it's functional with a performance/timeliness non-functional requirement.

RequirementText: The program shall support taking roll for class sizes of up to 100 students while maintaining performance requirements.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies a functional capability (taking roll) and constrains performance for up to 100 students, implying performance and scalability concerns. No mention of other quality attributes.

RequirementText: System shall be protected by a password.
AI_Rationale: This requirement specifies a password protection mechanism (authentication) to protect the system, which is a security requirement. It does not mention availability, performance, usability, or other non-functional aspects.

RequirementText: An antivirus has been installed on the system for safety purposes as it is connected via LAN and MAN.
AI_Rationale: Specifies installation of antivirus due to network connectivity; this is a security requirement (confidentiality/integrity/protection). No explicit availability, performance, or other quality attributes mentioned.

RequirementText: An instructor shall be permitted to view and edit absence information in the database for only his/her classes.
AI_Rationale: Specifies access control (who may view/edit which data) — a security requirement. It also defines a functional capability (instructor can view/edit absence info for their classes). No mention of availability, performance, etc.

RequirementText: Instructors must enter a password to take roll or edit database information.
AI_Rationale: Requires the system to enforce that instructors authenticate (enter a password) before taking roll or editing database — this is both a functional control (enforcement behavior) and a security requirement (authentication). No explicit availability, performance, scalability, etc. implications.

RequirementText: Passwords shall be stored in an instructor database and verified upon each session of roll or database modification.
AI_Rationale: The requirement specifies functional behavior (store passwords in instructor database and verify them on sessions/changes) — so Functional. It also relates to security (password storage and verification) implying authentication and confidentiality/integrity concerns — so Security. No explicit availability, performance, portability, scalability, maintainability, operability, legal, look-and-feel, or usability requirements are stated.

RequirementText: An instructor can change his/her password only by supplying the existing password.
AI_Rationale: Specifies a functional capability (instructor password change) with an explicit security constraint requiring verification of existing password before change (authentication). No other quality attributes are implied.

RequirementText: The system shall be available to all instructors through Information Systems during their normal hours of operation.
AI_Rationale: Specifies system availability to instructors during normal hours of operation — a clear availability requirement. No mention of fault tolerance, performance, usability, or other qualities.

RequirementText: Reliability of the system and roll information shall be achieved through database manipulation.
AI_Rationale: The requirement explicitly mentions 'Reliability of the system' (a quality related to availability), and states it shall be achieved through database manipulation, implying an operational/implementation constraint involving the database. This aligns with Availability and Operability. No clear indications of fault tolerance, security, performance, portability, etc.

RequirementText: The system shall be reusable for each new semester.
AI_Rationale: Requirement specifies reusability across semesters, which is a maintainability concern (ease of adapting/repurposing the system). It does not state functional behavior or other quality attributes explicitly.

RequirementText: If no network connection can be established to receive roll information, the instructor shall be allowed to enter roll later.
